crystals[/caption]</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12491820\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 839px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603986202.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=829\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491820\" width=\"829\" height=\"916\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Instagram</figcredit></figure>The star hopes they will bring her &#8216;confidence&#8217; and she prays with them daily[/caption]</p>\n<p>The singer has told fans she used to enjoy looking at rocks in the garden so has started collecting crystals to &#8220;meditate and pray&#8221; with. </p>\n<p>Taking to Instagram, Britney shared a photo of a book cover entitled The Crystal Bible: A Definitive Guide To Crystals and said she already has 33 rocks in her collection. </p>\n<p>The former Disney star wrote: &#8220;Ok … call me weird if you want but I really love crystals and rocks!!!! </p>\n<p>&#8220;During this pandemic I’ve had more time to myself so I started a collection of crystals and I now have 33 <img src=\"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/1f52e.png\" alt=\"🔮\" class=\"wp-smiley\" style=\"height: 1em; max-height: 1em;\" /><img src=\"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/2728.png\" alt=\"✨\" class=\"wp-smiley\" style=\"height: 1em; max-height: 1em;\" /> !!!! They are stunning and I pray and meditate with them every darn day!!!! &#8220;</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12491821\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 779px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000602618187-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=769\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491821\" width=\"769\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Britney lost her recent bid to take control of her finances</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12491823\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 950px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000459623956-4.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=940\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491823\" width=\"940\" height=\"893\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Refer to Caption</figcredit></figure>The star&#8217;s wanted her dad Jamie Spears removed as her conservator[/caption]</p>\n<p>Britney went on to explain that she has different prayers depending &#8216;on what she&#8217;s going through&#8217; that day. </p>\n<p>She said: &#8220;For instance, yesterday I prayed to find more confidence and grace ….. asking my spiritual guides to guide me … I usually also burn incense to clear the energy!!! </p>\n<p>&#8220;I even used to hold a small rock in my pocket when I was nervous for interviews for good luck.&#8221;</p>\n<p>Britney continued her post by reflecting on her childhood, admitting that she is &#8216;going back&#8217; to what she enjoyed doing as a kid. </p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12491825\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 939px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/161027af-3d86-499f-a92f-501a64a41fe3.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=929\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491825\" width=\"929\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Everett Collection - Rex Features</figcredit></figure>Britney says she is reverting to things she &#8216;loved&#8217; as a child[/caption]</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12491826\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000292044759.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491826\" width=\"960\" height=\"592\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Splash News</figcredit></figure>The star found fame as a kid in the Mickey Mouse Club[/caption]</p>\n<p>She wrote: &#8220;I’m taking this time to find myself and go back to the things I loved when I was younger!!!! </p>\n<p>&#8220;When I was little …. any time I went outside I would rather stay in the driveway and look for pretty rocks than play <img src=\"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/1f602.png\" alt=\"😂\" class=\"wp-smiley\" style=\"height: 1em; max-height: 1em;\" /><img src=\"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/2728.png\" alt=\"✨\" class=\"wp-smiley\" style=\"height: 1em; max-height: 1em;\" /><img src=\"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/1f333.png\" alt=\"🌳\" class=\"wp-smiley\" style=\"height: 1em; max-height: 1em;\" /> … okay so I was a weird little kid <img src=\"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/1f937-1f3fc-200d-2640-fe0f.png\" alt=\"🤷🏼‍♀️\" class=\"wp-smiley\" style=\"height: 1em; max-height: 1em;\" /><img src=\"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/1f937-1f3fc-200d-2640-fe0f.png\" alt=\"🤷🏼‍♀️\" class=\"wp-smiley\" style=\"height: 1em; max-height: 1em;\" /><img src=\"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/1f937-1f3fc-200d-2640-fe0f.png\" alt=\"🤷🏼‍♀️\" class=\"wp-smiley\" style=\"height: 1em; max-height: 1em;\" /> !!!! </p>\n<p>&#8220;Hmmm … I guess some things never change <img src=\"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/1f61c.png\" alt=\"😜\" class=\"wp-smiley\" style=\"height: 1em; max-height: 1em;\" /><img src=\"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/1f64a.png\" alt=\"🙊\" class=\"wp-smiley\" style=\"height: 1em; max-height: 1em;\" /><img src=\"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/1f602.png\" alt=\"😂\" class=\"wp-smiley\" style=\"height: 1em; max-height: 1em;\" /> !!! PS in other words go put some damn rocks in your house <img src=\"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/1f3e1.png\" alt=\"🏡\" class=\"wp-smiley\" style=\"height: 1em; max-height: 1em;\" /> !!!!&#8221;</p>\n<p>Mother-of-two Britney suffered a setback last week when no action was taken in her legal case to have her father Jamie Spears removed as her conservator, TMZ reported.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12491828\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 778px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000459621756.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=768\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491828\" width=\"768\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Refer to Caption</figcredit></figure>The singer has told fans she would rather collect stones than play as a child[/caption]</p>\n<p>\t<div class=\"article-boxout\">\n\t\t<div class=\"article-boxout__header theme__background-color\">\n\t\t\t<h3 class=\"article-boxout__headline\">What is Britney&#039;s conservatorship?</h3>\n\t\t</div>\n\t\t<div class=\"article-boxout__content theme__background-color-rgba-20\">\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t</p>\n<div>\n<p>Since 2008, Britney&#160;has been subject to a legal “conservatorship”&#160;&#8211; making her dad Jamie her legal guardian, with direct control over her financial affairs and daily life.</p>\n<p>As her conservator, 68-year-old Jamie’s tasks include overseeing Britney’s business affairs, some personal assets, legal matters and family law issues.</p>\n<p>He also negotiated his daughter’s 2012 stint as a judge on the US X Factor series.</p>\n<p>The conservator role was reviewed on August 22 and Britney&#8217;s fans hoped she will be &#8220;freed&#8221; from the legal arrangement then.</p>\n<p>But a judge ruled that changes will not be made until February 2022 at the earliest. </p>\n</div>\n\n\t\t</div>\n\t</div>\n\t</p>\n<p>Britney had asked a judge to make her temporary care manager Jodi Montgomery &#8211; who took over last year when <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/entertainment/1329961/britney-spears-wants-father-jamie-out-as-sole-conservator/\">her father</a> became ill &#8211; to continue permanently as her conservator.</p>\n<p>The singer&#160;<a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/entertainment/1329961/britney-spears-wants-father-jamie-out-as-sole-conservator/\">&#8220;strongly opposed&#8221; Jamie being her sole conservator</a>, court documents filed by her attorney revealed.</p>\n<p>The documents also stated that &#8220;<a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/entertainment/1264819/britney-spears-makeup-artist-free-britney/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">a major overhaul in how her conservatorship is run is needed</a>&#160;to reflect her current lifestyle and her wishes&#8221; &#8211; confirming&#160;reports that the star no longer wishes to perform at this moment in time.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12491831\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 650px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000585295392-2.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=640\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491831\" width=\"640\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Getty Images - Getty</figcredit></figure>Court documents have revealed Britney &#8216;no longer wants to perform&#8217; at this time[/caption]</p>\n<p>\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row \">\n\t\t<div class=\"col -->\n\t<!--googleon: all-->\n\t</p>\n<p>Her ex-husband Jason Alexander also attended the hearing, where he&#160;<a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/entertainment/1339277/britney-spears-ex-husband-jason-alexander-rekindle/\">claimed they are back in touch</a>&#160;and that the star wants to rekindle their relationship.</p>\n<p>No changes were made when Wednesday&#8217;s hearing was adjourned.</p>\n<p>The Mickey Mouse Club alum has been unable to make major personal or financial decisions in her life without the approval of her father since a court-approved conservatorship was put in place in February 2008 after her meltdown and divorce from Kevin Federline.</p>\n<p>\t\t<!-- Start of Brightcove 40-fe0f.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn65@2020_3/2020/08/25/11-06-46-064_2a412cd0f6a51884.webp","https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/1f61c.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn16@2020_1/2020/08/25/11-06-34-667_38478cf35c41b114.webp","https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/1f64a.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn97@2020_3/2020/08/25/11-06-40-226_28e52448b76a5b75.webp","https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/1f3e1.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn29@2020_6/2020/08/25/11-06-43-402_cc315f29e85d93da.webp","https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000459621756.jpg?strip=all&w=768":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx23/cdn21@2020_5/2020/08/25/11-06-37-404_7650a55193dd6435.webp","https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000585295392-2.jpg?strip=all&w=640":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn91@2020_3/2020/08/25/11-06-29-373_716c30f0e9a18f00.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598353584716},{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 19:06:24","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 19:06:24","title":"The A Word confirms spin-off series for Ralph and Katie after groundbreaking Down’s Syndrome wedding","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/12491030/the-a-word-spin-off-series-ralph-katie/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>THE A Word has confirmed a spin-off series for Ralph and Katie following Down&#8217;s Syndrome wedding.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The BBC drama confirmed the new show which will focus on the newly married couple.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12491370\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000581124550.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491370\" width=\"960\" height=\"637\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>BBC</figcredit></figure>The A Word&#8217;s Ralph and Katie will star in their own spin-off show[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>It will be titled Ralph and Katie, which will follow the characters played by Leon Harrop and Sarah Gordy, 43, over the course of six 30-minute episodes.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>We will see how the pair get on as they face various challenges during their first year of marriage.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Screenwriter Peter Bowker, who wrote <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/a-word/\">The A Word</a>, will be back to pen the series and will be joined by a team of disabled writers to help bring the show to life.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The 61-year-old is delighted to be able to work with Leon and Sarah again and to increase representation and diversity both on and off screen.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12491375\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 955px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000585685834.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=945\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491375\" width=\"945\" height=\"630\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>BBC</figcredit></figure>The new series will focus on the pair&#8217;s first year of marriage as they endeavour to overcome various challenges[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>He commented: &#8220;Ralph and Katie is a natural step forwards from the ongoing ambition of The A Word to increase representation and diversity both on and off screen.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;Equally exciting is the opportunity to work again with two young actors as talented as Leon and Sarah.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>He added: &#8220;It is a tribute to their performances in The A Word that the BBC have commissioned this series.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12491475\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000586742659.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491475\" width=\"960\" height=\"629\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>BBC</figcredit></figure>The series will be written by The A Word&#8217;s Peter Bowker and he will joined by a series of disabled writers[/caption]\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div .rail__item-image -->\n\t\n\t<div class=\"rail__item-content\">\n\t\t\t\t\t<h3 class=\"rail__item-headline theme__copy-color\">\n\t\t\t\tDI&#039;S DEMISE\t\t\t</h3>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<span class=\"rail__item-gradient-light\">\n\n\t</div>\n\t<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tv/12456074/emmerdale-boss-reveals-original-plans-malone-death/\" class=\"rail__item-anchor\"></a>\n\n</div><!-- .rail__item .swiper-slide -->\n\t\t\t\t\t</div><!-- .swiper-wrapper -->\n\n\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"swiper-button-prev theme__background-color-rgba-80\"></div>\n\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"swiper-button-next theme__background-color-rgba-80\"></div>\n\n\t\t\t\t</div><!-- .swiper-container -->\n\t\t\t</div><!-- .rail .{rail} .swiper-video-rail .{theme-slug} -->\n\n\t\t</div><!-- .col .sun-col-6 -->\n\t</div><!-- .sun-row .{row} .rail-video-index-->\n\t</div> <!-- .sun-grid-container .sun-grid-container--{color} -->\n\t<!--googleon: all-->\n\t\n\n\n\n<p>Speaking of Ralph and Katie&#8217;s wedding, The A Word actor Christopher Eccleston beamed with pride as he opened up on being part of the <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/11818951/christopher-eccleston-the-a-word-radical-wedding-downs-syndrome-series-3/\">&#8220;radical&#8221; A Word plotline which saw them get hitched.</a></p>\n\n\n\n<p>The actor, 56, plays <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/a-word/\">grumpy Maurice Scott</a>, whose grandson Joe, now aged 10, suffers from autism.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Speaking to the Radio Times, Christopher said of the sweet I Do moment between the characters: &#8220;I think it’s possibly a first.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;I can’t think of many episodes of television drama which have been centred around the wedding and celebration of independence of two people with Down’s Syndrome. I can’t.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;So I think in a very quiet and modest way, The A Word is a benchmark, really.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n\t\t<!-- Start of Brightcove Player -->\n\n\t\t\t\t\t<div style=\"display: block; position: relative; min-width: 0px; max-width: 640px;\">\n\t\t\t\t<div style=\"padding-top: 56%; \">\n\t\t\t\t\t<video\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\tdata-video-id=\"6154302989001\" data-account=\"5067014667001\"\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\tdata-player=\"default\"\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\tdata-usage=\"cms:wordpress:5.4.2:1.7.0:javascript\"\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\tdata-embed=\"default\" class=\"video-js\"\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\tcontrols  \t\t\t\t\t\t\tstyle=\"width: 100%; through postal voting and ballot &#8220;harvesting.&#8221;</p>\n<p>The President has repeatedly rallied against so-called voter “fraud” in the wake of the pandemic which is expected to impact the number of in-person votes at polling stations. </p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12492489\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603875205-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492489\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>AP:Associated Press</figcredit></figure>Donald Trump claims Democrats will &#8216;steal the election&#8217; from Republicans through mail-in voting &#8216;fraud&#8217; and vote harvesting[/caption]</p>\n<p>Speaking at his party&#8217;s convention in Charlotte, North Carolina, last night the Republican said: “They&#8217;re trying to steal the election from the Republicans, that&#8217;s what it means.</p>\n<p>“In a very nice way, I will tell you, they are trying to steal the election just like they did it last time with spying and we caught them.&#8221;</p>\n<p>Trump has made the issue of mail-in voting and supposed “voter fraud” one of the cornerstone messages of his campaign.</p>\n<p>In Charlotte, he talked about the issue of “harvesting” votes or “ballot collection” where a third-party collects and submits the votes of others.</p>\n<p>He told his supporters in Charlotte that Democrats will harvest votes and stop those from Republican voters from being processed and counted.</p>\n<p>And Trump once again hit out at mail-in voting which he believes is vulnerable to fraud calling it “greatest scam in the history of politics.”</p>\n<p>The President has blocked a coronavirus relief bill which will give extra funding to the US Postal Service and election infrastructure amid the ongoing Covid-19 crisis.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12492490\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/RTRMADP_USA-ELECTION-CONVENTION_2022534660_RC2GKI9DOI4N_2020-08-24T165029Zjpg-JS603874650.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492490\" width=\"960\" height=\"589\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Trump has blocked extra funding for the US Postal Service and the national voting infrastructure</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>Speaking about mail-in voting, he said: “We&#8217;re not patriotic by saying this. No.</p>\n<p>“We voted during World War I. We voted at the voting booth during World War II.</p>\n<p>“The pandemic – we&#8217;re doing very well, and people know how to handle it.</p>\n<p>“Look at the crowds. They&#8217;re doing very well. It&#8217;s very safe. it&#8217;s going to be very safe.”</p>\n<p>Trump&#8217;s election team is also attempting to block officials from counting mail-in ballots if a voter forgets to put their vote in a secrecy sleeve within the return envelope.</p>\n<p>\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row \">\n\t\t<div class=\"col three months after moving in.</strong></p>\n\n\n\n<p>The WWE legend and her partner Artem Chigvintsev recently welcomed a baby boy into the world.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12491747\" couple’s first child &#8211; but it seems they still need more space than their current 10,000 square foot house.</p>\n\n\n\n<p><a href=\"http://www.tmz.com/2020/08/22/nikki-bella-lists-dream-arizona-home-brie/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">TMZ</a> claims the 36-year-old designed the £1.5million property herself but has now decided to flog it.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The home has over five bedrooms and bathrooms and has regularly been shown off by the pair on social media.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The recently-renovated kitchen also provides <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/wwe/10667657/wwe-nikki-bella-engagement-artem-chigvintsev/\">plenty of space for Artem</a> to do his daily morning workout.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>It was given a modern makeover in 2019, with grey cabinets and brass handles, patterned tiling on the walls and open shelving.&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>It also has marble worktops while it is filled with all the modern day appliances such as a microwave and a coffee machine.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12491776\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603993685.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491776\" width=\"960\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Instagram</figcredit></figure>The Arizona home is part of a gated community with artificial turf in the garden[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12491789\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603993684.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491789\" width=\"960\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Instagram</figcredit></figure>The property is spread out over 10,000 square feet[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12491809\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 730px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603993691.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=720\" class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Instagram</figcredit></figure>Nikki’s main bedroom includes a walk-in wardrobe[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12491827\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603993678.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491827\" width=\"960\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Instagram</figcredit></figure>The home has over five bedrooms and bathrooms and has regularly been shown off by the pair on social media[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>Fans have also been given a look at the breakfast bar courtesy of Artem’s exercise videos on Instagram, with stylish black and brass bar stools matching the colour scheme.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Meanwhile, Nikki’s main bedroom includes a huge walk-in wardrobe that has rails lining both walls, with floor-to-ceiling shelving and an array of mannequin heads to display an assortment of hats and headpieces.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The home’s living room has high vaulted ceilings with a huge log-burning fireplace, cream sofas and a glass-topped coffee table.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>And the garden has an artificial lawn area that is bordered by plants and shrubs on either side.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>There is also a pool and a built in BBQ.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The property sits in a gated community and is next door to Nikki’s twin sister Brie Bella and her husband <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/daniel-bryan/\">Daniel Bryan</a>’s home.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>And as well as all of the above, it also has three fireplaces with a custom wine/sitting room.</p>\n\n\n\n<hr class=\"wp-block-separator\" />\n\n\n\n<h3><strong><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/12045685/mike-tyson-comeback-roy-jones-jr-anthony-joshua-tyson-fury-conor-mcgregor/\">RINGSIDE NEWS LIVE: .jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn37@2020_1/2020/08/25/11-06-42-775_ea7d8c96a1465dcf.webp","https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/1f642.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx23/cdn1@2020_1/2020/08/25/11-06-45-121_818413be4c4fbce7.webp","https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/1f46f-200d-2640-fe0f.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn22@2020_4/2020/08/25/11-06-42-562_d487abca3850c166.webp","https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/1f48b.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx16/cdn27@2020_1/2020/08/25/11-06-34-813_59cc3d71ebac4aaa.webp","https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/1f923.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx23/cdn75@2020_4/2020/08/25/11-06-33-327_fe91c2ab3f9bd0ba.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/RR-SPORTS-WWE-WOMEN.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn66@2020_5/2020/08/25/11-06-36-957_24d33c658ed4cbd3.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598353584709},{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 19:06:24","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 19:06:24","title":"Slack DOWN – popular work chat app stops working for users around the world in mystery outage","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tech/12492359/slack-down-not-working-offline-2/","description":"<p>SLACK has stopped working for a large number of users around the world.</p> \n<p>A mystery outage appears to be affecting the popular business chat app, which works a little like WhatsApp for workplaces.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12493002\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/slackcomp-1.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12493002\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  Slack\n </figcredit>\n</figure>Slack is a hugely popular business chat app[/caption] \n<h2>Slack down – what’s happened?</h2> \n<p>Thousands of users have already reported issues with Slack to online outage tracker Down Detector.</p> \n<p>And a global outage map suggests the app is affected globally, although primarily in the UK and Western Europe.</p> \n<p>It’s possible that the USA may also be affected once business hours begin there.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12493006\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/Screenshot-2020-08-25-at-11.27.53.png?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12493006\" width=\"960\" height=\"568\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  Down Detector / The Sun\n </figcredit>\n</figure>Down Detector has logged a large number of reports about Slack[/caption] \n<p>Users are reporting issues with connecting to Slack, sending messages and uploading files.</p> \n<p>It’s currently unclear what has caused the outage.</p> \n<h2>Slack not working – what are users saying?</h2> \n<p>Users have flocked to Twitter to complain about their Slack woes.</p> \n<p>One wrote: “Slack is down and I’m completely unproductive all of a sudden.”</p> \n<p>Another said: “Slack is down and I feel completely cut off from everything and everyone.”</p> \n<p>However, some users are still able to send messages.</p> \n<p>One user wrote: “The iron of asking/telling folks that Slack is down on Slack itself is palpable.”</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12493008\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 936px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/Screenshot-2020-08-25-at-11.29.24.png?strip=all&amp;w=926\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12493008\" width=\"926\" height=\"620\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  Down Detector / The Sun\n </figcredit>\n</figure>A global outage map shows where reports are coming from in yellow and red[/caption] \n<h2>Slack offline – is there an official response?</h2> \n<p>Slack has confirmed that there is a problem with the app.</p> \n<p>In a statement sent to The Sun, a Slack representative said: “We’re very sorry for the inconvenience, but Slack is experiencing some difficulties right now.</p> \n<p>‘We’re working hard to resolve the issue as quickly as possible and we’ll update you as soon as we have more information.”</p> \n<p>The official Slack status page confirms that there are problems with connecting, sending messages, and creating posts or uploading files.</p> \n<p>But all other areas of Slack are reported as being operational, including search, calls and log-in.</p> \n<p><em>More to come…</em></p> its file name is DD-BANNER-GOING-BUST-1.jpg\" class=\"alignnone\" />\n\n\n\n<p><strong>AFTER breastfeeding her first son, Biba Tanya, 39 &#8211; who had natural 32 DD boobs &#8211; was unhappy with her lopsided chest, one being a B cup and the other a D. </strong></p>\n\n\n\n<p>Wanting to get her curves back, the mum-of-three then went under the knife and had a boob job to get them back to their original size.&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12320336\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 650px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000528608311.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=640\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12320336\" width=\"640\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Nick Obank - The Sun</figcredit></figure>Biba had her DD implants removed after her PIP implants ruptured [/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>But now, she says it was one of her biggest mistakes.&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Here Biba &#8211; a mum of three and advertising copywriter &#8211; joins Fabulous’ Going Bust series to talk about why going natural has made her feel sexier than ever.&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“Growing up cleavage meant everything to me and after I went through puberty I ended up with 32DD boobs.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;I loved them. I loved the way they bounced, I loved their curves and firmness and their sex appeal but after having my first son, the opinion of my boobs changed dramatically.&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12491798\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 650px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000528608353.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=640\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491798\" width=\"640\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Nick Obank - The Sun</figcredit></figure>Biba now loves her natural boobs [/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12320273\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 342px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000600172048.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=332\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12320273\" width=\"332\" height=\"514\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Biba Tanya</figcredit></figure>Biba when she had her £4000 boob job [/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>“I was 23 when I had my first son Sebastian, now 13. However, after 8 months of breastfeeding him my boobs were left totally out of proportion.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“One breast was a B cup and the other a D cup and for a woman who loved having and flaunting her big boobs this was devastating &#8211; it totally knocked my confidence.&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“So in 2008, at 27, after saving £4000 I had a breast augmentation&#160;in Manchester.&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“My boobs were uplifted and I had implants put in to give them back their 32DD proportions.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“I was over the moon and post-surgery I was brimming with confidence.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12320276\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 672px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000600172049.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=662\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12320276\" width=\"662\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Biba Tanya</figcredit></figure>Biba says her made her confidence soar and she got asked on loads of dates [/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>“I went back to wearing sexy tank tops showing off my new, re-built cleavage and my self-esteem soared.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“I was single at the time and instantly got more dates and attention.&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“In June 2014 I had my second child, Tabitha, now 6. Then,&#160; last year, I had my third child Lola, now two.&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“Like all my kids I breastfed Lola but this time it was different my breasts were incredibly sore, my milk flow was limited and Lola seemed sick after every feed.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“I’d checked with my surgeon when the PIP Breast Implant scandal hit in 2018 and he was adamant my implants were not affected.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12320329\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 650px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000528608493.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=640\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12320329\" width=\"640\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Nick Obank - The Sun</figcredit></figure>Biba&#8217;s boobs are now a A/B cup [/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>“But as the pain persisted and I did some post-birth Googling, I demanded my GP order a scan of my boobs.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“They discovered my left implant has ruptured leaking silicone into my lymph nodes and milk ducts.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“I was terrified and devastated.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“I was petrified I had harmed Lola and devastated I couldn&#8217;t continue breastfeeding and was riddled with guilt that the synthetic chemicals had flowed from me to her but she was thankfully okay.&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t<blockquote class=\"article__quote\">\n\t\t<div class=\"article__quote-copy theme__before-color theme__after-color\">\n\t\t\t<p>They sagged and reminded me of lumpy bags of coal, but I was really surprised because I didn’t hate them at all. </p>\n\t\t\t\t<cite class=\"article__quote-credit theme__copy-color\">\n\t\t\t\t\t<span class=\"quote-credit\">Biba Tanya</span><span class=\"quote-credit-meta\">39</span>\t\t\t\t</cite>\n\t\t\t\t\t</div>\n\t</blockquote>\n\t<!--googleon: all-->\n\t\n\n\n\n<p>“Within a month of the scan I was booked into surgery and had the implants removed on the NHS.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#160;“All the surgeon could do was remove the implants and&#160; scrape out the silicone. No breast reconstruction or new implants were offered.&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“I didn’t even consider implants. I’d never do that to my body again.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“When the bandages finally came off I looked at my chest in the mirror, gone were the perfectly formed boobs. In their place were natural breasts, floppy and loose.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“My boobs were now somewhere between an A and B cup.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“They sagged and reminded me of lumpy bags of coal, but I was really surprised because I didn’t hate them at all.&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“Instead of hating them I had a life altering revelation and I realised I had never needed implants.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“I realised I had allowed myself to be pushed into surgery by social pressures and trends.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“I realised I could have killed myself and my newborn because of the silicone rupture and that was the moment I embraced my new boobs.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“They were the real me, they weren’t plastic or fake and they fed my three beautiful kids.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“Now when I look at my boobs I see a 39 year old mum of three with pretty good knockers.</p>\n\n\n\n\t<div class=\"article-boxout\">\n\t\t<div class=\"article-boxout__header theme__background-color\">\n\t\t\t<h3 class=\"article-boxout__headline\">How to check for breast cancer: The 5 step self exam you can do at home</h3>\n\t\t</div>\n\t\t<div class=\"article-boxout__content theme__background-color-rgba-20\">\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t<div>\n<p>There is a five-step self exam you can do at home to check for any changes.</p>\n<p><strong>1.</strong>&#160;Begin by looking in a mirror, facing it with your arms on your hips and your shoulders straight.</p>\n<p>You should be looking for any dimpling, puckering, bulging skin, redness, soreness, a rash or changes in the nipple.</p>\n<p><strong>2.</strong>&#160;Still looking in the mirror, raise both arms above your head and check for the same changes.</p>\n<p><strong>3.</strong>&#160;With your arms still above your head, check for any fluid coming from the nipples.</p>\n<p>This can include milky, yellow or watery fluid, or blood.</p>\n<p><strong>4.</strong>&#160;While lying down use your opposite hand to check each breast.</p>\n<p>Using a few fingers, keeping them flat and together, go in a small circular motion around your breasts.</p>\n<p>Make sure you feel the entire breast by going top to bottom in these small circles.</p>\n<p>It helps to develop a system or pattern to make sure every inch is covered.</p>\n<p>Use light pressure for the skin and tissue just beneath, medium pressure for the tissue in the middle of your breasts, and firm pressure to feel the tissue at the back, feeling down to your ribcage.</p>\n<p><strong>5.</strong>&#160;Feel your breasts while either standing or sitting, using the same small circular motions.</p>\n</div>\n\t\t</div>\n\t</div>\n\t\n\n\n\n<p>“I listen to my body more now. I eat a completely healthy organic diet and check my own breast regularly for any lumps or soreness.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“Women should learn to love their breasts and self check to ensure they know they&#8217;re healthy. We shouldn’t be scared to self check. You are your breasts first line of self defence.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“My breasts are finally a true and honest representation of me &#8211; not me trying to be something bigger and better than what I am.&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“I hope women considering a boob job will see my pictures and think twice about surgery.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“Go natural and let your body and self confidence shine through.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“You’ll feel more fulfilled than a bag of silicone will ever make you feel.”</p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container Major","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/DD-BANNER-GOING-BUST-1.jpg?strip=all&w=958":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn25@2020_5/2020/08/25/11-06-25-128_2523e0def2581719.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000528608311.jpg?strip=all&w=640":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn97@2020_2/2020/08/25/11-06-39-428_43427edbecc8f769.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000528608353.jpg?strip=all&w=640":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn81@2020_1/2020/08/25/11-06-41-928_0bf82161e17ea8ba.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000600172048.jpg?strip=all&w=332":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn17@2020_2/2020/08/25/11-06-43-388_d8012bc4471799be.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000600172049.jpg?strip=all&w=662":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx23/cdn99@2020_2/2020/08/25/11-06-35-290_670b207b9dfdd2d2.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000528608493.jpg?strip=all&w=640":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn94@2020_5/2020/08/25/11-06-46-213_1df93a3d5e5481e8.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598353584711},{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 19:06:24","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 19:06:24","title":"Who is Jacob Blake and why was he shot in Kenosha?","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12482596/jacob-blake-shot-kenosha/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>RIOTS are continuing to rock Wisconsin after an unarmed black man was shot seven times by a white police officer in front of his children.</p>\n\n\n\n<p><a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/who/jacob-blake/\">Jacob Blake</a>, 29, is said to be fighting for his life in hospital after footage of the <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12481971/wisconsin-white-police-shoot-black-unarmed-man-kids/\">shooting circulated online</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_undefined\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/DD-COMPOSITE-COPS-muz.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=602\" alt=\"Jacob Blake is said to be seriously injured\" class=\"alignnone\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Jacob Blake, 29, was shot in the back SEVEN times by cops</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12485713\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603850243.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12485713\" width=\"960\" height=\"856\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Reuters</figcredit></figure>A man on a bike rides past a city truck on fire outside the Kenosha County Courthouse in Kenosha, Wisconsin[/caption]\n\n\n\n<h2>Who is Jacob Blake?</h2>\n\n\n\n<p>Jacob Blake is a 29 year old black man, who was shot by a white police officer in Kenosha, Wisconsin.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>He was unarmed <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/news/1358071/wisconsin-white-police-shoot-black-unarmed-man-kids/\">and was shot seven times in the back, in front of his children.</a></p>\n\n\n\n<p>A video circulating on social media showed the man walking towards a car followed by two officers and one of them shooting him in front of his kids as he opens the car door.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>He is now fighting for his life in hospital.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12482916\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603775882-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12482916\" width=\"960\" height=\"957\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Twitter/nolimitchrizi</figcredit></figure>Footage shows Blake, in the white shirt, walking away from a cop with his gun drawn[/caption]\n\n\n\n<h2>What happened to him?</h2>\n\n\n\n<p>The shooting happened at about 5pm local time in Kenosha, <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/where/wisconsin/\">Wisconsin</a>, as officers were responding to a &#8220;domestic incident&#8221;.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Witnesses said Blake was trying to break up an argument between women in a home nearby.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Blake was immediately taken to a hospital by the police, according to a statement issued by the Kenosha police department.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_undefined\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/AD-PIC-Child-Muzz.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=703\" alt=\"Jacob Blake was shot in front of his children\" class=\"alignnone\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Jacob Blake was shot in front of his children</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<h2>What has the response been?</h2>\n\n\n\n<p>Wisconsin Governor Tony Evers identified the victim as Jacob Blake in a statement released shortly after the incident occurred. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Evers said Blake was critically injured when he was shot multiple times.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12484745\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603801528.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12484745\" width=\"960\" height=\"550\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>AP:Associated Press</figcredit></figure>Protesters gather near the site of a police shooting in Kenosha, Wisconsin[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>He said: &#8220;Tonight, Jacob Blake was shot in the back multiple times, in broad daylight, in Kenosha, Wisconsin. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;Kathy and I join his family, friends, and neighbours in hoping earnestly that he will not succumb to his injuries. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;While we do not have all of the details yet, what we know for certain is that he is not the first black man or person to have been shot or injured or mercilessly killed at the hands of individuals in law enforcement in our state or our country.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Benjamin Crump, a civil rights attorney who is representing the family of <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/george-floyd/\">George Floyd</a>, a Black man who died at the knee of a fired Minneapolis police officer on Memorial Day, shared a video from the incident on Twitter.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12484755\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603790543-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12484755\" width=\"960\" height=\"905\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Instagram/bmgfamo</figcredit></figure>Riots have broken out in Wisconsin following the shooting[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>He also said Blake&#8217;s three sons were in the car.&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Furious crowds gathered at the scene on Monday and threw bricks and Molotov cocktails at police, according to reports in social media.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Multiple fires were set at the scene by a crowd that gathered to protest against the incident, according to reports.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12482923\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603775884-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12482923\" width=\"960\" height=\"953\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Twitter/nolimitchrizi</figcredit></figure>The officer fired at least seven shots at Blake as he got into the SUV[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12485710\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603851100.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12485710\" width=\"960\" height=\"720\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Reuters</figcredit></figure>A man confronts police outside the Kenosha Police Department in Kenosha, Wisconsin[/caption]\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div 19:06:24","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 19:06:24","title":"Jennifer Garner breaks down in tears after finishing The Office as she says ‘the finale hit us pretty hard’","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/12492895/jennifer-garner-in-tears-finishes-the-office/","description":"<p>JENNIFER Garner was left in floods of tears after completing the entire boxset of The Office. </p>\n<p>The actress, 48, revealed she had been watching an episode a day with her kids since the beginning of quarantine and has just finished it. </p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12492887\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 389px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604010594.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=379\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492887\" width=\"379\" height=\"561\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Instagram</figcredit></figure>Jennifer Garner has filmed herself in tears after finishing all nine seasons of The Office[/caption]</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12492888\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 392px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604010619.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=382\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492888\" width=\"382\" height=\"565\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Instagram</figcredit></figure>The actress has watched an episode a day since quarantine began[/caption]</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12492890\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 408px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604010600.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=398\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492890\" width=\"398\" height=\"543\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Instagram</figcredit></figure>Jennifer said she was &#8216;hit pretty hard&#8217; at the end of the finale show[/caption]</p>\n<p>But after the credits rolled on season nine finale Jennifer found herself being &#8220;hit pretty hard&#8221; by her emotions. </p>\n<p>In an Instagram video, the mother-of-three cried as she explained why she was so upset. </p>\n<p>Wearing a Dunder Mifflin T-shirt in honor of the comedy show, Jennifer sobbed as she said: &#8220;My kids and I have been watching&#8230;&#8221;</p>\n<p>Slowing the footage right down, she continued talking in a slo-mo voiceover-style. </p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12492891\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000572987242-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492891\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Getty Images - Getty</figcredit></figure>The Office originally ran from 2004 to 2013[/caption]</p>\n<p>Laughing, Jennifer could be heard saying: &#8220;You&#8217;ll never guess what show the kids and I have watched an episode a day of throughout quarantine? And guess what? We finished it. And guess what? It gave me some really big feelings.&#8221;</p>\n<p>She added: &#8220;Oh bless her heart. Oh my goodness. Look who needed a big cry and maybe a shower would have been helpful. But it&#8217;s just nice to know you can still, just, feel so much passion about something, right?!</p>\n<p>&#8220;So thank you. If you&#8217;ve ever heard of this show, The Office, you should try it. It&#8217;s wonderful.&#8221;</p>\n<p>Jennifer filmed her video while sat in front of a rainbow sign, which read: &#8220;Thank you, Dunder Mifflin&#8221;. Dunder Mifflin is the name of the paper factory where the sitcom is set.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12492892\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 703px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/30a065c5-bb08-456e-8cce-d4058cd3c8ae.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=693\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492892\" width=\"693\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Rex Features</figcredit></figure>The Office&#8217;s Angela Kinsey and Jenna Fischer have both reached out to Jennifer[/caption]</p>\n<p>She wrote on Instagram: &#8220;My kids and I have spent months piled on the couch working our way through &#8216;How to Behave as Grownups&#8217; <img src=\"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/1f645-1f3fb-200d-2640-fe0f.png\" alt=\"🙅🏻‍♀️\" class=\"wp-smiley\" style=\"height: 1em; max-height: 1em;\" />, aka&#160;#TheOffice.</p>\n<p>&#8220;Apparently we are sensitive people &#8211; the finale hit us pretty hard. </p>\n<p>&#8220;When I realized I’d accidentally shot my farewell testimonial in slo-mo I realized, your Monday might need this, too. <img src=\"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/1f648.png\" alt=\"🙈\" class=\"wp-smiley\" style=\"height: 1em; max-height: 1em;\" /><img src=\"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/1f475-1f3fc.png\" alt=\"👵🏼\" class=\"wp-smiley\" style=\"height: 1em; max-height: 1em;\" /><img src=\"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/1f62c.png\" alt=\"😬\" class=\"wp-smiley\" style=\"height: 1em; max-height: 1em;\" /><img src=\"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/2665.png\" alt=\"♥\" class=\"wp-smiley\" style=\"height: 1em; max-height: 1em;\" /><img src=\"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/2665.png\" alt=\"♥\" class=\"wp-smiley\" style=\"height: 1em; max-height: 1em;\" /><img src=\"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/2665.png\" alt=\"♥\" class=\"wp-smiley\" style=\"height: 1em; max-height: 1em;\" /> #thankyoucastandcrew #pleasecomeoverweloveyou #icantwithfinales.&#8221;</p>\n<p>Since posting the clip online, both The Office&#8217;s Angela Kinsey and Jenna Fischer have got in touch. </p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12492894\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000572987176-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492894\" width=\"960\" height=\"704\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Getty Images - Getty</figcredit></figure>The sitcom received 47 Primetime Emmy Award nominations during its run[/caption]</p>\n<p>Angela, who played Angela Martin in the sitcom, wrote: &#8220;Omg!!&#160;@jennifer.garner!&#160;I am only just seeing this (we had no air conditioning for the day so long story short but I’m only just catching up on things)!! I love this. </p>\n<p>&#8220;I love you and your family and just so you know the finale makes me bawl my eyes out too! <img src=\"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/1f618.png\" alt=\"😘\" class=\"wp-smiley\" style=\"height: 1em; max-height: 1em;\" /><img src=\"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/2764.png\" alt=\"❤\" class=\"wp-smiley\" style=\"height: 1em; max-height: 1em;\" /> <img src=\"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/1f917.png\" alt=\"🤗\" class=\"wp-smiley\" style=\"height: 1em; max-height: 1em;\" />.&#8221;</p>\n<p>Jenna, who starred as Pam Beesly, then offered to binge watch all nine seasons&#8217; again with Jennifer and Angela.</p>\n<p>She said: &#8220;Oh Lady!! This is the sweetest and most wonderful post!! </p>\n<p>\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row \">\n\t\t<div class=\"col -->\n\t<!--googleon: all-->\n\t</p>\n<p>&#8220;Sending you lots of love and if you want to start over&#160;@angelakinsey&#160;and I are re-watching for the podcast. We are in the middle of Season 3 and have major feelings about lots of moments (Art Show, Dwight comforting Pam&#8230;<img src=\"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/1f62d.png\" alt=\"😭\" class=\"wp-smiley\" style=\"height: 1em; max-height: 1em;\" />)</p>\n<p>The Office originally aired on NBC from 2004 to 2013. During its run, the sitcom received 42 Primetime Emmy nominations and five wins.  </p>\n<p>Steve Carrell, who starred Michael Scott &#8211; the Regional Manager of the Scranton branch of Dunder Mifflin &#8211; won a&#160;Golden Globe Award for Best Actor in a Television Comedy or Musical&#160;in 2006.</p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Tue, 25 Aug 2020 10:38:12 19:06:24","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 19:06:24","title":"Harry Maguire Mykonos brawl ‘sparked when Albanians injected sister Daisy causing her to faint’","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/12492905/harry-maguire-sister-injected-mykonos-albanians-brawl/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>HARRY Maguire&#8217;s sister was injected by two Albanians in Mykonos causing her to faint, a court heard today.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The Utd captain, 27, was arrested along with brother Joe and pal Chris Sharman on Thursday morning after a fight then erupted in the street.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12470874\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 773px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603434231.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=763\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12470874\" width=\"763\" height=\"778\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Instagram / HarryMaguire</figcredit></figure>Harry Maguire reportedly brawled with Brits after his sister Daisy was injected[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_undefined\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603457487-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=640\" alt=\"Maguire was held in a cell for two nights after a brawl in Mykonos\" class=\"alignnone\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">The footballer&#8217;s trial is underway</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_undefined\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000421273847.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=640\" alt=\"Joe Maguire, centre with Harry right and brother Laurence left, has also been charged \" class=\"alignnone\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Joe Maguire, centre with Harry right and brother Laurence left, has also been charged</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<p>His trial in Syros heard today how Maguire&#8217;s younger sister Daisy was injected in the arm by Albanian men, which caused her to faint.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Maguire immediately rushed to her defence and told his waiting minibus driver to take them to a hospital as the Albanians fled, it was said.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>But their driver instead took the group to a police station where officers allegedly kicked Maguire on the leg and told him: &#8220;Your career is over&#8221;.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The court heard how once at the police station, Maguire said: &#8220;Do you know who I am? I am the captain of Manchester United, I am very rich, I can give you money, I can pay you, please let us go”.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12490987\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 365px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603970086.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=355\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12490987\" width=\"355\" height=\"406\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Instagram</figcredit></figure>Chris Sharman, left, with Joe, right and Laurence Maguire, centre, is also going on trial[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>One of his group also allegedly yelled &#8220;f**k, f**k the police&#8221; before punching an officer.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Maguire&#8217;s top human rights lawyer Alexis Anagnostakis told the trial in Syros today how the defender was &#8220;attacked by an Albanian group&#8221;.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The three Brits claim they have video shot from outside Mykonos police station showing how the police &#8220;mistreated&#8221; them.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The lawyer added: &#8220;My clients did not beat anyone, accost anyone, or injure anyone.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The trial was delayed this morning when Maguire&#8217;s legal team unsuccessfully asked for a postponement three times.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12492021\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604007449.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492021\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Nick Obank - The Sun</figcredit></figure>Harry&#8217;s dad Alan is in court in Syros today[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>Dad Alan has travelled to the court on the Greek island of Syros today to support his sons.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>But none of the defendants &#8211; including Maguire &#8211; are in court today and are instead being represented by their legal team.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Utd captain <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/harry-maguire/\">Maguire</a>, 27, footballer brother Joe, 28, and pal Chris Sharman are all charged with assault and violence against an officer.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The brothers are further charged with attempted bribery, while Maguire and Chris are accused of verbal assault.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>They deny the charges.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The bribery charges carry a maximum sentence of up to five years in jail and a fine.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>But the group are able to appeal the decision in a higher court if they are found guilty today.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12486846\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603822108.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12486846\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Splash News</figcredit></figure>Daisy Maguire has returned to Britain [/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12486838\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 417px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603824910.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=407\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12486838\" width=\"407\" height=\"400\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Splash News</figcredit></figure>She was reportedly stabbed in the arm [/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>They had been partying in a swanky nightclub in <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/where/mykonos/\">Mykonos </a>when sister Daisy was approached by a group of Albanian men.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>But she was allegedly stabbed in the arm with a metal straw when she spurned the advances of the “gangster types”.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The jab drew blood and caused her to faint &#8211; with big brother&#160;<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/harry-maguire/\">Harry&#160;</a>stepping in to defend her when a fight broke out.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>A source said: “Harry saw what was happening and remonstrated with them and things got heated.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“He decided to try to get out of there and wanted to hail a taxi. But he ended up arguing with some undercover police officers and ended up at the local police station.”</p>\n\n\n\n<p>When plain-clothed police came to break it up, the <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/manchester-united/\">Utd </a>captain was allegedly &#8220;verbally abusive to an officer and then hit him&#8221;.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/6726424/harry-maguire-fern-hawkins-fiancee-children-man-utd/\">£85million centre-back</a> was arrested with Joe and Chris after a fight outside a bar on the Greek island in the early hours of Friday morning.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12464482\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 551px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603268522.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=541\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12464482\" width=\"541\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Daisy had posted a video of the star hours before the drama at Bonbonniere bar</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12464483\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 551px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603268519.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=541\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12464483\" width=\"541\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">It was uploaded 18 hours ago before the bust-up</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<p>He spent two nights in a cell with Joe and Chris before appearing before a court on Saturday in Syros.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Maguire is now understood to have travelled back to the UK.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>His sister Daisy was yesterday pictured arriving back in England wheeling a suitcase.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Brother Laurence Maguire was also pictured at the home in England as his brothers Harry and Joe await their fate in a Greek court.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Sheffield-born Maguire became the world&#8217;s most expensive defender when he signed for Utd from Leicester City for £85million in August last year.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>He was named captain in January this year following Ashley Young&#8217;s departure to Inter Milan.</p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row \">\n\t\t<div class=\"col sun-col-6\">\n\n\t\t\t<div -->\n\t<!--googleon: all-->\n\t\n\n\n\n<p>He is next due to play at Old Trafford for their first game of the season on September 19 against Crystal Palace.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Maguire has made 26 appearances for England and was a key part of the team&#8217;s journey to the World Cup semi-finals in 2018.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>But the legal action <a Christodoulou","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603434231.jpg?strip=all&w=763":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn9@2020_3/2020/08/25/11-06-26-260_1e0dfcf5046f1560.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603457487-1.jpg?strip=all&w=640":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn51@2020_1/2020/08/25/11-06-30-539_0ac52189417f2df9.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000421273847.jpg?strip=all&w=640":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn85@2020_3/2020/08/25/11-06-41-089_00b199e31665910f.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603970086.jpg?strip=all&w=355":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn35@2020_3/2020/08/25/11-06-29-625_ec20afd5a9547fa2.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604007449.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn99@2020_6/2020/08/25/11-06-29-383_0bfc49b34b25059f.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603822108.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn13@2020_1/2020/08/25/11-06-45-552_489de23c4517fa75.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603824910.jpg?strip=all&w=407":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx13/cdn48@2020_4/2020/08/25/11-06-31-572_a472ae712e4dcc7c.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603268522.jpg?strip=all&w=541":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn14@2020_4/2020/08/25/11-06-36-341_e432f52f53ad556f.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603268519.jpg?strip=all&w=541":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn74@2020_3/2020/08/25/11-06-41-887_4422b0e062cf1c5d.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000578229277.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn47@2020_5/2020/08/25/11-06-36-737_7e2758cf12b44ada.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598353584664},{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 19:06:24","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 19:06:24","title":"‘Nintendo Switch 2’ coming in 2021 with 4K graphics to take on PS5 and Xbox Series X","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tech/12491062/nintendo-switch-2-2021-4k-ps5-xbox-series-x/","description":"<p>NINTENDO is plotting to launch a new version of its smash hit Switch console in 2021 that supports 4K graphics, according to reports.</p> \n<p>The Japanese gaming giant also plans to release a slew of new games next year to help it compete with the new PlayStation and Xbox consoles.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12491509\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603984567.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491509\" width=\"960\" height=\"573\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  Getty Images - Getty\n </figcredit>\n</figure>The Nintendo Switch is getting a major upgrade, according to reports[/caption] \n<p>Microsoft’s Xbox Series X and Sony’s PlayStation 5 are both confirmed for release <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tech/12320467/ps5-vs-xbox-series-x-specs-performance-price-games-design/\">ahead of Christmas 2020</a>.</p> \n<p>Nintendo hasn’t launched a new flagship console since the Switch came out in 2017 – but has a major upgrade in the works, according to <a href=\"https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2020-08-25/nintendo-plans-upgraded-switch-console-and-major-games-for-2021\">Bloomberg</a>.</p> \n<p>Like the PS5 and Series X, the new Switch will support 4K gaming, unnamed insiders told the tech site.</p> \n<p>That means more pixels than a standard Switch – or indeed any current-gen console – can manage, offering gorgeous high-resolution graphics.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_11843462\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Screenshot-2020-06-11-at-22.12.04.png?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11843462\" width=\"960\" height=\"539\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">\n  Sony’s PS5 console will hit shelves in time for Christmas\n </figcaption>\n <figcredit></figcredit>\n</figure> \n<p>Bloomberg also reports that a “slew of games from Nintendo itself and related outside studios”&nbsp;are coming next year.</p> \n<p>If an upgraded Switch console is in the works, it’s safe to assume that a handful of those new games will support 4K resolution.</p> \n<p>The report does not provide an exact release date for the rumoured console, nor does it hint at how much the high-powered machine will cost.</p> \n<p>The Sun has reached out to Nintendo for comment.</p> \n<div class=\"article-boxout\"> \n <div class=\"article-boxout__header theme__background-color\"> \n  <h3 class=\"article-boxout__headline\">What is 4K, Ultra HD and UHD?</h3> \n </div> \n <div class=\"article-boxout__content theme__background-color-rgba-20\"> \n  <p class=\"article__content--intro\"> Here's an easy guide to what 4K means... </p> \n  <div> \n   <ul> \n    <li>4K, Ultra HD and UHD are all different names for the same type of TV screen. 4K refers to the number of pixels on your TV screen – or the “image resolution”</li> \n    <li>The pixels are the tiny dots of colour that make up the image you see on your telly. A pixellated image is one where the pixels are really obvious, because there aren’t many. But images with lots of pixels – like a 4K movie – generally look sharper and clearer</li> \n    <li>A true 4K screen has 4096 x 2160 pixels. That means on your TV screen there are 3840 pixels across, and 2160 pixels vertically. That’s roughly 8.3 million pixels on the display in total</li> \n    <li>4K gets it’s name because it’s got four times the number of pixels as a standard Full HD TV</li> \n    <li>Full HD (or 1080p) screens have 1920 pixels across, and 1080 pixels going upwards – for around two million pixels in total. So 4K just means your TV has many more pixels on the screen compared to a more common Full HD display</li> \n    <li>Ultra HD, or UHD, is basically the same as 4K. If you buy a UHD telly in a shop, you’ll be able to watch 4K content on it with no bother</li> \n    <li>But there is a small difference. Almost every TV you ever buy has an aspect ratio of 16:9. That means for every 16 pixels horizontally, there are 9 vertically</li> \n    <li>True 4K footage doesn’t quite fit in with that ratio, so you won’t often find TVs with 4096 x 2160 pixels. Instead, to fit with the 16:9 ratio, most 4K TVs will have 3840 x 2160 pixels instead</li> \n    <li>If it doesn’t make sense, grab a calculator and divide 2160 by 9. Then multiply it by 16, and you’ll get 3840. That’s the aspect ratio working its magic. So when you see an Ultra HD TV, it just means it’s a 4K image with slightly fewer vertical pixels</li> \n    <li>If you try watching a 4K video on a non-4K TV, the video will still play – but it won’t be in 4K quality. To watch a 4K video in 4K quality, you’ll need to fork out for a 4K TV. Similarly, if you’re watching standard or HD footage on a 4K TV, it won’t magically become 4K quality</li> \n    <li>Some TVs promise “4K upscaling”, which converts your standard or HD footage to near-4K quality. This works by using software to guess what colours would fill the extra empty pixels missing in HD footage, and then filling them in. This creates a 4K-like effect, but it’s not true 4K</li> \n   </ul> \n  </div> \n </div> \n</div> \n<p>It wouldn’t be the first time Nintendo has released an upgrade for its chart-topping console.</p> \n<p>Last year, a refreshed edition of the Switch with better battery life was launched across the globe.</p> \n<p>Nintendo also released the Switch Lite in 2019, a cheaper, handheld-only version of the console that ditched the TV dock.</p> \n<p>The firm has shipped more than 60million Switch consoles worldwide but will be looking to freshen it following the release of the Series X and PS5.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_11850605\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 654px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/image-23.jpeg?strip=all&amp;w=644\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11850605\" width=\"644\" height=\"362\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">\n  The Xbox Series X has a tall, boxy design that’s markedly different from previous models\n </figcaption>\n <figcredit></figcredit>\n</figure> \n<p>Sony announced the PS5 last year and has set a tentative “Holidays 2020” release date for the console.</p> \n<p>Loading up a game on the PlayStation 5 will be ten times faster than on PS4, according to the tech titan.</p> \n<p>The Series X will realse around the same time and apparently runs games at 4K resolution – double that of HD – with the possibility of running 8K.</p> \n<p>It will also process games faster so as to “eliminate” loading times. A new Halo title will launch with the console.</p> \n<p>Estimates place the price of each console somewhere around £500.</p> \n<!-- Start of Brightcove Player --> \n<div style=\"display: block; position: relative; min-width: 0px; max-width: 640px;\"> \n <div style=\"padding-top: 56%; \"> \n  <video data-video-id=\"6063145892001\" data-account=\"5067014667001\" data-player=\"default\" data-usage=\"cms:wordpress:5.4.2:1.7.0:javascript\" data-embed=\"default\" class=\"video-js\" controls=\"\" style=\"width: 100%; height: 100%; position: absolute; top: 0; bottom: 0; right: 0; left: 0;\"> \n  </video> \n  <script src=\"https://players.brightcove.net/5067014667001/default_default/index.min.js\"></script> \n </div> \n</div> \n<!-- End of Brightcove Player --> \n<!--googleoff: </div>\n <!-- .sun-row .{row} .rail-video-index--> \n</div> \n<!-- .sun-grid-container .sun-grid-container--{color} --> \n<!--googleon: all--> \n<p>In other news, a geeky dad built a <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tech/10853996/giant-nintendo-switch-dad-son/\">giant, working Nintendo Switch</a> for his seven-year-old son earlier this year.</p> \n<p>Nintendo recently unveiled the brand new&nbsp;<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tech/9478244/nintendo-switch-lite-release-date-price-specs-uk/\">Switch Lite console</a>, a smaller, cheaper and more portable alternative.</p> \n<p>Read our guide to the very&nbsp;<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tech/7192732/best-new-nintendo-switch-games-broken-sword-5-download-buy-review/\">best Nintendo Switch games</a>.</p> \n<p>Are you excited for a new Switch? Let us know in the comments!</p> \n<hr class=\"wp-block-separator\" /> \n<p><strong>We pay for your stories! Do you have a story for The Sun Online Tech &amp; Science team?
