as he defended blocking her on Twitter.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/carol-mcgiffin/\">Loose Women star</a> found herself shut out of  her ITV co-star&#8217;s posts after calling his stance on the coronavirus crisis &#8220;hysterical bulls**t&#8221;.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12491541\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 698px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000575724277-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=688\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491541\" width=\"688\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Rex Features</figcredit></figure>Piers Morgan accused the Loose Women star of sharing &#8216;conspiracy crap&#8217;[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>And last night the 60-year-old attacked the Good Morning Britain star again, during an appearance on Kevin O&#8217;Sullivan&#8217;s <a href=\"https://talkradio.co.uk/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noreferrer noopener\">TalkRADIO show</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>She said: &#8220;He&#8217;s got a book out about free speech. The blurb on it is basically saying people can&#8217;t debate anymore and they just shut people down.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;I&#8217;m thinking: Hang on &#8211; here&#8217;s the blocker who&#8217;s shutting people down because he doesn&#8217;t want to hear what I&#8217;ve got to say to him. The hypocrisy is absolutely breathtaking.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Carol added: &#8220;I&#8217;m going to show people show people how intolerant he&#8217;s become of any kind of dissent, especially when it comes to this virus.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12491614\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/a2f96ff1-098a-4100-9887-7e511207e7e1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491614\" width=\"960\" height=\"482\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Carol attacked the Good Morning Britain host again on TalkRADIO last night</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12491650\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 945px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/5c41375c-764e-44fc-9a29-01809a7b8aeb.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=935\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491650\" width=\"935\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Rex Features</figcredit></figure>She accused Piers of being &#8216;intolerant&#8217; of any dissent over coronavirus rules[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>But Piers tweeted the clip of her interview, writing: &#8220;Oh Carol, it’s got nothing to do with curbing your free speech.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;I don’t want to stop you talking your mindless covid conspiracy theory crap &#8211; I just prefer not to endure hearing it.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Referring to the former sports presenter turned conspiracy theorist, he added: &#8220;I blocked David Icke for the same reason.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Things first <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/12469633/loose-women-carol-mcgiffin-piers-morgan-blocked-twitter/\">kicked off between Piers and Carol last week</a> when he tweeted: &#8220;To everyone on here deluding themselves that Covid is ‘over’, take a look at Spain’s case &#38; death rate in the past week.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12491806\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 608px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/2ce8cff3-a263-45df-8314-fcc9ae16b530.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=598\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491806\" width=\"598\" height=\"281\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Piers said he just didn&#8217;t want to listen to Carol&#8217;s theories</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12491799\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 900px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/02b3af41-1408-4cd4-9591-494cc3e94232.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=890\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491799\" +0000","feedId":10019,"bgimg":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000575724277-1.jpg?strip=all&w=688","linkMd5":"cd16e6f236b2a682aba09409ca283537","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx30/cdn37@2020_4/2020/08/25/11-06-26-364_2995db0737d33cec.webp","destWidth":688,"destHeight":960,"sourceBytes":119706,"destBytes":119706,"author":"Jamie Downham","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000575724277-1.jpg?strip=all&w=688":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx30/cdn37@2020_4/2020/08/25/11-06-26-364_2995db0737d33cec.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/a2f96ff1-098a-4100-9887-7e511207e7e1.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn87@2020_5/2020/08/25/11-06-33-819_f9f5c06c5959e5a3.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/5c41375c-764e-44fc-9a29-01809a7b8aeb.jpg?strip=all&w=935":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn18@2020_1/2020/08/25/11-06-46-231_a32f601329424481.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/2ce8cff3-a263-45df-8314-fcc9ae16b530.jpg?strip=all&w=598":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn75@2020_6/2020/08/25/11-06-32-928_5bcddc2352926906.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/02b3af41-1408-4cd4-9591-494cc3e94232.jpg?strip=all&w=890":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn34@2020_6/2020/08/25/11-06-41-524_d97f2ebafad181c8.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598353584706},{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 19:06:24","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 19:06:24","title":"Self-employed second grant: How to claim, deadline and eligibility explained","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/12416146/self-employed-grant-coronavirus-claim-deadline-eligibility/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p><strong>SELF-employed workers can now apply for a second emergency coronavirus grant worth up to £6,570. </strong></p>\n\n\n\n<p>The cash is to help those who work for themselves if their income has been negatively impacted by the effect of the <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/coronavirus/\">pandemic</a>. </p>\n\n\n\n<p><strong><img src=\"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/26a0.png\" alt=\"⚠\" class=\"wp-smiley\" style=\"height: 1em; max-height: 1em;\" /> Read our <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12383728/coronavirus-uk-news-deaths-live-latest-schools/\">coronavirus live blog</a> for the latest news &#38; updates</strong></p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12416437\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000577746139.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12416437\" width=\"960\" height=\"577\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Getty Images - Getty</figcredit></figure>The total you can claim is capped at £6,750 for help over three months[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>The second grant opened for applications on August 17, 2020, but you can still apply now.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>If you&#8217;re eligible, you&#8217;ll need to make a claim by 19 October, 2020.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Here&#8217;s what you need to know:</p>\n\n\n\n<h2>What is the grant?</h2>\n\n\n\n<p>Under the <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/11261513/self-employed-coronavirus-help-rishi-sunak/\">self-employed income support scheme (SEISS)</a>, the government will cover up to 70 per cent of your trading profits over three months. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>It&#8217;s capped at £2,190 a month so the maximum you will be able to claim in total is £6,750. </p>\n\n\n\n\t<div class=\"article-boxout\">\n\t\t<div class=\"article-boxout__header theme__background-color\">\n\t\t\t<h3 class=\"article-boxout__headline\">What other help is there for self-employed workers?</h3>\n\t\t</div>\n\t\t<div class=\"article-boxout__content theme__background-color-rgba-20\">\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<p class=\"article__content--intro\">\n\t\t\t\t\tTHE government has also introduced the following measures to help self-employed workers and businesses during the coronavirus outbreak:\t\t\t\t</p>\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t<div>\n<p><strong>Income-tax deferrals</strong>: Self-assessment income tax payments, that were due in July, can be deferred to the end of January next year.</p>\n<p><strong>Rent support:</strong>&#160;Businesses who are struggling to pay their rents are protected from eviction until the end of June.</p>\n<p><strong>Coronavirus business interruption loan scheme:</strong>&#160;SMEs can get&#160;loans and overdrafts of up to £5million&#160;for up to six years and the government will guarantee up to 80 per of these.</p>\n<p><strong>Grants of up to £10,000:</strong>&#160;Small firms can get&#160;grants of up to £10,000&#160;to help with ongoing business costs.</p>\n<p><strong>VAT payments:&#160;</strong>VAT payments can be deferred&#160;for three months.</p>\n<p><strong>Tax bill help:&#160;</strong>SMEs that cannot afford their tax bills can ask HMRC for a “time to pay” arrangement so any debt collection is suspended.</p>\n<p><strong>Business rates holiday:&#160;</strong>A 12-month&#160;business rates holiday&#160;has been introduced for many businesses.</p>\n</div>\n\t\t</div>\n\t</div>\n\t\n\n\n\n<p>The idea is to give businesses some breathing space if they are operating fine now, but start to struggle later on in the year, say in September, when they may be able to still apply for the grant.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>You don&#8217;t have to repay the grant if you’re eligible, but it will be subject to income tax and&#160;<a href=\"https://www.gov.uk/self-employed-national-insurance-rates\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">self-employed national insurance</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>This is the second grant launched for self-employed people. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>The first three-month grant was available until July 13 and it&#8217;s been assumed that it covered three months&#8217; worth of loss of earnings in March, April and May. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>It paid a larger <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/11678104/self-employed-workers-seiss-bank-accounts/\">80 per cent</a> of earnings, with the total paid capped at a higher £7,500. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>But this <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/11885052/self-employed-grant-business-help/\">loophole in when the second grant launches means that loss of earnings</a> in June and half of July is not covered by the government support. </p>\n\n\n\n<h2>Am I eligible to claim? </h2>\n\n\n\n<p>In order to claim the second payout, self-employed workers have to <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/11885052/self-employed-grant-business-help/\">prove they have been adversely affected</a> by coronavirus on or after July 14, 2020. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>To be eligible, you also must have filed a tax return for 2018/19, meaning you must have been self-employed before April 6, 2019.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The grants are calculated based on an average of your profits over three tax years &#8211; 2016/17, 2017/18 and 2018/19. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>If you didn&#8217;t trade in 2016/17, then it will be based on your average profits in 2017/18 and 2018/19, or in 2018/19 if that&#8217;s the only year you traded. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>You must also earn more than half of your total income from self-employment and your trading profit must be less than £50,000 a year to qualify.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Self-employed workers who are company directors or run their businesses as limited companies <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/11625195/self-employed-workers-missing-out-grant/\">cannot apply</a>. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>But if you claim maternity allowance this will not affect your eligibility for the grant.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>You can be eligible for the second grant regardless of whether or not you claimed the first payment. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>But there are growing fears that some businesses will miss out on the second grant if they can&#8217;t prove their work has been disrupted after mid-July &#8211; even if they&#8217;re already struggling.</p>\n\n\n\n<h2>How do I claim? </h2>\n\n\n\n<p>You can make your claim via the <a href=\"https://www.gov.uk/guidance/claim-a-grant-through-the-self-employment-income-support-scheme\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">Gov.uk website</a>. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Self-employed workers will need the following info to claim:</p>\n\n\n\n<ul><li>Self-assessment unique taxpayer reference (UTR) – if you do not have this&#160;<a href=\"https://www.gov.uk/find-lost-utr-number\">find out how to get your lost&#160;<abbr title=\"Unique Taxpayer Reference\">UTR</abbr></a></li><li>National insurance number – if you do not have this&#160;<a href=\"https://www.gov.uk/lost-national-insurance-number\">find out how to get your lost national insurance number</a></li><li>Government Gateway user ID and password – if you do not have a user ID, you can create one when you make your claim</li><li>UK bank details (only provide bank account details where a Bacs payment can be accepted).</li></ul>\n\n\n\n<h2>What is the deadline to claim?</h2>\n\n\n\n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/11726224/self-employed-grant-extended-furlough-october/\">You have until October 19, 2020 to apply</a> for the second SEISS grant. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Grants will then be paid into your bank account in the next six working days.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The first grant has already closed so you can no longer apply. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Self-employed workers who are struggling can receive the pay out as well as <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/2247842/universal-credit-uk-claim-payment-eligibility-benefit/\">claim Universal Credit</a>, but it will be classed as income and may affect how much benefits you receive. </p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row \">\n\t\t<div class=\"col sun-col-6\">\n\n\t\t\t<div class=\"rail rail--classic  rail--trending theme-money\" data-slide-count=\"4\" data-slide-count-tablet=\"4\">\t\t\t\t<div class=\"rail__item-content\">\n\t\t\t\t\t<h3 class=\"rail__item-headline theme__copy-color\">\n\t\t\t\tMUNCH TIME\t\t\t</h3>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<span class=\"rail__item-sub\">\n\t\t\t\tAll the places taking part in Eat Out to Help Out as the scheme draws to an end\t\t\t</span>\n\t\t\t</div><!-- .rail__item-content -->\n\t<div class=\"rail__item-gradient-light\">\n\n\t</div>\n\t<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/12243260/eat-out-to-help-out-restaurants-scheme-chains-list/\" class=\"rail__item-anchor\"></a>\n\n</div><!-- .rail__item .swiper-slide -->\n\t\t\t\t\t</div><!-- .swiper-wrapper -->\n\n\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"swiper-button-prev theme__background-color-rgba-80\"></div>\n\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"swiper-button-next theme__background-color-rgba-80\"></div>\n\n\t\t\t\t</div><!-- .swiper-container -->\n\t\t\t</div><!-- .rail .{rail} .swiper-video-rail .{theme-slug} -->\n\n\t\t</div><!-- .col .sun-col-6 -->\n\t</div><!-- .sun-row .{row} .rail-video-index-->\n\t</div> <!-- .sun-grid-container .sun-grid-container--{color} -->\n\t<!--googleon: all-->\n\t\n\n\n\n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/12422360/self-employment-grant-scheme-confusion-applications-delayed/\">Thousands of self-employed workers were left confused</a> over exactly when they can apply for a second coronavirus cash payment.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>New rules mean <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/12482216/new-rules-self-employed-coronavirus-grants-eligible/\">self-employed workers excluded from coronavirus grants  may now be eligible</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Meet the <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/11729666/small-business-coronavirus-set-up/\">entrepreneurs who’ve set up their own businesses</a> after coronavirus left them jobless.</p>\n\n\n\n\t\t<!-- Start of Brightcove Player -->\n\n\t\t\t\t\t<div style=\"display: block; position: relative; min-width: 0px; home’","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12492049/woman-30s-dragged-alleyway-sexually-attacked-followed/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>POLICE are hunting two men who dragged a woman into an alleyway before subjecting her to a harrowing sex attack.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The victim, who is in her 30s, hid in a garden to try and escape the <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/crime/\">predators</a> after she was targeted in the early hours of Sunday morning.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12492096\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603986340.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image who is in her 30s, attempted to hide from the thugs in a garden[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12492090\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img the area after the shocking attack[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>Officers say the woman was walking home when she spotted the two men following her.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>She hid in a garden in a bid to avoid them &#8211; but the pair of thugs grabbed her and dragged her into an alleyway near Windmill Avenue, Kettering, Northants.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>She was sexually assaulted by both men before they made their escape following the sickening attack at around 1am.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Northamptonshire Police have now launched an investigation and urged anyone with information to get in touch.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>A force spokesman described the suspects as male with both being black or mixed race.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>They said both were about 5ft 9in tall and of a stocky build and wearing all dark clothing. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>One was wearing black trainers, while the other had black and white trainers on.</p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container +0000","feedId":10019,"bgimg":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603986340.jpg?strip=all&w=960","linkMd5":"1f4e7eb3a019629d91060c5443425f62","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx2/cdn41@2020_5/2020/08/25/11-06-25-208_54854fe9328524c8.webp","destWidth":960,"destHeight":640,"sourceBytes":118682,"destBytes":118682,"author":"Alex Winter","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603986340.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx2/cdn41@2020_5/2020/08/25/11-06-25-208_54854fe9328524c8.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603986361.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn11@2020_1/2020/08/25/11-06-32-847_9e022c5dec27a5b7.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603986354.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn79@2020_1/2020/08/25/11-06-29-350_1b974f5a43e6b108.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598353584728},{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 19:06:24","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 19:06:24","title":"How old is Sean Connery now and where does he live?","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/12491224/sean-connery-age-wife-children-films-net-worth/","description":"<p>SCOTTISH icon Sean Connery is the first Bond, and for many, the best Bond.</p> \n<p>The suave superstar is turning 90. Although he is known predominantly for his 007 role, Sir Sean’s is a prolific actor. </p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12492139\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 778px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603842764.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=768\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492139\" width=\"768\" height=\"960\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  Alamy\n </figcredit>\n</figure>Sean Connery is turning 90 this year[/caption] \n<h2>How old is Sean Connery now?</h2> \n<p>Sean Connery is turning 90 on August 25, 2020.</p> \n<p><strong>The Scottish Superstar retired from acting in 2006, and from public life entirely in 2011.</strong></p> \n<p>Born in 1930, Sean was the son of Joe, a truck driver, and Euphamia, a laundress. </p> \n<p>His stellar career has earned him accolades such as “The Greatest Living Scot” and “Scotland’s Greatest Living National Treasure.” </p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12492142\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 778px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603840445.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=768\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492142\" width=\"768\" height=\"576\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  The Mega Agency\n </figcredit>\n</figure>His stellar career has earned him the accolades ‘Greatest Living Scot’[/caption] \n<p>Not to mention in 1999, People magazine declared Sir Sean the “Sexiest Man of the Century.”</p> \n<p>In 2000, Connery was officially knighted in 2000.</p> \n<h2>Where does he live now?</h2> \n<p>Sean owns several homes in Scotland as well as Spain but his permanent residence is&nbsp;on New Providence Island in the Bahamas.</p> \n<p>The star previously lived in Marbella.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12492146\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 646px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000601380373.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=636\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492146\" width=\"636\" height=\"918\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  Jeff Rayner/Coleman-Rayner\n </figcredit>\n</figure>Sean’s permanent residence is&nbsp;on New Providence Island in the Bahamas[/caption] \n<p>In September 2019, Sean revealed he was “lucky” to survive after <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/9875569/hurricane-dorian-sean-connery-lucky-survive-bahamas-mansion/\">his Bahamas mansion escaped the worst of Hurricane Dorian.</a></p> \n<p>The Bond star was at his home in the plush Lyford Cay neighbourhood on New Providence Island when Dorian struck.</p> \n<p>Sir Sean said: “We are both fine. We were lucky compared to many others and the damage here was not great.</p> \n<p>“We had been prepared for the storm, everything was ready in advance – we weren’t taking any chances and knew what to do.”</p> \n<h2>What was his last film and what movies has he starred in?</h2> \n<p>Connery’s final film was&nbsp;The League of Extraordinary Gentlemen&nbsp;in 2003.</p> \n<p>Connery skyrocketed to fame as the suave 007 in six <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/12153725/james-bond-movies-007-release-chronological-order/\">Bond movies</a> in the Sixties. <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/5825134/james-bond-actors-order-sean-connery-daniel-craig/\">He was the first actor to play the MI6 agent </a>on the big screen.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12492202\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 624px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/a21c20ec-2a0b-40e6-a0ba-849e40f30b18.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=614\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492202\" width=\"614\" height=\"960\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  Rex Features\n </figcredit>\n</figure>Sean Connery pictured in his sixth James Bond film ‘Diamonds Are Forever’[/caption] \n<p>He starred in Dr. No (1962), Goldfinger (1964), From Russia, With Love (1964), Thunderball (1965), and You Only Live Twice (1967), and Diamonds are Forever (1971).</p> \n<p>Although <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/12357679/sean-connery-best-james-bond-poll/\">he is the best Bond in the eyes of many</a>, Connery had a love-hate relationship with the role.</p> \n<p>“I have always hated that damned James Bond,” he once famously said. “I’d like to kill him.”</p> \n<p>Fleming and Connery famously did not get along.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12492182\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 663px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000600921402.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=653\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492182\" width=\"653\" height=\"960\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  PA:Press Association\n </figcredit>\n</figure>Connery had a love-hate relationship with his 007 role[/caption] \n<p>Connery said: “I never got introduced to Fleming until I was well into the movie but I know he was not happy with me as the choice.</p> \n<p>“What was it he called me, or told somebody? That I was an over-developed stunt man. He never said it to me. When I did eventually meet him he was very interesting, erudite and a snob – a real snob.”</p> \n<p>Here is a complete list of the Scottish star’s film:</p> \n<ul>\n <li>Lilacs in the Spring&nbsp;(1954)</li>\n <li>No Road Back&nbsp;(1957)</li>\n <li>Hell Drivers&nbsp;(1957)</li>\n <li>Action of the Tiger&nbsp;(1957)</li>\n <li>&nbsp;Time Lock&nbsp;(1957)</li>\n <li>Another Time, Another Place&nbsp;(1958)</li>\n <li><strong>&nbsp;</strong>A Night to Remember<strong>&nbsp;</strong>(1958)</li>\n <li>Darby O’Gill and the Little People&nbsp;(1959)</li>\n <li>Tarzan’s Greatest Adventure&nbsp;(1959)</li>\n <li>On the Fiddle&nbsp;(1961)</li>\n <li>The Frightened City&nbsp;(1961)</li>\n <li>The Longest Day&nbsp;(1962)</li>\n <li>Dr. No&nbsp;(1962)</li>\n <li>From Russia with Love&nbsp;(1963)</li>\n <li>&nbsp;Marnie&nbsp;(1964)</li>\n <li>Woman of Straw&nbsp;(1964)</li>\n <li>&nbsp;Goldfinger&nbsp;(1964)</li>\n <li>&nbsp;The Hill&nbsp;(1965)</li>\n <li>&nbsp;Thunderball&nbsp;(1965)</li>\n <li>Un monde nouveau&nbsp;(1966)</li>\n <li>&nbsp;A Fine Madness&nbsp;(1966)</li>\n <li>You Only Live Twice&nbsp;(1967)</li>\n <li>The Bowler and the Bunnet&nbsp;(1967)</li>\n <li>Shalako&nbsp;(1968)</li>\n <li>&nbsp;The Molly Maguires&nbsp;(1970)</li>\n <li>&nbsp;The Red Tent&nbsp;(1969)</li>\n <li>The Anderson Tapes&nbsp;(1971)</li>\n <li>Diamonds Are Forever&nbsp;(1971)</li>\n <li>The Offence&nbsp;(1973)</li>\n <li>Zardoz&nbsp;(1974)</li>\n <li>Murder on the Orient Express&nbsp;(1974)</li>\n <li>Ransom&nbsp;(I) (1974)</li>\n <li>The Dream Factory&nbsp;(1975)</li>\n <li>&nbsp;The Wind and the Lion&nbsp;(1975)</li>\n <li>The Man Who Would Be King&nbsp;(1975)</li>\n <li>Robin and Marian&nbsp;(1976)</li>\n <li>&nbsp;The Next Man&nbsp;(1976)</li>\n <li>&nbsp;A Bridge Too Far&nbsp;(1977)</li>\n <li>The First Great Train Robbery&nbsp;(1978)</li>\n <li>Meteor&nbsp;(1979)</li>\n <li>Cuba&nbsp;(1979)</li>\n <li>Outland&nbsp;(1981)</li>\n <li>Time Bandits&nbsp;(1981)</li>\n <li>&nbsp;Five Days One Summer&nbsp;(1982)</li>\n <li>&nbsp;The Man with the Deadly Lens&nbsp;(1982)</li>\n <li>&nbsp;Never Say Never Again&nbsp;(1983)</li>\n <li>G’olé!&nbsp;(1983)</li>\n <li>Sword of the Valiant: The Legend of Sir Gawain and the Green Knight&nbsp;(1984)</li>\n <li>Highlander&nbsp;(1986)</li>\n <li>The Name of the Rose&nbsp;(1986)</li>\n <li>The Untouchables&nbsp;(1987)</li>\n <li>T<a href=\"https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0095897/?ref_=ttls_li_tt\">h</a>e Presidio&nbsp;(1988)</li>\n <li>Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade&nbsp;(1989)</li>\n <li>The Hunt for Red October&nbsp;(1990)</li>\n <li>The Russia House&nbsp;(1990)</li>\n <li>&nbsp;Highlander II: The Quickening&nbsp;(1991)</li>\n <li>Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves&nbsp;(1991)</li>\n <li>&nbsp;Medicine Man&nbsp;(1992)</li>\n <li>&nbsp;Rising Sun&nbsp;(1993)</li>\n <li>&nbsp;A Good Man in Africa&nbsp;(1994)</li>\n <li>&nbsp;Just Cause&nbsp;(1995)</li>\n <li>&nbsp;First Knight&nbsp;(1995)</li>\n <li>&nbsp;DragonHeart&nbsp;(1996)</li>\n <li>The Rock&nbsp;(1996)</li>\n <li>The Avengers&nbsp;(1998)</li>\n <li>&nbsp;Playing by Heart&nbsp;(1998)</li>\n <li>&nbsp;Entrapment&nbsp;(1999)</li>\n <li>&nbsp;Finding Forrester&nbsp;(2000)</li>\n <li>The League of Extraordinary Gentlemen&nbsp;(2003)</li>\n</ul> \n<h2>Is Sean Connery married and does he have kids?</h2> \n<p>Connery has one son, Jason Connery, with first wife, actress Diane Cilento. </p> \n<p> They were married for 11 years, from 1962 to 1973 and Connery’s first marriage has been mired with controversy after Diane accused him of being abusive.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12492160\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000004424801.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492160\" width=\"960\" height=\"848\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  Globe Photos\n </figcredit>\n</figure>Connery pictured with his only son, Jason Connery[/caption] \n<p>Connery has been married to Moroccan-French painter Micheline Roquebrune since 1975.</p> \n<p>They met in 1970 at a golf tournament in Morocco.</p> \n<p>She had been married twice and Sean had already split from his first wife<br>Diane Cilento.</br></p> \n<p>Micheline revealed the pair hit it off – and romped within 24 hours of meeting.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12492162\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000001845719-1.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492162\" width=\"960\" height=\"748\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  AP:Associated Press\n </figcredit>\n</figure>Connery has been married to Moroccan-French painter Micheline Roquebrune since 1975[/caption] \n<p>Sean said: “In&nbsp;the early days it&nbsp;was difficult for&nbsp;us to&nbsp;see each other. She was<br>still living in&nbsp;North Africa with her children”.</br></p> \n<p>However, despite the long-distance and language barrier, the pair have been together ever since, although they have no children together.</p> \n<h2>What is the actor’s net worth?</h2> \n<p>The actor has earned a huge fortune of £266million, according to Celebrity Net Worth.</p> \n<p>His fortune has been accumulated from an acting career that has lasted over 60 years. </p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12492169\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 646px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000502149366.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=636\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492169\" width=\"636\" height=\"960\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  Getty - Contributor\n </figcredit>\n</figure>The actor has earned a huge fortune of £266million[/caption] \n<p>However, Sean hasn’t always known such riches.</p> \n<p>The Scottish star started with nothing. Born on the top floor of a tenement in Fountainbridge, Edinburgh, the family had no hot water, no bathroom and the loo — shared with a dozen families — was four floors down.</p> \n<!--googleoff: have jobs including being a lorry driver and babysitter.</p> \n<p>Sean has donated a significant cut of his earnings to the Scottish International Education Trust to help students from poor backgrounds like his own.</p> \n<p>He is also a vocal backer of Scottish independence and has donated lots of his own money to the Scottish National Party.&nbsp;</p> \n<!-- Start of Brightcove Player list","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/12491617/co-operative-bank-jobs-closures-coronavirus/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p><strong>THE Co-Operative Bank has announced plans to cut 350 jobs and close 18 branches.</strong></p>\n\n\n\n<p>The banking group is the latest business to have been impacted by the <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/coronavirus/\">coronavirus</a> crisis.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12491635\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000352731895.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491635\" width=\"960\" height=\"720\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Alamy</figcredit></figure>The Co-Operative Bank has announced plans to cut 350 jobs and close 18 branches[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>Co-operative Bank confirmed the news in an update today, saying it&#8217;s been affected by <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/11894961/bank-of-england-holds-interest-rates-prints-cash/\">record low Bank of England interest rates</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Interest rates have been held at 0.1% &#8211; the <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/11208222/bank-of-england-cuts-interest-rates-again-to-0-1/\">lowest level in 400 years</a> &#8211; to help reduce the economic shock of the pandemic for borrowers.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>For lenders, it means lower profitability because of the cheaper borrowing costs.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Co-operative Bank says it&#8217;s also been impacted by more people banking online.</p>\n\n\n\n\t<div class=\"article-boxout\">\n\t\t<div class=\"article-boxout__header theme__background-color\">\n\t\t\t<h3 class=\"article-boxout__headline\">Which Co-Operative Banks are closing?</h3>\n\t\t</div>\n\t\t<div class=\"article-boxout__content theme__background-color-rgba-20\">\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<p class=\"article__content--intro\">\n\t\t\t\t\tTHE Co-Operative Bank has confirmed plans to close the following branches:\t\t\t\t</p>\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t<div>\n<ul>\n<li>Ashton</li>\n<li>Bradford</li>\n<li>Cambridge</li>\n<li>Chatham</li>\n<li>Chester</li>\n<li>Chichester</li>\n<li>City of London</li>\n<li>Dartford</li>\n<li>Halesowen</li>\n<li>Harrogate</li>\n<li>Luton</li>\n<li>Oxford</li>\n<li>Rotherham</li>\n<li>Solihull</li>\n<li>Truro</li>\n<li>Wakefield</li>\n<li>Walsall</li>\n<li>York</li>\n</ul>\n</div>\n\t\t</div>\n\t</div>\n\t\n\n\n\n<p>The 18 branches that have been earmarked for closure will shut by December 1 this year.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>You can see a full list of locations in the box above.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The bank will also write to all affected customers with information about alternative options available to them.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Co-operative Bank said it had chosen the sites after analysing their footfall over the last 12 months.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The bank says it&#8217;s already spoken to affected staff at these stores, while the group is also planning on axing some middle management and head office roles.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Bosses say they will try to redeploy staff where possible.</p>\n\n\n\n\t<div class=\"article-boxout\">\n\t\t<div class=\"article-boxout__header theme__background-color\">\n\t\t\t<h3 class=\"article-boxout__headline\">Job losses since June 2020</h3>\n\t\t</div>\n\t\t<div class=\"article-boxout__content theme__background-color-rgba-20\">\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<p class=\"article__content--intro\">\n\t\t\t\t\tMANY firms have announced job cuts since June 2020 alone as a result of the coronavirus lockdown.\t\t\t\t</p>\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t<div>\n<p>These include:</p>\n<ul>\n<li>Shoe chain&#160;<strong><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/11757277/shoe-chain-aldo-goes-bust/\">Aldo</a></strong>&#160;collapsed into administration with five stores permanently closed</li>\n<li><strong><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/11761752/victorias-secret-goes-into-administration-in-uk-putting-more-than-800-jobs-and-25-stores-at-risk/\">Victoria&#8217;s Secret</a></strong>&#160;plunged into administration, putting 800 jobs at risk</li>\n<li>Fashion chain&#160;<strong><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/11825621/quiz-stores-administration-coronavirus-crisis/\">Quiz</a></strong>&#160;put its shop business into administration in , putting 82 stores at risk</li>\n<li>British Gas owners cuts 5,000 jobs, over half of which will be in management</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/11994429/plane-manufacturer-airbus-is-to-cut-1700-jobs/\"><strong>Airbus</strong></a>&#160;announces 1,700 job losses. It expects cuts to be made by summer 2021</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/11413542/tm-lewin-for-sale/\"><strong>TM Lewin</strong></a>&#160;says it will close all 66 of its UK shops, putting 600 jobs at risk</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/11993006/harveys-furniture-staff-administration/\"><strong>Harveys Furniture</strong>&#160;</a>goes into administration resulting in 240 immdiate job losses and puts another 1,000 at risk</li>\n<li><strong><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/11996216/upper-crust-redundancies-coronavirus-pandemic/\">Upper Crust</a></strong>&#160;plans to make 5,000 out of its 9,000-strong workforce redundant</li>\n<li><strong><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/travel/11990915/easyjet-close-hubs-stansted-southend-newcastle/\">EasyJet&#160;</a></strong>says it plans to close hubs at Stansted, Southend and Newcastle, putting 4,500 jobs at risk</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/11995046/harrods-workforce-redundant-coronavirus/\"><strong>Harrods</strong></a>&#160;has said it is consulting on cutting 680 jobs</li>\n<li><strong>Virgin Money</strong>, which owns Clydesdale and Yorkshire Bank, will cut 300 jobs</li>\n<li><strong><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/topshop/\">Topshop</a></strong>&#160;owner Arcadia has announced plans to cut 500 office staff</li>\n<li><strong><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/11949096/royal-mail-jobs-cut-coronavirus/\">Royal Mail</a></strong>&#160;is expected to cut 2,000 jobs as a result of coronavirus</li>\n<li>Book and stationery giant&#160;<strong><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/12316651/whsmith-1500-jobs-risk-coronavirus/\">WH Smith</a></strong>&#160;has warned it could cut 1,500 jobs</li>\n<li><strong><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/12298471/dw-sports-administration-jobs-at-risk/\">DW Sport</a></strong>&#160;fell into administration and expects to cut 1,500 jobs</li>\n<li>High street giant&#160;<strong><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/12075065/boots-jobs-coronavirus-uk-high-street/\">Boots&#160;</a></strong>says it expects to axe 4,000 jobs as well as closing 48 opticians branches</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/12073674/john-lewis-shop-closures-jobs/\"><strong>John Lewis</strong></a>&#160;revealed plans to close eight stores, putting 1,300 jobs at risk.</li>\n<li><strong><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/12430189/marks-and-spencer-job-losses-axe-shop-floor-workers/\">M&#38;S</a>&#160;</strong>plans to axe up to 7,000 roles, mostly made up of shop workers.&#160;</li>\n<li><strong><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12467845/sta-travel-ceases-trading-coronavirus/\">STA Travel</a></strong>, which employed 500 staff, has gone out of business.</li>\n</ul>\n</div>\n\t\t</div>\n\t</div>\n\t\n\n\n\n<p>Co-Op Bank chief executive Andrew Bester said: “Our people have shown great dedication and commitment to our customers over the past few months, so we are very sorry to announce this news today.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;Unfortunately, we’re not immune to the impact of recent events, with the historically low base rate affecting the income of all banks and a period of prolonged economic uncertainty ahead.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>He continued: &#8220;We will do all we can to support colleagues through the process with fairness and respect.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Co-Operative Bank isn&#8217;t the only business to announce job cuts following the coronavirus pandemic.</p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/12430189/marks-and-spencer-job-losses-axe-shop-floor-workers/\">M&#38;S</a> has confirmed plans to axe up to 7,000 shop floor workers, while <a began.</p>\n\n\n\n\t\t<!-- Start of Brightcove Player -->\n\n\t\t\t\t\t<div style=\"display: block; position: relative; min-width: 0px; max-width: 640px;\">\n\t\t\t\t<div style=\"padding-top: 56%; hearts&#8217; content like never before.</p>\n<p>But distraction is just a click away &#8211; look no further for our pick of Netflix&#8217;s best series to binge on and beat the boredom.</p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h1><span style=\"text-decoration: underline\"><span style=\"color: #993300;text-decoration: underline\">Comedy</span></span></h1>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>1. Orange Is the New Black</b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11245373\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11245373\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/lede-orange.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"504\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Follow the life of a thirty something inmate in a federal prison</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">This hit prison series revolved around Piper Chapman (<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/1775633/orange-is-the-new-black-star-taylor-schilling-suffers-embarrassing-wardrobe-malfunction-as-she-flashes-her-bum-on-shopping-trip/\">Taylor Schilling</a>), a 30-something woman who is sentenced to 15 months in Litchfield Penitentiary. The minimum-security women’s federal prison in upstate <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/where/new-york/\">New York</a> and the stories of the other inmates drives the series and you&#8217;ll soon fall in love with the band of misfits. With seven seasons to binge on, it’s the perfect <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/coronavirus/\">COVID-19</a> blackout show to watch. </span></p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes audience rating:</i></b><em><strong> 81%</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>2. Atypical</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11297264\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11297264\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/atypical.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">The heartwarming journey exploring what it means to be normal</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>A coming of age story that follows 18-year-old Sam (Keir Gilchrist), who is on the autistic spectrum, as he searches for love and independence.</p>\n<p>The funny and emotional journey of self-discovery sees Sam&#8217;s family struggle with questions of what it means to be &#8216;normal&#8217; in the 21st century.</p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes audience rating: 95%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3>3. Brooklyn Nine-Nine</h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11372290\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 645px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11372290\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Brooklyn-Nine-Nine--e1586532124314.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=635\" alt=\"\" width=\"635\" height=\"632\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">&#8220;Cinco De Mayo&#8221; Episode 616 &#8211; Pictured: (l-r) Andy Samberg as Jake Peralta, Melissa Fumero as Amy Santiago, Joe Lo Truglio as Charles Boyle</figcaption><figcredit>NBC</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>This sitcom follows the lives of a group of detectives in a New York precinct.</p>\n<p>Among the bunch is renowned slacker <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/12053825/brooklyn-nine-nine-andy-samberg-challenge-black-lives-matter/\">Jake (Andy Samberg)</a> who wants to make the new boss&#8217; life as hard as possible.</p>\n<p>However, an unexpected friendship blossoms between Captain Holt and the rest of the gang follows suit.</p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes audience rating: 93%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3>4. Kim&#8217;s Convenience</h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11372319\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 919px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11372319\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Kims-Convinience-e1586532267634.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=909\" alt=\"\" width=\"909\" height=\"660\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Join the eccentric family as they navigate through life</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>The Korean Wave keeps coming with this series.</p>\n<p>It follows a Korean-Canadian family who own a convenience store in <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/where/toronto/\">Toronto</a>.</p>\n<p>The family consists of two siblings and their parents who are trying to navigate their way through life.</p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes audience rating: 90%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>5. The IT Crowd</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11297430\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11297430\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/The-IT-Crowd.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"540\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">The misfits are IT experts based in the basement of a large corporation</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>This British sitcom shows a group of computer geeks whose careers reside in the basement of a huge company.</p>\n<p>The comedic adventures of the rag-tag team of co-workers sees them regularly at odds with the company&#8217;s boss, who is is technically inept and doesn&#8217;t know the difference between software and hardware.</p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\"><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes audience rating: 85%</i></b></span></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>6. Jane The Virgin </b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11245668\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11245668 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Jane-The-Virgin-e1587545802674.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"824\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Immaculate conception and lots of drama can be expected with this series</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Telenovelas are a way of life for South Americans and this slice of life drama is no different. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Based on the immaculate conception Bible story, the series follows Jane Villenuva, who is a virgin that is artificially inseminated. With a cop fiancé and her very Catholic grandmother in tow, it shows how her life progresses through her pregnancy and beyond. Throw in a few kidnappings, murders, drug lords and it&#8217;s the all-rounded telenovela with a Western twist. </span></p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes audience rating: 86%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>7. Never Have I Ever </b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11528435\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 682px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11528435\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Never-Have-I-Ever-e1588348299105.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=672\" alt=\"\" width=\"672\" height=\"496\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Join Devi and the gang for some laughs</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Devi is a regular 16 year old girl who&#8217;s trying to live her life but a few obstacles hold her back.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">After her father passes away and she becomes paralysed from the waist down she thinks her life is over.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Her Indian immigrant mum who treads the line between modern and traditional is trying her best to raise her with the same values she was raised with.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Throw in an unreadable crush, an arch nemesis and fracturing friendships and you have a relatable sitcom.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Produced by <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/11079534/mindy-kaling-splashes-9-5million-on-frank-sinatras-incredible-malibu-beach-house/\">Mindy Kaling</a>. </span></p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 97%.</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>8. Glee</b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11528528\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 610px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11528528\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Glee.jpeg?strip=all&#38;w=600\" alt=\"\" width=\"600\" height=\"450\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Lea Michele belts out the show tunes on Glee</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Everyone’s favourite music is sung by some of the best young voices.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">The <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/glee/\">glee</a> club is made up of the outcasts of the school and the school reminds them of this very thing.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">With jocks, cheerleaders and nerds, these misfits use music in order to unite them.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">However, a meddling cheerleader coach and noncompliant principle threaten their success in more ways than one. </span></p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 71%.</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>9. New Girl</b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11564945\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 578px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11564945\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/New-Girl-e1588784290386.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=568\" alt=\"\" width=\"568\" height=\"410\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Jess and the gang bring chaos to any situation</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Jess (<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/10194769/zooey-deschanel-divorce-husband-jacob/\">Zooey Deschanel</a>) moves in with three roommates who have a familial yet chaotic bond.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">After moving in and facing many of life&#8217;s obstacles the foursome establish a balance with each other.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Jess’s fun, quirky and bubbly personality clashes with her roommate&#8217;s pessimistic, overbearing personalities. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Facing the trials and tribulations of love, jobs and their relationships with one another in a humorous way. </span></p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 82%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>10. Modern Family </b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11564955\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11564955\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Modern-Family-e1588784375407.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"520\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Follow this not so typical family</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">This family shows all the good and difficult parts of having a large <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/11360112/modern-family-cast-now/\">modern family</a>.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">The story follows three different types of families. The nuclear family, step family and a same sex couple.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">All living in the <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/where/los-angeles/\">Los Angeles</a> area facing different problems with their children and within their relationships in the most fun way possible.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Family comedy drama with Sarah Hyland, <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/12125174/modern-family-sofia-vergara-judge-agt-actress/\">Sofia Vergar</a>a, Jesse Tyler Ferguson and more. </span></p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 88%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>11. The Good Place</b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11615093\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 810px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11615093\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/The-Good-Place.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=800\" alt=\"\" width=\"800\" height=\"449\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Delve into the afterlife where The Good Place isn&#8217;t all it seems</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">This show is perfect for people who want a visual representation of what  may happen when you die.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Or it could be an indication of what not to do if you want to go to the bad place (Hell).</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Eleanor Shellstrop (<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/fabulous/12072957/kristen-bell-viciously-mum-shamed-after-revealing-her-daughter-five-was-still-in-nappies/\">Kristen Bell</a>) is an ordinary woman who enters the afterlife, but an error sends her to <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/9330025/the-good-place-season-4-netflix-uk-date/\">The Good Place</a> instead of The Bad Place.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Figuring out why she’s there and trying to hide the fact she shouldn’t be gets harder and harder as she hides from Good Place architect Micheal (Ted Danson). </span></p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 89%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>12. Dead to Me </b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11615098\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 621px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11615098\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Dead-to-me-e1589380284508.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=611\" alt=\"\" width=\"611\" height=\"519\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">An unconventional friendship but will a secret break them apart?</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Jen (Christina Applegate) is recently widowed after her husband is killed in a hit and run accident.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Determined to investigate after the incident, Judy (Linda Cardellini) appears as her friend after meeting in a support group.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Judy is facing her own loss however, the pair bond despite their clash of personalities. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">However, Judy is hiding a secret that threatens to destroy Jen’s life. </span></p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 92%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3>13. After Life</h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11776143\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11776143\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/NINTCHDBPICT000576687528-2.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Ricky Gervais plays a widower called Tony in this hit Netflix series</figcaption><figcredit>Free for editorial use</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/12184539/stephen-merchant-swipe-at-ricky-gervais-after-life/\">Ricky Gervais</a>&#8216; acclaimed series sees him play Tony, a widower trying to come to terms with the loss of his wife.</p>\n<p>While the series has you in tears at times as Ricky delves into the subject matter of death and grief, it also has plenty of laughs.</p>\n<p>The C-bomb is dropped a lot across the two series so be warned, but its no surprise this has been lauded as one of Ricky&#8217;s finest pieces of work to date.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 74%</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3>14. Bojack Horseman</h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11776138\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 600px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11776138\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/NINTCHDBPICT000433817878.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=590\" alt=\"\" width=\"590\" height=\"350\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Bojack Horseman is considered by many to be the best animated series of all time</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>Many consider this to be the best animated series of all time (sorry Simpsons fans) and is the brainchild of Raphael Bob-Waksberg.</p>\n<p>The series &#8211; which burst on to the scene in 2o14 &#8211; features a stellar cast including Will Arnett, Amy Sedaris, Alison Brie, Paul F Tompkins and Aaron Paul.</p>\n<p>With six seasons to watch, there are plenty of laughs to be had.</p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>15. Unbreakable Kimmy Schmidt</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11962434\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 600px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11962434\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/NINTCHDBPICT000321412852.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=590\" alt=\"\" width=\"590\" height=\"335\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Unbreakable Kimmy Schmidt already has four seasons on Netflix</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>This hilarious series is the perfect pick me up for when you’re feeling a bit meh. And thanks to the short but sweet episodes, it’s the perfect thing to switch on when you get home from work and just want some light-hearted television.</p>\n<p>There’s already four seasons available on Netflix and we guarantee you’ll get hooked as you follow Kimmy (played by Ellie Kemper) as she as she adjusts to life after her rescue from a doomsday cult, where she and three other women were held by Reverend Richard Wayne Gary Wayne (<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/10951628/jennifer-aniston-brad-pitt-jon-hamm/\">Jon Hamm</a>) for 15 years.</p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes audience rating: 95%</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h1><span style=\"text-decoration: underline\"><span style=\"color: #993300;text-decoration: underline\">Sci-Fi &#38; Fantasy</span></span></h1>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>16. Stranger Things</b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11245400\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11245400\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/stranger-things.jpeg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Will they find solve the mystery of the missing boy?</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">The acclaimed series is seen as a love letter to 80’s sci-fi. Set in 1983, Indiana, a young boy vanishes into thin air under seriously dark circumstances. Family, friends and the local police begin searching for answers, however they stumble upon a mysterious young girl in a top-secret government facility. Starring <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/millie-bobby-brown/\">Millie Bobby Brown</a>, the series is suitable for tweens upwards.</span></p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes audience rating: 91%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>17. The Umbrella Academy</b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11245606\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11245606\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/The-Umbrella-Academy.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"540\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Seven youngsters born in supernatural circumstances come back together to help save the world in Marvels new series</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Based on the comic book series of the same name, <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tv/12258543/will-season-3-umbrella-academy-netflix/\">The Umbrella Academy</a> tracks forty-three infants who are born to an array of women who showed no symptoms of pregnancy until the day before they were due to give birth. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Seven of them are adopted by a billionaire industrialist, Reginald Hargreeves, who creates The Umbrella Academy. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">He uses the children in his plans to save the world, but only ends up leaving the family fractured. The family disband and only reunite upon Hargreaves passing away, discovering his darkest secrets.</span></p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes audience rating: 86%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>18. Daredevil</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11962436\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 730px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11962436\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/NINTCHDBPICT000319583733.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=720\" alt=\"\" width=\"720\" height=\"480\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Charlie Cox takes on the role of Matt Murdock in Marvel series Daredevil</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>Even if you’re not a massive Marvel fan, we can guarantee you’ll binge-watch all three seasons of Daredevil.</p>\n<p>Based on the Marvel Comics character of the same name, the show stars Charlie Cox as Matt Murdock AKA <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/10690269/marvel-save-netflix-daredevil-jessica-jones-cancellation-disney/\">Daredevil</a>, a blind lawyer-by-day who fights crime as a masked vigilante by night.</p>\n<p>A spin-off series, centered on Bernthal&#8217;s character Frank Castle/ Punisher and titled The Punisher, was ordered by <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/netflix/\">Netflix</a> in April 2016 but sadly Daredevil was cancelled in November 2018.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes audience rating: 92%</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>19. Snowpiercer</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11962689\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11962689\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/NINTCHDBPICT000582913791.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Snowpiercer stars stars Jennifer Connelly and Daveed Diggs and is an adaptation of a book and film</figcaption><figcredit>TM &#38; © Turner Entertainment Networks, Inc. A WarnerMedia Company. All Rights Reserved</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tv/12112413/first-look-snowpiercer-season-two-sean-bean-mr-wilford/\">Snowpiercer</a> is a post-apocalyptic dystopian thriller series based on both the 2013 South Korean-Czech film of the same name and the 1982 French graphic novel Le Transperceneige, from which the film was adapted.</p>\n<p>The show consists of ten episodes and stars <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/11629169/jennifer-connelly-actress-age-movies-family/\">Jennifer Connelly</a> and <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/11625830/who-snowpiercer-daveed-diggs/\">Daveed Diggs</a>.</p>\n<p>The plot follows the passengers of the Snowpiercer, a gigantic, perpetually moving train that circles the globe carrying the remnants of humanity seven years after the world becomes a frozen wasteland.</p>\n<p>The series questions class warfare, social injustice, and the politics of survival.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes audience rating: 94%</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>20. The Witcher</b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11245499\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11245499\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/The-Witcher.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"540\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">The Witcher</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Fantasy fans looking to fill the void of <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/game-of-thrones/\">Game of Thrones</a> can be sure to love this one. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">A mutated monster hunter struggles to find his place in the world where it becomes increasingly difficult to decipher who is more wicked: human beings or beasts?</span></p>\n<p>Starring <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/12145817/henry-cavills-fans-swoon-building-computer-from-scratch/\">Henry Cavill</a> as the hunky Geralt of Rivia, <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tv/10588190/netflix-the-witcher-review/\">The Witcher</a> brings plenty of eye candy too.</p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes audience rating: 92%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>21. Teen Wolf </strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11475120\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 610px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11475120\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Teen-Wolf.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=600\" alt=\"\" width=\"600\" height=\"400\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">How will these teens survive high school and being werewolves?</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">In the remake of the Micheal J. Fox cult classic, Tyler Posey plays a teen who becomes a werewolf.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Far from the romantic cliche’s in Twilight, Teen Wolf is funny and action filled. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">With 6 seasons, and many mystical creatures who are easy on the eyes, this is the perfect series to binge watch.</span></p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes audience rating: 81%</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3>22. Black Mirror</h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11776142\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11776142\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/NINTCHDBPICT000375800672.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Dystopian series Black Mirror takes a chilling look at how technology can change our lives</figcaption><figcredit>�Netflix 2017</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/5328455/charlie-brooker-antiviral-wipe-black-mirror/\">Charlie Brooker</a> has managed to create a truly chilling and dystopian vision of how technology can change our lives in <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/9231925/black-mirror-series-five-terrified-sleep-tonight/\">Black Mirror</a>.</p>\n<p>Each season focuses on different yet equally disturbing subjects, with A-list guest stars including <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/miley-cyrus/\">Miley Cyrus</a>, Mad Men&#8217;s Jon Hamm, Black Panther&#8217;s Letitia Wright, Bryce Dallas-Howard and Andrew Scott.</p>\n<p>The series also includes the mindblowing one-off Bandersnatch, where viewers choose their own adventure.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes audience rating: 83%</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h1><span style=\"text-decoration: underline\"><span style=\"color: #993300;text-decoration: underline\">Drama</span></span></h1>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>23. The Stranger</b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11245416\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 792px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11245416 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/The-Stranger-e1586532702126.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=782\" alt=\"\" width=\"782\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Follow one man&#8217;s quest to find out information about a family he doesn&#8217;t know</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">If your fill of drama comes from mystery thrillers then look no further. This gripping whodunit follows a stranger who makes some shocking claims about members of a small town, throwing local families into chaos. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">One family man becomes entangled in a mystery of deadly proportions whilst searching for answers about his wife&#8217;s pregnancy. The show is guaranteed to keep viewers on the edge of their seats with its many twists and turns.</span></p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes audience rating: 76%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>24. When They See Us</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11962440\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11962440\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/NINTCHDBPICT000588052138.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">When They See Us is a four-part series based on real life events</figcaption><figcredit>AP:Associated Press</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>This four-part series starring Asante Blackk and Jharrel Jerome is based on the events of the April 19, 1989, Central Park jogger case and explores the lives of the five suspects who were falsely prosecuted on charges related to the sexual assault of a female victim, and of their families.</p>\n<p>In June 2019, <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/netflix/\">Netflix</a> announced that the miniseries had been streamed by over 23 million viewers within its first month of release and the show went on to win several awards, so it really is a must see.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes audience rating: 96%</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>25. Gossip Girl </b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11245651\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11245651\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Gossip-Girl.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"621\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">The Upper East siders are having a hard time whilst Gossip Girl is around, but who is she?</figcaption><figcredit>Seventeen Magazine</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">If you’ve always wanted an insight on the lives of rich kids in <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/where/new-york/\">New York</a>, then this is the perfect escapism for you. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">These privileged teenagers create chaos on the Upper East Side while a blogger named after the show&#8217;s title writes about them, airing their dirty laundry. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">The identity of the mysterious blogger isn’t revealed until the end and it’s a surprising twist to say the least. Starring You’s Penn Badgley and Blake Lively.</span></p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes audience rating: 77%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>26. Sex Education</b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11245464\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11245464\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Sex-Education.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Follow the teens who open an underground sex therapy clinic</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Filled with laughs and socially awkward teens, this coming-of-age drama offers something different. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Following the life of <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/12009015/sex-education-asa-butterfield-otis-maeve-season-three/\">Otis Milburn (Asa Butterfield)</a> and his sex therapist mum <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/gillian-anderson/\">(Gillian Anderson)</a>, expect cringes and giggles in equal measure. Due to his mother&#8217;s teachings, plus the endless manuals and books he’s been exposed to, he uses his specialist knowledge to elevate his social status in school. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Together with his friends, they set up an underground sex therapy clinic to help fellow students deal with their problems and ordeals. </span></p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes audience rating: 94%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>27. Gilmore Girls</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11297422\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11297422\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Gilmore-Girls.jpeg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">The Gilmore Girls journey includes romance and drama</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>Mother and daughter duo Loralai Gilmore (Lauren Graham) and Rory Gilmore (Alexis Bledel) show the humorous and heartfelt journey of friendship and family in this beloved classic.</p>\n<p>It takes a cross-generational view of things, with single mother Lorelai&#8217;s difficult relationship with her own parents also under the microscope, as well as Rory&#8217;s journey through high school and university.</p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\"><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes audience rating: 86%</i></b></span></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>28. The Crown</b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_10938544\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 865px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-10938544\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/NINTCHDBPICT000562165834.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=855\" alt=\"\" width=\"855\" height=\"562\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Matt Smith played Prince Philip in some risky scenes in The Crown</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Looking at the British monarchy and the government, <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/the-crown/\">The Crown</a> follows the two famous addresses &#8211; <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/where/buckingham-palace/\">Buckingham Palace</a> and 10 Downing Street. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">The scandals, their love lives and the events that shaped the second half of the 20th century make up the historic drama. Two houses, one court, one crown.</span></p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes audience rating: 90%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>29. Top Boy</b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11245553\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11245553\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Top-Boy.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"610\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Top Boy follows two British lads who sell drugs in order to get rich quick</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Modern day gang members who are looking to get rich quick selling drugs rarely come without their own baggage and Top Boy is no different. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Far from the likes of Power, <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tv/9947704/top-boy-season-4-release-date-netflix/\">Top Boy</a> offers insight into the British gang scene and the trials and tribulations of these young men. </span></p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes audience rating: 94%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>30. Mindhunter</b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11245591\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11245591\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Mindhunter.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">The Netflix drama follows two detectives who interview serial killers to solve cold cases</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">With the 1970’s as the backdrop, this story follows two FBI agents who are tasked with interviewing serial killers in order to solve older open cases. CSI enthusiasts will find the series absorbing, chilling and utterly addictive.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\"> Probably not for you if you&#8217;re on the squeamish side though&#8230;</span></p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes audience rating: 95%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>31. Pose</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11475169\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 440px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11475169\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/POse-e1587747073637.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=430\" alt=\"\" width=\"430\" height=\"379\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Inspiring and informative</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Set in the 1980’s during the AID’s epidemic, Pose is based on Blanca Rodriguez (MJ Rodriguez) after she is diagnosed with HIV.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Following her positive diagnosis, she breaks Elektra (Dominique Jackson), the mother of the House of Abundance and starts her own ‘’house’’.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">The house takes in LGBTQ+ youth who have been rejected or thrown out by their biological families . </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">The new family consists of youngsters with dreams who need a safe haven.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Be careful though, this series tugs at the heartstrings. </span></p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes audience rating: 96%</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3>32. Suits</h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11372344\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 400px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11372344\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Suits-e1586532466158.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=390\" alt=\"\" width=\"390\" height=\"358\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Top Manhattan lawyers fight it out in court</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/meghan-markle/\">Meghan Markle</a>, Patrick Adams, Gina Torres and Gabriel Macht star as some of Manhattan&#8217;s top corporate lawyers.</p>\n<p>Macht plays Harvey Spectre, a brilliant lawyer who need to hire an associate.</p>\n<p>Patrick Adams stars as college dropout Mike Ross, who&#8217;s looking for his next gig but accidentally stumbles across a new opportunity.</p>\n<p>Filled with scandal, lies, corruption, romance and more.</p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes audience rating: 86%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3>33. Ozark</h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11372362\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 482px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11372362\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Ozark-e1586532551493.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=472\" alt=\"\" width=\"472\" height=\"520\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Will this family be able to deal with the dirty money?</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>A family moves into an <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/11993114/netflix-ozark-ending-season-four-two-parts/\">Ozark</a>s resort community and faces struggles due to the new place filled with dirty money.</p>\n<p>Jason Bateman plays a financial adviser who must appease a drug boss by laundering money, with his wife Wendy (Laura Linney) being dragged into the criminal dealing too.</p>\n<p>The series has just aired its third season, complete with jaw-dropping finale &#8211; and has been nominated for a slew of awards.</p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes audience rating: 91%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3>34.
