Better Call Saul</h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11372380\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 825px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11372380 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Better-Call-Saul-2-e1586532671656.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=815\" alt=\"\" width=\"815\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">The prequel to Breaking Bad</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>The prequel to Breaking Bad, <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tv/12435522/better-call-saul-season-6-production-2021/\">Better Call Saul</a> is set in the 2000&#8217;s, and follows the story of con-man turned lawyer Jimmy McGill (Bob Odenkirk).</p>\n<p>It begins six years before <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/11579474/breaking-bad-bryan-cranston-aaron-paul-reprise-roles-better-call-saul/\">Breaking Bad</a> and shows the transformation of the criminal for hire.</p>\n<p>McGill uses his skills to enter the criminal underworld of drug trafficking, and meets a whole host of shady characters along the way.</p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes audience rating: 96%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>35. How To Get Away With Murder</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11411572\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 321px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11411572\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/How-to-Get-Away-With-Murder-e1587042010771.png?strip=all&#38;w=311\" alt=\"\" width=\"311\" height=\"256\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Follow the whodunnit style TV drama</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">A law professor picks a group of her best students to assist her with some high profile cases.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">However, all is not as it seems when Annalise Keating (Viola Davis) reveals that she has more than one skeleton in her closet.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Secrets, lies and death await the eager college students who got more than they bargained for.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Also starring Alfred Enoch, Connor Walsh, Aja Naomi King and Matt McGorry.</span></p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes rating: 86%</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>36. Dare Me</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11475188\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 509px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11475188\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Dare-Me-e1587747161223.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=499\" alt=\"\" width=\"499\" height=\"398\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">(l-r) Willa Fitzgerald as Collette French, Marlo Kelly as Beth Cassidy</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">This series follows the lives of competitive high school cheerleaders in a small town.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Specifically delving into two best friends whose relationship is tested after a new cheer coach arrives on the scene.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Boundaries are tested and a shocking crime rocks their quiet world. </span></p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes audience rating: 83%</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>37. Unorthodox </b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11528449\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11528449 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Unorthodox-e1588784605377.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"885\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">One of Netflix&#8217;s top dramas right now</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Etsy is a 19-year-old Jewish woman who is living unhappily in an arranged marriage.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Living in the ultra-Orthodox community in Brooklyn, New York she runs away to Berlin.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">She ends up rejecting the beliefs she grew up with and all semblance of secular life. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">After discovering she is pregnant, her husband goes to Berlin to find her. </span></p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 94%.</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>38. Peaky Blinders </b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11528539\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 838px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11528539\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Peaky-Blinders-e1588349104585.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=828\" alt=\"\" width=\"828\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">This gangster will stop at nothing</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Set in 1919 England, a notorious gang is led by <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tv/12008536/peaky-blinders-supernatural-element-tommy-shelby-cursed/\">Tommy Shelby</a>, a crime boss who is set on moving up in the world no matter the cost. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">The British crime period drama is set in <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/where/birmingham/\">Birmingham</a> in the direct aftermath of the First World War.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">This gang is no ordinary one, with them coming to the attention of <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/winston-churchill/\">Winston Churchill</a> and being compared to the IRA and communists.</span></p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 94%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>39. Riverdale</b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11271830\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11271830\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Riverdale-2.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">These friends are in for a wild high school journey</figcaption><figcredit>The CW</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>In this town, nothing is normal.</p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Based on the Archie Comics series, <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/riverdale/page/2/\">Riverdale</a> follows the story of Archie and his friends.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Archie tries to deal with life, love and high school however when an unexpected murder occurs in town, him and his friends try to figure out whose behind it.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">They discover something darker and sinister as time goes on and threatens the balance of life as they know it. </span></p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 86%.</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>40. Extracurricular </b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11564614\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11564614\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Extracurricular-e1588781685310.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"795\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Some mistakes cannot be erased</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Being in high school is tough enough for this student, and it’s about to be made harder when he encounters a situation he’s never been in before.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">A young boy with an unstable home life has to turn to unconventional means to make money in order to live a simple life.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">He wants a normal job, a normal family and to live a simple quaint life.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">His extracurricular activity of protecting escorts whilst they&#8217;re working gets him in more trouble than he anticipated. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Original language is Korean, with English dubbing and subtitles available. </span></p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 100%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>41. Dynasty </b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11739236\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 304px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11739236\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/AAAABYUqJzjbKgGvH7kHGDgH8ie27pg_Oo6Nrs9B_smZ9UyGI4dymjRlfXHiJlYCOYWZEUh7839vNM-n07VLoy6z6I1jZ5uNOv7hSKuQHpJETVPkbnFz-e1590763613348.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=294\" alt=\"\" width=\"294\" height=\"251\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">These spoilt kids go to war with their father and anyone that stands in their way</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">These rich kids are more chaotic than normal when they have to wrestle with their father and his new fiancee.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">As always, scandals and secrets throw lives into disarray as the family come to a head on the future of the companies involved.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">With fractured relationships and feuding families, will they come to an amicable solution?</span></p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 88%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>42. White Lines</b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11739247\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11739247 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/white-lines-netflix-5-e1590763671799.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Will his sister be able to discover what happened to her brother?</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Axel moved to Ibiza 20 years ago and 20 years on and his body is found in the desert.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">His sister, Zoe travels to <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/where/ibiza/\">Ibiza</a> to find out what happened to him and doesn’t expect to find the answers she does. </span></p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 61%</i></b></p>\n<p><b><i> </i></b></p>\n<h3><b>43. Blood &#38; Water </b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11739261\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 660px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11739261\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/blood-and-water-1-m-e1590763731150.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=650\" alt=\"\" width=\"650\" height=\"527\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">A story of long lost daughter and the family she left behind</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Set in South Africa, a family is reeling at the loss of their baby daughter whose seventeenth birthday should be celebrated with them.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">She was kidnapped at birth and her sister Puleng (Ama Qamata) is determined to find answers when she suspects that her sister might be someone she knows.</span></p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: %</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3>44. Breaking Bad</h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11776140\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11776140\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/NINTCHDBPICT000469071884-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"720\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Bryan Cranston and Aaron Paul star in one of the best TV dramas ever made in Breaking Bad</figcaption><figcredit>Alamy</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>Before Better Call Saul there was <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/8276117/breaking-bad-movie-confirmed-bryan-cranston-aaron-paul/\">Breaking Bad</a>, which followed Bryan Cranston&#8217;s cancer-stricken chemistry teacher Walter White become a crystal meth drug lord.</p>\n<p>He is assisted by former student <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/5538084/aaron-paul-breaking-bad-daughter-birth-instagram/\">Jesse Pinkman (Aaron Paul)</a> and across five gripping seasons the two men meet the good, the bad, the ugly and everything in between.</p>\n<p>Breaking Bad is just an incredible piece of drama thanks to the writing, acting and directing and needs to be watched.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 96%</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<p><strong>45. Russian Doll</strong></p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11962119\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11962119\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/NINTCHDBPICT000465171800.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"480\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Natasha Lyonne stars in the incredible series called Russian Doll</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>This eight-episode series sees Orange is the New Black’s Natasha Lyonne take on the role of a woman named Nadia, who is on a journey as the guest of honour at a seemingly inescapable party one night in New York City.</p>\n<p>Nadia dies repeatedly, always restarting at the same moment at the party, as she tries to figure out a way of the strange time loop and why it is happening to her.</p>\n<p>In June 2019, the show was renewed for a second season. However, Netflix has not released an official statement on the script for series two. After all, part of the fun is seeing Nadia’s mysterious and wonderful world.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes audience rating: 97%</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h1><span style=\"text-decoration: underline\"><span style=\"color: #993300;text-decoration: underline\">Horror</span></span></h1>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>46. The Haunting of Hill House</b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11245441\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 710px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11245441 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/The-Haunting-of-Hill-House-e1586532731657.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=700\" alt=\"\" width=\"700\" height=\"646\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">You might want to keep the blanket over your head for this series, unless you like being scared out of your wits</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Turn the lights out and get ready to be scared out of your wits. With guaranteed jump scares, this series is not for the light-hearted but perfect for avid horror fans.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\"> The story hops from past to present, following a family who are confronting their memories of living in their old home and what drove them away from it. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">There are some disturbing themes in the series, but the plot had fans demand a second season after the first outing, so that should tell you all you need to know.</span></p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes audience rating: 91%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3>47. Chilling Adventures of Sabrina</h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11412004\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 374px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11412004\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Sabrina--e1587043921751.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=364\" alt=\"\" width=\"364\" height=\"432\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Archie Comics chilling version of Sabrina the Teenage Witch</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>A reimagining of Sabrina the Teenage Witch with all the dark twists and horror that come with the world of witchcraft.</p>\n<p>Sabrina Spellman (Keirnan Shipka) reconciles with her half-Witch, half-mortal nature whilst fighting off evil forces that threaten her family, friends and the entirety of the human world.</p>\n<p>If you like <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/riverdale/\">Riverdale</a>, then this Archie Comics series will be right up your street.</p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes audience rating: 84%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3>48. American Horror Story</h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11411871\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 530px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11411871\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/American-Horror-Story-e1587043368947.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=520\" alt=\"\" width=\"520\" height=\"552\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Evan Peters plays Tate in the first season</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>With seven seasons on Netflix, this binge worthy series will have you hooked.</p>\n<p>Each season is a different world from supernatural to horror. With underlying themes from politics to social issues.</p>\n<p>Season one follows a murder house, and the stories of the people that died in it. The drama is loosely based on true events that have happened throughout history.</p>\n<p>With <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/8690050/evan-peters-pose-american-horror-story-dating/\">Evan Peters</a> and guest star roles from <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/lady-gaga/\">Lady Gaga</a> and Stevie Nicks.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes audience rating: 76%</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3>49. Scream (2016)</h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11471568\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 532px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11471568\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/SCREAM-e1587724867628.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=522\" alt=\"\" width=\"522\" height=\"417\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">The killer is amongst the town but people can&#8217;t figure out who it is</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>Based off the hit horror film, this series follows the murder of an entitled teen.</p>\n<p>Art loner Audrey and her nerdy friend Noah are impacted by the death after the masked serial killer targets their friend Emma.</p>\n<p>Whilst the trio try and solve the mystery of the killer, the town sheriff investigates the murder and fears that it may connected to the a dark chapter in the town&#8217;s history.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 62%</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h1><span style=\"text-decoration: underline\"><span style=\"color: #993300;text-decoration: underline\">Reality Shows</span></span></h1>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>50. Love Is Blind</b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11092527\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11092527\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/NINTCHDBPICT000567809174-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Love is Blind is a Netflix reality dating show</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">If you’re looking for a fix of love and drama then look no further. With this <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/love-island/\">Love Island</a>-esque reality series the contestants are thrown into a house and told to date one another in pods, where they can&#8217;t see each other. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">The speed dating format is supposed to help them decide whether they want to get married after going on a set number of dates. Women and men are kept separate and they do not see each other in person until they are engaged. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Viewers are in for a wild ride as contestants explore courtship like no other, with an explosive ending for many couples. </span></p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes audience rating: 64%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3>51. Queer Eye</h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11411791\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11411791\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Queer-Eye-e1587043059909.jpeg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"647\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Follow the fantastic five on their journey to help others get their lives back on track</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>Follow these five members of the LGBTQ+ community in their quest to uplift and help people get their lives back on track.</p>\n<p>Heartwarmingly they all have a certain role to play.</p>\n<p>Tan &#8211; focuses on changing the way they dress and making them comfortable in their new wardrobe. Anthony &#8211; focuses on relationships with food and creating healthy meals. Karamo &#8211; is like the in-house therapist. Bobby &#8211; works on the participants home interior. Jonathan Van-ness &#8211; works on hair and grooming.</p>\n<p>It&#8217;s more than just a makeover programme, it&#8217;s a lifestyle change.</p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes audience rating: 90%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>52. Too Hot To Handle </strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11475127\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 691px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11475127 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Too-Hot-Too-Handle.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=681\" alt=\"\" width=\"681\" height=\"383\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">A cross between Love Is Blind and Love Island&#8230; kind of</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">If you loved <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/love-island/\">Love Island</a> and Love is Blind then get a load of Netflix’s newest dating reality show. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">The contestants are from Australia, England, Ireland and the US.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">They’re also all banned from having sex and kissing. Any one of those activities leads to a penalty which is money off the overall prize money they’re due to receive.</span></p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes audience rating: 38%</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>53. RuPaul&#8217;s Drag Race</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11475140\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11475140 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/RuPaul-e1587746876908.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"781\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">RuPaul and his guest judges put the drag queens through their paces</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Drag queens various parts of the world compete every week for a chance at being the America&#8217;s next drag superstar and $100,00.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">They have a different challenge every week like acting, composing music and they’re also judged on their runway.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">From the makeup, wigs, outfits following a different theme every week, they&#8217;re judged on all of them.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">The bottom two have to lip sync for their lives, whoever loses goes home. </span></p>\n<p><strong><em>Rotten Tomatoes audience rating: 85%</em></strong></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h1><span style=\"text-decoration: underline\"><span style=\"color: #993300;text-decoration: underline\">Docu-series</span></span></h1>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>54. Pandemic </b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11245636\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11245636\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Pandemic-.jpeg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">The world has erupted into chaos, but what led us here?</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">More relevant now than ever, Pandemic hasn’t left the top of Netflix’s watch list for months. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">A compelling series that showcases what is being done to combat the deadly COVID-19 pandemic and what the outbreak can lead to. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">A no-frills, five part series that has arrived right on time. </span></p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes audience rating: 75%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>55. Tiger King</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11269366\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 925px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11269366 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Tiger-King-2-e1587044498551.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=915\" alt=\"\" width=\"915\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Tiger King follows Joe Exotic and his big cat breeding zoo</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>Big cat breeding is illegal in many countries, but unfortunately this doesn&#8217;t stop private zoo owners in the United States.</p>\n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/joe-exotic/\">Joe Exotic</a> is at the centre of this mind-blowing seven-part documentary.</p>\n<p>The bizarre true crime series is messy and captivating, with twists and turns of deadly proportions.</p>\n<p>Warring an<b><i></i></b>imal rights factions, professional sabotage and even assassination attempts all feature in this unprecedented show.</p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes audience rating: 93%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>56. The Last Dance </b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11615016\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 458px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11615016\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/The-Last-Dance.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=448\" alt=\"\" width=\"448\" height=\"252\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Follow Micheal Jordans sensational journey with the Chicago Bulls</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">The story of Micheal Jordan and the quest the Chicago Bulls had to face in autumn of 1997.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Their journey to win a sixth NBA title in eight years is documented.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Jordan made his debut 13 years earlier and the journey was dubbed ‘’The Last Dance’’, by coach Phil Jackson.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">The tension, the hardships and the challenges faced by Jordan and his extraordinary teammates is shown in full flight.</span></p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 95%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>57. Don&#8217;t F**k with Cats : Hunting an Internet Killer </b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11615027\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 710px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11615027\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Dont-fuck-with-cats.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=700\" alt=\"\" width=\"700\" height=\"420\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">A haunting true story that started with one gruesome video</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">This twisted documentary shows the way gruesome videos put online lead to a manhunt for someone more dangerous than they expected.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">The documentary series pulls the manhunt leaders into a dark underworld and has devastating impacts on their lives.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">What started as just wanting to help turns into something much more sinister. </span></p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 79%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>58. The Devil Next Door</b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11615053\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11615053\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/the-devil-next-door-1573489628.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"795\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">He was known as &#8221;Ivan the terrible&#8221;</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\"> An elderly man in Cleveland is bought to trial in Israel after being accused of being an infamous Nazi death camp leader.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">The grandfather is accused of being the guard known as Ivan the Terrible. </span></p>\n<p>The docu-series follows his trial as brave death camp survivors take the stand against John Demjanjuk.</p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 86%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>59. Trial By Media: The Truth behind the crimes </b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11739195\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11739195 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Trial-by-Media-Netflix-Jonathan-Schmitz--e1590763364633.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"756\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">The Jenny Jones show came under fire when a show guest murdered his friend who had confessed his feelings to him on air</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Notorious cases that have been played out in the media are shown in their entirety.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">This series follows famous cases from a public rape, to a talk show contestant committing murder and the story’s behind the victims and the perpetrators. </span></p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 83%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>60. Jeffrey Epstein: Filthy Rich</b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11739215\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 790px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11739215\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Annie-Farmer-500065854_R.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=780\" alt=\"\" width=\"780\" height=\"439\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Annie Farmer in FILTHY RICH</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">The American miniseries looks at the convicted sex offender <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/jeffrey-epstein/\">Jeffrey Epstein</a>.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">It is based on the 2016 book of the same name, where the survivors of Epstein’s crimes describe how he used power and wealth to get away with his offences.</span></p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 70%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3>61. Making a Murderer</h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11776139\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 630px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11776139\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/NINTCHDBPICT000442457824.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=620\" alt=\"\" width=\"620\" height=\"342\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">This true crime documentary follows the story of Wisconsin man Steve Avery</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>An absolute smash hit when it first dropped on Netflix in December 2015, Making a Murderer follows the of Steven Avery, a Wisconsin man who served 18 years in prison after being wrongly accused of attempted murder and sexual assault.</p>\n<p>To top it all off, he was then convicted of a different murder, which he insists he didn&#8217;t do.</p>\n<p>The series was filmed over a decade by Laura Ricciardi and Moira Demos and was followed by a second series.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 84%</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h1><span style=\"text-decoration: underline\"><span style=\"color: #993300;text-decoration: underline\">Thrillers</span></span></h1>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>62. The Sinner </b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11564564\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 480px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11564564\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/The-Sinner-e1588781445817.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=470\" alt=\"\" width=\"470\" height=\"407\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">She murdered a man in cold blood, but all is not what it seems</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>Trauma can manifest itself in many ways, however when it’s repressed it can be even more detrimental.</p>\n<p>This is definitely the case for Cora Tannetti (Jessica Biel) when she ends murdering someone whilst on the beach with her family.</p>\n<p>After the horrific events she’s taken in for questioning, where a full investigation is launched into a random attack.</p>\n<p>As more questions are asked about her past, she realises that her past is filled with secrets she didn’t know about.</p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 75%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>63. Money Heist </strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11297452\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11297452 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Money-Heist-e1587044473209.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"697\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Can the Spaniard cement his place in history?</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>An intelligent, enigmatic character who goes by the name of &#8216;The Professor&#8217; plans a unique plot to carry out the biggest robbery in history.</p>\n<p>The series also goes by the name of &#8216;La Casa De Papel&#8217;, which is the Spanish title for the crime drama series.</p>\n<p>Both English subtitles and dubbing are available.</p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes audience rating: 87%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>64. You</b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11411418\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11411418 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/You-e1587044444165.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"787\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Delve into this drama</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">A tech-savvy young man living in New York uses modern resources to lure women into falling in love with him. However, the further you peer into his life, the more sinister it gets. Joe has skeletons in his closet, ones that are made evidently clear throughout the gripping series. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">If you enjoy suspense then You, is definitely one to add to the watch list. </span></p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes audience rating: 81%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3>65. ELITE</h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11412144\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11412144\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Elite-e1587044408140.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"763\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Follow the ins and outs of wealthy Spanish private school kids</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>Not your typical murder mystery, this Spanish thriller TV drama, shows the loves of three working-class students enrolled in a private school through a scholarship.</p>\n<p>However, their wealthy classmates make life anything but easy. Life is made even harder when a student is murdered and her classmates are potential suspects.</p>\n<p>It could be described as a Spanish version of 13 Reasons Why.</p>\n<p>English subtitles and dubbing are available.</p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes audience rating: 88%</i></b></p>\n<h1 title=\"31 March 2020 at 11:19:07 UTC+1\" data-tooltip=\"31 March 2020 at 11:19:07 UTC+1\"><span style=\"text-decoration: underline\"><span style=\"color: #800000;text-decoration: underline\">But wait, there&#8217;s more</span></span></h1>\n<h3><strong>66. The Woods</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11895125\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 730px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11895125 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/NINTCHDBPICT000584561373.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=720\" alt=\"\" width=\"720\" height=\"405\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure> Can Paul solve the mystery of his missing sister?[/caption]</p>\n<p>The Woods follows a prosecutor named Paul Copeland in Warsaw, Poland.</p>\n<p>He investigates the unsolved disappearance of his sister 25 years ago, when she walked into the forest at a summer camp and never came back.</p>\n<p>The unexpected discovery of a body whose death seems to be linked to the disappearance of the girl may finally lead to a breakthrough in the investigation.</p>\n<p><em><b>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: N/A</b></em></p>\n<h3></h3>\n<h3><strong>67. 13 Reasons Why</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11895240\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 778px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11895240 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/NINTCHDBPICT000588705976-2.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=768\" alt=\"\" width=\"768\" height=\"512\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">The fourth and final season of 13 Reasons Why was released on the 5th June 2020</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>It is the story of a young high school student as she descends into despair brought on by betrayal and bullying, culminating with her suicide. She details the thirteen reasons why she was driven to take her life in an audio diary which is mailed to a friend two weeks after her death.</p>\n<p>More drama ensues over the show&#8217;s four seasons which sees several more deaths and violence as the students try to navigate the difficult journey that is high school.</p>\n<p><em><b>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 58%</b></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>68. Queen of the South</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11895506\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 600px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11895506 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/NINTCHDBPICT000584725395.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=590\" alt=\"\" width=\"590\" height=\"350\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure> Teresa sets her sights in becoming the leader if the drug cartel[/caption]</p>\n<p>Queen of the South tells the powerful story of Teresa Mendoza, a woman who is flee her native Mexico and head to America after her drug-dealing boyfriend is shockingly murdered.</p>\n<p>Whilst there she joins forces with an unlikely figure from her past to take down the leader of the same drug trafficking ring that she is trying to escape from.</p>\n<p>However, in the process, she learns all the skills needed to become a drug dealer and cleverly puts herself in a position to become the leader of the Cartel.</p>\n<p><em><b>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 91%</b></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>69. Selling Sunset</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11895653\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11895653 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/NINTCHDBPICT000587512967-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"540\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure> The finest realtors in LA look to sell some lavish properties to affluent buyers[/caption]</p>\n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/11864323/selling-sunset-cast-realtors-age-net-worth/\">Selling Sunset</a> revolves around the high-end residential properties in Los Angeles marketed by the Oppenheim Group&#8217;s real estate brokerage firm.</p>\n<p>The elite agents sell the luxurious life outstanding houses and apartments to some of the most affluent buyers in the city.</p>\n<p>Relationships are everything and that often leads to major drama.</p>\n<p><em><b>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 50%</b></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>70. On my Block</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11895767\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 771px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11895767 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/NINTCHDBPICT000565706589-e1592483299741.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=761\" alt=\"\" width=\"761\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Will the teens friendships remain in tact as they navigate high school?</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>A coming-of-age story about four bright, street-savvy friends navigating their way through high school in the gritty inner city of South Central Los Angeles.</p>\n<p>They find their lifelong friendship tested as they start the difficult journey that is high school.</p>\n<p>Dealing with the danger of getting their friend out of a gang and friends turning into romance, danger is constant.</p>\n<p><em><b>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 92%</b></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3>71. Unsolved Mysteries</h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12184700\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\"><img class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12184700\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/NINTCHDBPICT000593085620-3.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"441\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>The iconic American documentary series has had a revamp on Netflix and it has proved to be a major hit for the streaming service.</p>\n<p>The 12 episode series looks at cold cases and paranormal phenomena, with unexplained events all over the world.</p>\n<p>Viewers are then left to decide for themselves whodunnit after having all the facts presented to them.</p>\n<p><strong><em><b>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 82%</b></em></strong></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3>72. Motherland</h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12184699\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\"><img class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12184699\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/NINTCHDBPICT000528366429.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>WARNING: Use of this image is subject to the terms of use of BBC Pictures&#039; Digital Picture</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>Sharon Morgan is behind this BBC Two comedy which looks at the often exhausting life of middle-class mum Julia (Anna Maxwell Martin), who has to try and navigate the dreaded school gate politics as well as juggle her job and children.</p>\n<p>Sharon also stars in the series as blunt single mum Liz, the cast also features stay-at-home dad Kevin (Paul Ready) and queen of the &#8216;Alpha Mum&#8217;s Amanda (Lucy Punch).</p>\n<p>A third season is due to be released later this year so now is the perfect time to catch up on the first two.</p>\n<p><strong><em><b>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 75%</b></em></strong></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3>73. The Politician</h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12184696\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\"><img class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12184696\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/NINTCHDBPICT000523659883.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"540\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>Glee and American Horror Story creator Ryan Murphy is behind this Netflix series, which follows Payton Hobart in his quest to eventually become the President of the United States.</p>\n<p>Season one follows Payton (Ben Platt) as he campaigns to become student body president at high school, while season two sees him chase after the position of New York State Senate.</p>\n<p>Gwyneth Paltrow plays his mother Georgina while the cast also features big names and guest stars including Bette Midler and Jessica Lange.</p>\n<p><strong><em><b>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 82%</b></em></strong></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3>74. Spaced</h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12184698\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\"><img class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12184698\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/NINTCHDBPICT000001689832.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=778\" alt=\"\" width=\"778\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Channel 4</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>Hit comedy Spaced was one of the first projects between <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/4991437/simon-pegg-movies-nick-frost-ready-player-one-wife-about/\">Simon Pegg and Nick Frost</a>, and despite being over 20 years old, it still raises plenty of laughs.</p>\n<p>Spaced follows Simon&#8217;s aspiring graphic designer Tim after he moves into a London flat with wannabe journalist Daisy, played by Jessica Hynes, who co-wrote the show with Simon.</p>\n<p>Nick plays Tim&#8217;s old school friend, the army-obsessed Mike, while other characters bringing the funny include Daisy&#8217;s snobbish friend Twist (Katy Carmichael), their drunk landlady Marsha (Julia Deakin) and their artsy neighbour Brian (Mark Heap).</p>\n<p><strong><em><b>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 96%</b></em></strong></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3>75. Chewing Gum</h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12184697\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\"><img class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12184697\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/NINTCHDBPICT000189585028.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"690\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>handout</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>Michaela Coel recently wowed us all in BBC drama I May Destroy You, and she proves how versatile she is an actress and writer with her 2015 sitcom, Chewing Gum.</p>\n<p>Michaela plays 24-year-old religious virgin Tracey Gordon, who is desperate to have sex and avoid turning into her uptight older sister Cynthia.</p>\n<p>The show features cringe-worthy moments and some fourth wall breaks to give it an identity all of its own, and turns out to be a real winner.</p>\n<p><strong><em><b>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 83%</b></em></strong></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3>76. Greenleaf</h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12374811\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 778px\"><img class=\"wp-image-12374811 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/NINTCHDBPICT000600544062.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=768\" alt=\"\" width=\"768\" height=\"512\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Will the Greenleaf family get Calvary back?</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>Greenleaf follows the unscrupulous world of the Greenleaf family with scandalous secrets and lies, their palatial family mansion compound, and their sprawling Memphis megachurch with predominantly African-American members.</p>\n<p>The family have now their Calvary which is now in the hands of Harmony and Hope, the family will do whatever they can to take it back.</p>\n<p>What will happen in the fifth and final series which drops on Netflix August 12?</p>\n<p><strong><em><b>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 72%</b></em></strong></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3>77. Bloodline</h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12375186\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"wp-image-12375186 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/NINTCHDBPICT000567741955.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">What does the future hold for the family?</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>Bloodline centers on a close-knit family of four adult siblings whose secrets and scars are revealed when their black sheep brother returns home.</p>\n<p>It is an intriguing story of a well off family in the Florida Keys that have many dark secrets. The siblings are heirs of a beautiful inn that has been in their family for 50 years.</p>\n<p>It is their childhood home with many great memories, but the deep dark past holds many untold tales. All combined makes the future very uncertain.</p>\n<p><strong><em><b>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 76%</b></em></strong></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3>78. The fall</h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12375325\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"wp-image-12375325 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/NINTCHDBPICT000600196186-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"621\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>NETFLIX</figcredit></figure> Will Sean meet his demise?[/caption]</p>\n<p><strong><em><b>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: </b></em><span class=\"unstyled articleLink mop-ratings-wrap__icon-link\"><span class=\"mop-ratings-wrap__percentage\">87%</span></span></strong></p>\n<p>Emmy and Golden Globe winner, Gillian Anderson plays a British detective summoned to Belfast to solve a high-profile murder.</p>\n<p>She goes toe to toe with a seemingly passionate father who is in fact a cold serialist in this procedural out of Belfast.</p>\n<p>The only thing they share is their common complexity.</p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3>79. The Reckoning</h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12375520\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"wp-image-12375520 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/Reckoning-Netflix.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"502\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Will Leo meet his match?</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>Reckoning  explores the darkest corners of the male psyche through the eyes of two fathers, one of whom is a serial-killer.</p>\n<p>It documents the colliding courses of the Russian River Killer, who turns out to be Leo, and Mike Serrato (Aden Young), the homicide detective obsessed with the case.</p>\n<p>His pregnant wife discovers that she was almost an RRK victim, and Detective Serrato realizes that Leo, not John, is the killer.</p>\n<p><strong><em><b>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 62%</b></em></strong></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3>80. Into the night</h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12375682\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 720px\"><img class=\"wp-image-12375682\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/1588233728244_0620x0435_0x0x0x0_1588234021327.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=620\" alt=\"\" width=\"710\" height=\"498\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Will the passengers on the overnight flight from Brussels survive?</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>Into the Night is a Belgian drama-Sci-Fi television show based on Jacek Dukaj&#8217;s novel The Old Axolotl.</p>\n<p>Suddenly, disaster strikes as the sun starts killing everything in its path, causing much panic and confusion.</p>\n<p>Passengers on an overnight flight from Brussels will attempt to survive by any means necessary.</p>\n<p><strong><em>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: </em><span class=\"unstyled articleLink research has found.</strong></p>\n\n\n\n<p>A poll of 2,000 adults has revealed 17% would rather not find out the exact figure they owe.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12492375\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000602122182.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492375\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Getty Images - Getty</figcredit></figure>Taking control of your money worries is the only way to clear debt[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>A further 21% don’t want to worry about something they feel they can’t do anything about.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>But experts say this is worst approach to have, as burying your head in the sand will only make it harder to pay off your <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/debt-help/\">debt</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The research also showed how 16% don’t even bother checking their account on payday because seeing it all fly straight out to pay the bills and debt brings them down.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Another 22% don’t check because they assume their employer won’t make a mistake.</p>\n\n\n\n\t<div class=\"article-boxout\">\n\t\t<div class=\"article-boxout__header theme__background-color\">\n\t\t\t<h3 class=\"article-boxout__headline\">How to cut the cost of your debt</h3>\n\t\t</div>\n\t\t<div class=\"article-boxout__content theme__background-color-rgba-20\">\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<p class=\"article__content--intro\">\n\t\t\t\t\tIF you&#039;re in large amounts of debt it can be really worrying. \t\t\t\t</p>\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t<div>\n<p>Here are some tips from Citizens Advice on how you can take action:</p>\n<p><strong>Check your bank balance on a regular basis &#8211;</strong>&#160;Knowing your spending patterns is the first step to managing your money.</p>\n<p><strong>Work out your budget &#8211;&#160;</strong>By writing down your income and taking away your essential bills such as food and transport. If you have money left over, plan in advance what else you’ll spend or save. If you don’t, look at ways to cut your costs.</p>\n<p><strong>Pay off more than the minimum &#8211;</strong>&#160;If you’ve got credit card debts aim to pay off more than the minimum amount on your credit card each month to bring down your bill quicker.</p>\n<p><strong>Pay your most expensive credit card sooner &#8211;</strong>&#160;If you have more than one credit card and can’t pay them off in full each month, prioritise the most expensive card (the one with the highest interest rate).</p>\n<p><strong>Prioritise your debts</strong>&#160;&#8211; If you’ve got several debts and you can’t afford to pay them all it’s important to prioritise them. Your rent, mortgage, council tax and energy bills should be paid first because the consequences can be more serious if you don&#8217;t pay.</p>\n<p><strong>Get advice</strong>&#160;&#8211; If you’re struggling to pay your debts month after month it’s important you get advice as soon as possible, before they build up even further. </p>\n<p>Speak to:</p>\n<ul>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.nationaldebtline.org/\">National Debtline</a>&#160;&#8211; 0808 808 4000</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://stepchanging.org.uk/?gclid=EAIaIQobChMIjeiH5t-z6QIVVOvtCh0_RA6xEAAYASAAEgJisvD_BwE\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">Step Change</a>&#160;&#8211; 0800 138 1111</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.citizensadvice.org.uk/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">Citizens Advice</a>&#160;&#8211; 0808 800 9060</li>\n</ul>\n</div>\n\t\t</div>\n\t</div>\n\t\n\n\n\n<p>While one in 20 don’t even know how to access or get hold of their payslip in the first place.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>It also emerged more than one in ten rarely check their account balance before making a purchase, but 16% have had their card declined for not having enough left in their bank.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The research, conducted via OnePoll, also found more than a quarter of people admitted to having a &#8220;bury their head in the sand&#8221; attitude towards their cash situation.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>As a result, 36% are worried about the current state of their finances, and three in ten feel they don’t feel they have everything in order.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Maitham Mohsin, head of savings at Skipton Building Society, which commissioned the research, said: &#8220;We all deal with financial stress differently.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;We understand things can be overwhelming but it’s important to start addressing our financial well-being as much as it is our physical and mental health where there has been such focus in recent months.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;If the problem is left alone it’s likely to get worse and impact on other aspects of life.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row \">\n\t\t<div class=\"col sun-col-6\">\n\n\t\t\t<div class=\"rail rail--classic  rail--trending theme-money\" data-slide-count=\"4\" data-slide-count-tablet=\"4\">\t\t\t\t<div class=\"swiper-container\">\n\n\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"rail__header\">\n\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<h3 class=\"rail__title theme__after-color\">Most read in Money</h3>\n\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t</div>\n\n\t\t\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"swiper-pagination theme__swiper-pagination\"></div>\n\n\t\t\t\t\t<div -->\n\t</div><!-- .sun-row .{row} .rail-video-index-->\n\t</div> <!-- .sun-grid-container .sun-grid-container--{color} -->\n\t<!--googleon: all-->\n\t\n\n\n\n<p>The Sun has rounded up <a +0000","feedId":10019,"bgimg":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000602122182.jpg?strip=all&w=960","linkMd5":"51211134ed72f70c12200a120c4140ed","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn1@2020_5/2020/08/25/11-06-27-342_6a460681329ee38f.webp","destWidth":960,"destHeight":640,"sourceBytes":140388,"destBytes":140388,"author":"Levi Winchester","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000602122182.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn1@2020_5/2020/08/25/11-06-27-342_6a460681329ee38f.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598353584686},{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 19:06:24","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 19:06:24","title":"Missing mum found dead next to her malnourished one-year-old baby boy in Glasgow flat after losing right to work","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12491840/missing-mum-dead-glasgow/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p><strong>A MISSING mum was found dead next to her malnourished one-year-old baby in her Glasgow flat after losing her right to work.</strong></p>\n\n\n\n<p>Mercy Baguma was found dead by police on Saturday after concerned friends raised the alarm.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12492034\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 663px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603974299.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=653\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492034\" width=\"653\" height=\"384\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Media Scotland</figcredit></figure>Mercy, who was in her 30s, was living in extreme poverty when she claimed asylum[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12492033\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 306px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603974301.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=296\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492033\" width=\"296\" height=\"420\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Media Scotland</figcredit></figure>Concerned friends raised the alarm after had not heard from the mum in four days[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>It is understood the mum, from Uganda, had lost her job after her limited leave to remain expired and she was no longer allowed to work.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Mercy, who was in her 30s, was living in extreme poverty when she claimed asylum and relying on charity organisations and friends for help. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>The mum was said to have &#8220;adored&#8221; her little boy.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The baby boy, who was found crying and weakened from starvation beside his mum&#8217;s body, is now being cared for by his father, who is understood to be an asylum seeker.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Pals raised the alarm after not hearing from Mercy for four days and police made the grim discovery on August 22.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>On August 11, Mercy had got in touch with charity Positive Action for Housing, to get help.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>No cause of death has yet been established.</p>\n\n\n\n<h2><strong>&#8216;AMAZING MOTHER&#8217;</strong></h2>\n\n\n\n<p>A friend who set up a <a href=\"https://www.gofundme.com/f/mercy-baguma039s-furneal-fund?utm_source=whatsapp-visit&#38;utm_medium=chat&#38;utm_campaign=p_cp+share-sheet\" rel=\"nofollow\">GoFundMe</a> for Mercy said she had &#8220;health problems&#8221; but her death was &#8220;sudden and unexpected&#8221;.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Pal Bridget wrote: &#8220;We are devastated to share that Mercy Baguma  passed away on Saturday 22nd 2020 . </p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;She was an amazing mother, sister, best friend and friend loved by all. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;Mercy was always positive and always put her family first, especially her son.  </p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;Her smile made everyone so welcome and comfortable.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Robina Qureshi, Director of Positive Action in Housing said: “This is the third tragedy to affect the city’s refugee population in as many months.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;Mercy contacted our charity on August 11 and said she was not getting any financial support yet had made an application to MigrantHelp. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;Had she lived she would have been a high priority for a crisis payment from our Emergency Relief Fund like hundreds of others left functionally destitute by the asylum system.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“The question remains, why are mothers and babies being left to go hungry in this city, why is it being left to charities and volunteers to pick up the pieces? Does society have anything to say about that other than call them a drain on society?</p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row \">\n\t\t<div class=\"col sun-col-6\">\n\n\t\t\t<div class=\"rail rail--classic  rail--trending theme-news\" data-slide-count=\"4\" data-slide-count-tablet=\"4\">\t\t\t\t<div class=\"swiper-container\">\n\n\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"rail__header\">\n\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<h3 class=\"rail__title theme__after-color\">Most read in moment man is sent somersaulting over hedge by &#039;road rage driver&#039;\t\t\t</span>\n\t\t\t</div><!-- .rail__item-content -->\n\t<div class=\"rail__item-gradient-light\">\n\n\t</div>\n\t<a .swiper-wrapper -->\n\n\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"swiper-button-prev theme__background-color-rgba-80\"></div>\n\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"swiper-button-next -->\n\t</div><!-- .sun-row .{row} .rail-video-index-->\n\t</div> <!-- .sun-grid-container .sun-grid-container--{color} -->\n\t<!--googleon: all-->\n\t\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;The fact is there is no safety net if you&#8217;re a refugee or migrant. You are left destitute and without resources. And you&#8217;re left silenced by far right rhetoric for being forced to ask for help.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;Would this mother be alive if she was not forced out of her job by this cruel system that stops you from working and paying your way because a piece of paper says your leave to remain has expired? </p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;I’m sure Mercy’s son will want to ask this and other questions once he is old enough.&#8221;</p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Tue, 25 Aug 2020 09:46:30 +0000","feedId":10019,"bgimg":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603974299.jpg?strip=all&w=653","linkMd5":"b391c34db109753f81396862d52534e2","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn70@2020_2/2020/08/25/11-06-26-284_a9ae9d0d46fd6189.webp","destWidth":653,"destHeight":384,"sourceBytes":51620,"destBytes":51620,"author":"Alahna Kindred","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603974299.jpg?strip=all&w=653":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn70@2020_2/2020/08/25/11-06-26-284_a9ae9d0d46fd6189.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603974301.jpg?strip=all&w=296":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx19/cdn64@2020_3/2020/08/25/11-06-29-617_88e42fce4f3c1d1f.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598353584740},{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 19:06:24","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 19:06:24","title":"Kim Jong-un dead rumours – dictator’s sister Kim Yo-Jong would be worse and bigger nuclear threat to US, expert claims","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12491685/kim-jong-un-dead-rumours-sister-yo-jong-nuclear-us/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>KIM Jong-un&#8217;s sister could be a more brutal leader and a bigger nuclear threat to the US than him, experts have said. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Kim Yo Jong, 32, could be poised to seized power as fresh rumours suggest that her despot brother is <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/5518769/kim-jong-un-sister-kim-yo-jong-coma-power/\">currently in a coma</a>. </p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12492298\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000589088399.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492298\" width=\"960\" height=\"714\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>AP:Associated Press</figcredit></figure>Kim Yo Jong could be a more brutal leader than her brother were she to succeed him, experts have said[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12492293\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000580446907.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492293\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>EPA</figcredit></figure>Fresh rumours have emerged about the ill-health of Kim Jong-un[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>The <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/kim-jong-un/\">36-year-old dictator</a> has rarely has rarely been sighted since a reported botched heart operation in April.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Suspicions first arose after he failed to attend celebrations for the Day of the Sun, an important annual event marking the birth of Kim Il-sung, North Korea&#8217;s founder.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>He later re-emerged, but has since only appeared in public intermittently, and is reported to be suffering ongoing health problems.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The rumours have sparked renewed speculation about <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/11443508/kim-jong-un-death-successors-sister/\">the power struggle </a>that could follow in the event of his death. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Kim Yo Jong has become and increasingly central figure in the regime in recent years and is currently thought to be the front-runner to replace her brother. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>David Maxwell is a retired US Army colonel and previously worked with the Pentagon on a contingency plan to prepare for any collapse of the North Korean regime. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Speaking to the <a href=\"https://nypost.com/2020/08/24/kim-yo-jong-could-be-north-koreas-worst-dictator-yet-experts-say/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">New York Post</a>, he said that Kim Yo Jong remained an unknown quantity, but added: &#8220;My speculation — given the reputation and history of the family — is that she would rule with an iron fist.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>He said many experts believed before Kim Jong-un took power that he would be more open to the outside world than his father, but that that hope hadn&#8217;t been realised. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>“I think we have to assume that every successor is worse than the last,&#8221; he said. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Discussion about a likely successor first began again after Chang Song-min, an ex-aide to late South Korean president Kim Dae-Jung, told local media that he believed senior North Korean officials were trying to conceal the truth about Kim Jong-un&#8217;s recent health. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>“I assess him to be in a coma, but his life has not ended,&#8221; he said. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>“A complete succession structure has not been formed, so Kim Yo-jong is being brought to the fore as the vacuum cannot be maintained for a prolonged period.”</p>\n\n\n\n<h2>&#8216;AMBITIOUS AND SMART&#8217;</h2>\n\n\n\n<p>Sung-Yoon Lee, a professor at Tufts University’s Fletcher School of Law and Diplomacy, told the Post that the claims were wholly unsubstantiated, but said Kim Yo Jong was clearly being prepped to take her brother&#8217;s place should it become necessary. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>He said she was &#8220;ambitious and smart&#8221; but that the nature of the role would demand &#8220;she be ruthless, especially in the first few years.”</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“The way for her to build up her credibility and net worth, that is, the way for her to get respect, is not to play nice but be a cruel dictator to her people and a credible nuclear threat to the US,” he said.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“She may prove herself fiercer and more tyrannical than her brother, father, or grandfather.”</p>\n\n\n\n<p>North Korea is known to be pursuing a nuclear weapons programme, and talks between the regime and the Trump administration have so far failed to produce any agreement on disarmament. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Another possible successor is Kim Pyong II, uncle to the siblings, who returned to the country in 2019 after spending years working as a diplomat in Europe. </p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row \">\n\t\t<div class=\"col href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12489411/bbc-ban-words-land-of-hope-and-glory-proms/\">\n\t\t\t\t<div class=\"delayed-image-load-landscape\" Wheeler in the Netflix series, claims her younger co-stars are “oversexualised” and urges fans to “leave them alone”.&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>In a recent interview, the star reflected on teenage sexuality being &#8220;funny and beautiful and awkward and embarrassing”.&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12492898\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000502967916.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492898\" width=\"960\" height=\"474\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Actress Natalia Dyer revealed her thoughts on oversexualising teen actors</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<p>The actress is currently promoting her new movie ‘Yes, God, Yes’, in which she plays an innocent Catholic girl who discovers masturbation after a saucy AOL chat.&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>However, when it comes to the sexualisation of her Stranger Things co-stars the actress made her feelings very clear.&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Speaking to The Independent, she said: “There are so many layers going on here.&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“I generally feel like, to me, it’s oversexualising them. I feel protective over the younger kids even though they’re not kids anymore, they’re teens.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12492911\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"rail__item-gradient-light\">\n\n\t</div>\n\t<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tv/12405952/coronation-street-spoilers-johnny-connor-makes-shock-return-from-france-to-confront-scott/\" class=\"rail__item-anchor\"></a>\n\n</div><!-- .rail__item .swiper-slide -->\n\n<div class=\"rail__item swiper-slide\">\n\n\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"rail__item-image\">\n\t\t\t<a
