19:06:24","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 19:06:24","title":"Meghan Markle and Prince Harry’s relationship ‘leaked by member of Prince Andrew and Princess Eugenie’s team’","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/fabulous/12492053/meghan-markle-prince-harry-relationship-leaked-prince-andrew-eugenie-team/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>MEGHAN Markle and Prince Harry’s relationship was “leaked by a member of Prince Andrew and Princess Eugenie’s team”, it has been claimed. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>According to biography Finding Freedom, the Duke and Duchess of Sussex had been trying to keep their blossoming romance a secret but word got out thanks to a member of royal staff.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_undefined\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/NINTCHDBPICT000343557387-1.jpg?strip=all\" alt=\"The pair on a trip to Africa weeks into their relationship\" class=\"alignnone\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Harry and Meghan &#8216;s relationship is said to have been leaked by a member of Eugenie and Prince Andrew&#8217;s team. Pictured a year into their dating</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<p>Authors Omid Scobie and Carolyn Durand wrote: &#8220;The Sunday Express was going to run with the story of their relationship &#8211; and the tabloid was rumoured to have been tipped off by an employee of none other than Eugenie and her father, Prince Andrew.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Prince Harry and Suits actress Meghan had been flying across the Atlantic to see each other, but barely left their homes as they didn’t want to be spotted.&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>However, on October 31, 2016, they couldn’t hide it any longer as news of their romance was revealed.&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Eugenie, 30, and Prince Harry, 35, are said to be very close, and Eugenie previously played matchmaker for her cousin when she set him up with her actress friend Cressida Bonas. </p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_undefined\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/NINTCHDBPICT000466740906.jpg?strip=all\" alt=\"The couple tried to keep their relationship a secret for as long as possible\" class=\"alignnone\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">The couple tried to keep their relationship a secret for as long as possible</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12492114\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000382597151.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492114\" width=\"960\" height=\"707\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Getty - Contributor</figcredit></figure>Prince Harry is very close to cousins Eugenie, left, and Beatrice, right[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12492122\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000549231829.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492122\" width=\"960\" height=\"745\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Splash News</figcredit></figure>Prince Harry and Meghan Markle began dating in July 2016, according to news agency Reuters[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>According to Finding Freedom: &#8220;Eugenie has always been more than just a cousin to Harry. They were also the closest of friends.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;Out of all the Queen&#8217;s grandchildren, Harry and Eugenie have one of the most natural connections.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;Harry had always confided in his cousin when it came to the women in his life. Not only did he trust her implicitly, but friends say that she gives great advice and has always been ‘beyond wise’ for her years.”</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The authors claim that Eugenie was one of the first royals that Harry told about Meghan. </p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12492125\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 650px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000601353047.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=640\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492125\" width=\"640\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Getty Images - Getty</figcredit></figure>Unofficial royal biography Finding Freedom contains many bombshell revelations about the royals[/caption]\n\n\n\n\t<div class=\"article-boxout\">\n\t\t<div class=\"article-boxout__header theme__background-color\">\n\t\t\t<h3 class=\"article-boxout__headline\">FINDING FREEDOM REVELATIONS</h3>\n\t\t</div>\n\t\t<div class=\"article-boxout__content theme__background-color-rgba-20\">\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t<div>\n<ul>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12231550/prince-harry-told-meghan-markle-i-love-you-first-three-months-into-whirlwind-romance-new-book-claims/\">Harry told Meg &#8216;I love you&#8217; first three months into their whirlwind romance</a></li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12230947/meghan-markle-worked-press-paparazzi-photos/\">Anti-paparazzi Meghan CONSPIRED with snappers to set up shots herself</a></li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12231599/prince-charles-crushed-by-harry/\">Harry gave Charles 20 minutes&#8217; notice before crushing his Middle East tour</a></li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12229901/prince-harry-meghan-markle-secret-engagement-botswana-two-months-earlier/\">Harry and Meg secretly got engaged two months before they told the world</a></li>\n</ul>\n</div>\n\t\t</div>\n\t</div>\n\t\n\n\n\n<p>Eugenie and Harry took many holidays together as kids with mums Princess Diana and Sarah Ferguson, and they enjoyed the London clubbing scene together when they were older.&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Omid and Carolyn wrote: &#8220;The two had many nights out together, sneaking into back entrances of clubs, such as Mahiki, where Jack was once a manager, or Tonteria, where in one of the VIP cave areas, they downed shots from Mexican skull-shaped glasses and a giant frozen margarita (with multiple straws).&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Prince Harry and Meghan Markle began dating in July 2016, according to news agency Reuters, and the couple announced their engagement in November 2017, ahead of their May 2018 wedding.</p>\n\n\n\n\t<div class=\"article-boxout\">\n\t\t<div class=\"article-boxout__header theme__background-color\">\n\t\t\t<h3 class=\"article-boxout__headline\">TIMELINE OF MEGHAN AND HARRY&#039;S RELATIONSHIP</h3>\n\t\t</div>\n\t\t<div class=\"article-boxout__content theme__background-color-rgba-20\">\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t<div>\n<ul>\n<li><strong>In late October 2016</strong>, it was reported that glamorous actress Meghan, who played Rachel Zane in legal drama Suits, was secretly dating Prince Harry. A close pal of the royal confirmed they had been dating for several months, in an interview with People.</li>\n<li><strong>On November 8, 2016</strong>,&#160;<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/2139093/prince-harry-confirms-he-has-been-dating-suits-actress-meghan-markle-for-months/\">Kensington Palace confirmed the pairing with a statement, saying the Prince was worried for her safety</a>.</li>\n<li><strong>On December 14, 2016</strong>,&#160;<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/2401773/first-pictures-prince-harry-meghan-markle-date-london/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">The Sun published exclusive first pictures of Harry and Meghan</a>&#160;&#8211; who is three years his senior &#8211; as they were spotted hand-in-hand, while out on a date in London. At the time, pals said actress Meghan had “virtually moved in” to Harry’s cottage at Kensington Palace with the couple having been “inseparable” for weeks.</li>\n<li><strong>On May 6, 2017</strong>,&#160;<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/3498098/meghan-markle-prince-harry-playing-polo/\">Meghan made her first public appearance as royal girlfriend</a>&#160;when she proudly watched Prince Harry playing polo in Berkshire.</li>\n</ul>\n<ul>\n<li><strong>On September 25</strong>,&#160;<strong>2017,</strong>&#160;the pair were&#160;<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/4544416/prince-harry-meghan-markle-invictus-games-2017-pictures-together/\">pictured together in Toronto as they attended the Invictus Games</a>, Prince Harry&#8217;s sporting competition for wounded service personnel.</li>\n<li><strong>On October 1, 2017</strong>, during the games closing ceremony,&#160;<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/4586484/prince-harry-meghan-markle-kiss-invictus-games/\">the pair were spotted in an embrace and at one point the pair shared a kiss</a>. It came as they sat in the stadium beside Meghan&#8217;s mum Doria.</li>\n<li><strong>On October 19, 2017</strong>, it was reported&#160;<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/4717114/harry-takes-meghan-for-hour-long-lunch-with-the-queen-sparking-fresh-engagement-rumours/\">Harry had taken Meghan to Buckingham Palace for a meal with his grandmother &#8211; Her Majesty the Queen</a>.</li>\n<li><strong>On November 14, 2017</strong>, speculation grew about&#160;<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/4912778/meghan-markle-wedding-dress-patrick-j-adams-suits-quit-rachel-mike/\">Meghan&#8217;s exit from Suits when a source told Us Weekly her departure would be easier as co-star Patrick J. Adams had also decided it was time to leave</a>. The insider said that Patrick&#8217;s exit storyline &#8220;will make it an easy break for Meghan to leave as well&#8221;.</li>\n<li><strong>On November 26, 2017</strong>, it was reported&#160;<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/5000859/theresa-may-briefed-over-imminent-prince-harry-and-meghan-markle-engagement/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">Palace officials briefed PM Theresa May on Prince Harry and Meghan Markle’s &#8220;imminent” engagement.</a></li>\n<li><strong>On November 27, 2017</strong>, it was announced that the couple were&#160;<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/4989154/prince-harry-meghan-markle-engaged-wedding-married/\">engaged to be married in spring 2018</a>. After a photocall at Kensington Palace, they gave their first joint interview to the BBC.</li>\n<li><strong>On December 15, 2017</strong>,&#160;&#160;<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/fabulous/5008840/meghan-markle-prince-harry-wedding-date-may-19-2018/\">Kensington Palace confirmed the ceremony will be held on Saturday, May 19, 2018.</a></li>\n<li><strong>On March 22, 2018,&#160;</strong><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/5876226/royal-wedding-prince-harry-meghan-markle-public-invitations/\">Meghan and Harry sent out their Royal Wedding invitations.</a></li>\n<li><strong>On May 19, 2018,&#160;</strong>Prince Harry and Meghan Markle&#160;<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/6324880/prince-harry-first-married-kiss-royal-wedding-meghan-markle/\">wed in Windsor</a>&#160;in front of their family, friends and the world.</li>\n<li><strong>On October 15 2019,&#160;</strong>Harry and Meghan announce they are expecting their first child in Spring 2019.</li>\n<li><strong>On May 6, 2019,&#160;</strong>at 5.27am,&#160;<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/9026078/meghan-markle-prince-harry-royal-baby-sussex/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">Meghan Markle gave birth to a healthy baby boy</a>, weighing 7lbs 3oz. Unlike Prince William and Kate Middleton, Harry and Meghan opted for their baby&#8217;s arrival to take place in Windsor.</li>\n<li><strong>On May 19, 2019,&#160;</strong>Meghan and Harry celebrated their&#160;<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/9106928/royal-wedding-anniversary-how-meghan-markle-prince-harry-celebrate-first-anniversary-where-ceremony-held/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">first wedding anniversary</a>&#160;by thanking everyone for &#8220;all of the love&#160;</li>\n</ul>\n</div>\n\t\t</div>\n\t</div>\n\t\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: .sun-grid-container .sun-grid-container--{color} -->\n\t<!--googleon: all-->\n\t\n\n\n\n<p>It&#8217;s not clear how or when precisely <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/3856690/prince-harry-age-meghan-markle-royal-wedding-height-net-worth/\">Harry</a> and <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/fabulous/4540255/markus-anderson-meghan-markle-prince-harry/\">Soho House director Markus Anderson</a> at the Invictus Games.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Meanwhile, we shared how <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12374640/prince-harry-friendship-eugenie-upset-meghan-markle/\">Princess Eugenie ‘was upset Meghan Markle revealed pregnancy at her wedding and felt she should’ve waited’.</a></p>\n\n\n\n\t\t<!-- Start of Brightcove Player -->\n\n\t\t\t\t\t<div style=\"display: block; position: relative; min-width: 0px; max-width: 640px;\">\n\t\t\t\t<div style=\"padding-top: -->\n\n\t\t\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Tue, 25 Aug 2020 10:20:01 +0000","feedId":10019,"bgimg":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/NINTCHDBPICT000343557387-1.jpg?strip=all","linkMd5":"c0b445a74114b496add67f9ea733d04e","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx30/cdn23@2020_4/2020/08/25/11-06-25-506_ea6d6389138d7f0b.webp","destWidth":1018,"destHeight":1101,"sourceBytes":363804,"destBytes":363804,"author":"Becky Pemberton","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/NINTCHDBPICT000343557387-1.jpg?strip=all":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx30/cdn23@2020_4/2020/08/25/11-06-25-506_ea6d6389138d7f0b.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/NINTCHDBPICT000466740906.jpg?strip=all":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn37@2020_4/2020/08/25/11-06-41-620_d71498ad584d7009.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000382597151.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn5@2020_4/2020/08/25/11-06-35-607_42d688e17c9fd711.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000549231829.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx23/cdn9@2020_6/2020/08/25/11-06-36-975_4b39c4e92644a184.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000601353047.jpg?strip=all&w=640":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx25/cdn46@2020_1/2020/08/25/11-06-38-534_64b81dd987f602f0.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598353584681},{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 19:06:24","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 19:06:24","title":"Harry Maguire brawled with Albanian ‘gangster’ who stabbed sister Daisy in arm with metal straw after she rejected him","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/12479782/harry-maguire-arrested-help-sister/","description":"<p><strong>HARRY Maguire was arrested by Greek police after trying to help his sister who was stabbed in the arm by a “gangster-style” Albanian businessman.</strong></p> \n<p>Sources on Sunday night said the <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/harry-maguire/\">Manchester United captain</a> was with partner Fern Hawkins in a bar in <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/where/mykonos/\">Mykonos </a>on Thursday when his sister Daisy was approached by a group of Albanian men.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12480007\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 615px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/55ee7db2-bde1-4489-a974-ad53d32ac932.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=605\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12480007\" width=\"605\" height=\"960\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  Eamonn and James Clarke\n </figcredit>\n</figure>Harry Maguire was arrested after trying to help sister in Greece[/caption] \n<figure id=\"attachment_12479980\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603463914.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12479980\" width=\"960\" height=\"532\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">\n  A group near Harry were seen getting rowdy\n </figcaption>\n <figcredit></figcredit>\n</figure> \n<p>One of the men — described by sources as “gangster types” — started chatting up Daisy.</p> \n<p>And when she turned him down, she was jabbed in the arm with a sharp metal straw, drawing blood and causing her to faint. <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/12471071/harry-maguire-greece-mykonos-sister-court-brawl/\">Harry</a> then stepped in before a fight broke out.</p> \n<p>A source said: “Harry saw what was happening and remonstrated with them and things got heated.</p> \n<p>“He decided to try to get out of there and wanted to hail a taxi. But he ended up arguing with some undercover police officers and ended up at the local police station.”</p> \n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/12473969/harry-maguire-bar-bill-mykonos-arrest-punching-cop-sister-stabbed/\">Maguire, 27,</a> and his pals had also been furious a day ­earlier after bar staff refused to tackle Brits who taunted him.</p> \n<p>Following his arrest, he spent the rest of the night in a detention room at Mykonos police station, where he charmed cops by chatting with them about footie.</p> \n<p>They brought the United ­captain snacks until he was taken on a ferry to neighbouring Syros at 2pm on Friday. He spent the night in a cell there.</p> \n<p>The £190,000-a-week footballer was then bailed and told he could leave the country after he denied a string of charges for assault, verbal abuse and bribery on Saturday.</p> \n<p>He is believed to have returned to the UK on Sunday.</p> \n<p>Maguire does not have to attend his trial in Syros on Tuesday where the maximum sentence could be three years in jail.</p> \n<p>The Sun understands the star could instead receive a suspended sentence.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12479970\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 857px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603271506.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=847\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12479970\" width=\"847\" height=\"939\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  Refer to Caption\n </figcredit>\n</figure>Maguire’s sister Daisy is said to have been approached by a group of Albanian men[/caption] \n<figure id=\"attachment_12479966\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 660px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603296322-3.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=650\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12479966\" width=\"650\" height=\"680\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  AP:Associated Press\n </figcredit>\n</figure>Maguire is escorted by police officers at the police station on the Aegean island[/caption] \n<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/ac-map-harry-maguire-mykonos-v3.jpg\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/ac-map-harry-maguire-mykonos-v3.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-large wp-image-12466574\" width=\"960\" height=\"767\" /></a> \n<p>&nbsp;</p> \n<img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/TM-graphic-Maguire-NEW-v2.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=797\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12475166\" width=\"797\" height=\"960\" /> \n<p>The Sun previously revealed how Maguire and his pals had <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/12473969/harry-maguire-bar-bill-mykonos-arrest-punching-cop-sister-stabbed/\">racked up a huge £63k bill in five hours</a> during their three-day binge leading up to the brawl.</p> \n<p>He had jetted to the holiday island after <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/12419679/sevilla-man-utd-europa-league-semi-final-report/\">Manchester United crashed out of the Europa League to Sevilla</a>, hitting the bars and clubs with pals. </p> \n<p>But he also attracted attention from rival fans, who hurled sick insults at him before Thursday night’s fateful brawl.</p> \n<p>On Tuesday it is claimed&nbsp;<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/harry-maguire/\">the England centre-back</a>, 27, and others racked up a £63,000 bar tab in a five-hour session.</p> \n<p>The group, including footballer&nbsp;<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/ross-barkley/\">Ross Barkley</a>, 26, downed expensive booze and scoffed lobster.</p> \n<p>They were also joined by Love Island’s star&nbsp;<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/chris-hughes/\">Chris Hughes</a>, 27, snooker ace Judd Trump, 31, and Harry’s brother Joe, who plays for Accrington Stanley.</p> \n<p>Maguire and his entourage sank bottles of vintage champagne, ­firework-decorated cocktails and spirits at the exclusive SantAnna beach bar.</p> \n<p>Their huge spending included an £18,000 bottle of Dom Perignon Brut 2002 bubbly.</p> \n<p>They also splashed out on a £17,000 bottle of Armand de ­Brignac Champagne, plus £750 on three bottles of Jack Daniel’s.</p> \n<p>The stars lined their stomachs with £1,200 of lobster, seven ­ribeye steaks costing £820 as well as Greek meze platters and Wagyu beef rolls.</p> \n<p>Maguire paid a fraction of the total bill and mainly drinks beer.</p> \n<p>The players got boozed up in the VIP area while dancing by private sunbeds, which cost more than £2,000 to hire out.</p> \n<p>The following evening, things took a nastier turn when Maguire and his party went to the Cosi Bar in Mykonos.</p> \n<p>There Maguire was taunted by a group of rival supporters who chanted “f*** United’’ and made disparaging remarks about the 6ft 4in defender’s ability.</p> \n<p>Witnesses also claimed they made sickening references to the devastating 1958&nbsp;<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/5510245/manchester-united-players-survivors-clock-munich-air-disaster/\">Munich air disaster</a>.</p> \n<p>Footage obtained by The Sun on Sunday shows three men ­jeering and gesticulating towards Maguire who is visibly uncomfortable and appears tense.</p> \n<p>He is seen walking away and looking at his phone while the grinning tourists sing and point at him.</p> \n<p>However, things did not turn ­violent. Later Maguire and his group are said to have gone to a party at a swanky private villa hired out by a Greek businessman.</p> \n<p>Cops were eventually called to break it up at 4.15am.</p> \n<p>A partygoer claimed: “Harry was there, but he managed to get out when the police came. Harry was enjoying himself with his friends. He wasn’t misbehaving.’’</p> \n<p>In the early hours of Friday morning, Maguire and two pals were accused of brawling with another group and cops outside a nightclub.</p> \n<p>Police said they continued scrapping at the station before allegedly offering officers bribes to drop the case.</p> \n<p>A spokesperson for the Greek police said: “Patrolling police officers in the area of Mykonos intervened to settle a dispute between a group.</p> \n<p>“However, three foreigners involved in the incident turned against them, insulting and hitting a police officer with fists.</p> </div>\n <!-- .sun-row .{row} .rail-video-index--> \n</div> \n<!-- .sun-grid-container .sun-grid-container--{color} --> \n<!--googleon: all--> \n<p>“The three foreigners were taken to the Mykonos Police Station, where upon their arrival they strongly resisted, pushing and beating three police officers.</p> \n<p>“Then one of the detainees tried to offer money so the process against them would not be completed.’’</p> \n<p>Maguire was bought from&nbsp;<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/team/1196651/leicester-city/\">Leicester City</a>&nbsp;for £85million last summer, a world record sum for a defender.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12479977\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603248204.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12479977\" width=\"960\" height=\"657\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  Reuters\n </figcredit>\n</figure>Harry plays as a centre back for Premier League club Manchester United[/caption] \n<!-- Start of Brightcove Player --> \n<div style=\"display: block; position: relative; min-width: 0px; max-width: 640px;\"> \n <div style=\"padding-top: 56%; \"> \n  <video +0000","feedId":10019,"bgimg":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/55ee7db2-bde1-4489-a974-ad53d32ac932.jpg?strip=all&w=605","linkMd5":"38f71a923fb80ce028f17992483d7600","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn5@2020_2/2020/08/25/11-06-26-728_bc5e154879ffc948.webp","destWidth":605,"destHeight":960,"sourceBytes":113870,"destBytes":113870,"author":"Sean Gallen","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/55ee7db2-bde1-4489-a974-ad53d32ac932.jpg?strip=all&w=605":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn5@2020_2/2020/08/25/11-06-26-728_bc5e154879ffc948.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603463914.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx25/cdn26@2020_3/2020/08/25/11-06-45-594_76dc3fc06fba5146.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603271506.jpg?strip=all&w=847":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx/cdn32@2020_6/2020/08/25/11-06-31-070_dcc23e7ee55a9808.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603296322-3.jpg?strip=all&w=650":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn49@2020_6/2020/08/25/11-06-35-879_07d3ad46a85dfa45.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/ac-map-harry-maguire-mykonos-v3.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn6@2020_2/2020/08/25/11-06-45-124_34df83f5564e7ee5.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/TM-graphic-Maguire-NEW-v2.jpg?strip=all&w=797":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx13/cdn24@2020_4/2020/08/25/11-06-29-380_08712ba325f03a14.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603248204.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn41@2020_1/2020/08/25/11-06-42-841_ec0bd521bfa4e06a.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598353584752},{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 19:06:24","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 19:06:24","title":"California fires 2020 map: Where are the wildfires now?","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12440549/california-fires-map-timeline-dead-burn/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>WILDFIRES have been raging across California &#8211; burning through 1.1 MILLION acres of land, whilst destroying homes and precious forestry.  </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Hot weather and dry landscape has made the West Coast state susceptible to them, with <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/where/los-angeles/\">Los Angeles</a>, San Francisco and <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/where/sacramento/\">Sacramento</a> trying to keep the fires under control.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12442273\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000602796713-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12442273\" width=\"960\" height=\"609\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>AP:Associated Press</figcredit></figure>Firefighters take refuge in their trucks in a cleared field as a wildfire also known as the Hennessey Fire jumped Knoxville Berryessa Road, west of Sacramento, California[/caption]\n\n\n\n<h2>California fires map</h2>\n\n\n\n<p>Fires have broken out in several places across California and have prompted Gavin Newsom, the state governor, to declare a state of emergency.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>On August 22 President Trump declared the wildfires a major disaster and released federal aid for the state.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Governor Newsom said the aid will help people in counties affected by the fires with crisis counselling, housing and other social services.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12441811\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 796px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/KH-MAP-US-CALIFORNIA-BUSHFIRES-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=786\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12441811\" width=\"786\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">California governor Gavin Newsom has declared a state of emergency as hot weather conditions spark a string of wildfires</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<p>Tragically, the pilot of a helicopter fighting the raging fires has lost their life after the aircraft crashed.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Stretched fire services are trying to get a grip of the crisis in several places including at San Mateo, Nevada and <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12390640/california-wildfires-lake-hughes-los-angeles/\">Lake Hughes</a> where a fire has now burned through 21,000 acres.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12452393\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000602952863-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12452393\" width=\"960\" height=\"639\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>AP:Associated Press</figcredit></figure>Smoke has engulfed the surrounding areas[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>Most worrying for firefighters at the moment is the SCU Lightning Complex fire &#8211; made up of fires burning in several Bay Area counties &#8211; which has so far consumed 25,000 acres and very little has been contained.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>More than a million acres is on fire right now &#8211; an area five times the size of New York &#8211; and four times the size of all the wildfires that occurred in California in 2019.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12442294\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000602773906.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12442294\" width=\"960\" height=\"637\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>AP:Associated Press</figcredit></figure>Members of the Grizzly Firefighters bravely fight the Carmel Fire near Carmel Valley, California[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>Firefighters are having to prioritise which fires to fight, with state resources stretched to a capacity not seen before.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The blaze currently burning in wine country now ranked as the second largest in state history.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>At least seven people have died so far in the blaze.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12476411\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603159165-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12476411\" width=\"960\" height=\"632\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>AFP or licensors</figcredit></figure>People watch the Walbridge fire, part of the larger LNU Lightning Complex fire, from a vineyard in Healdsburg[/caption]\n\n\n\n<h2>What&#8217;s happened so far?</h2>\n\n\n\n<p><strong>AUGUST 2020</strong></p>\n\n\n\n<ul><li>On August 25, at least seven people have died from the blaze which has covered 1.1 million acres of land.</li><li>On August 22 President Donald Trump declared the wildfires a major disaster and released federal aid.</li><li>On August 21 about <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12471014/california-wildfires-footage-cars/\">100,000 people were under</a> evacuation orders as more than 12,000 firefighters aided by helicopters and air tankers are battling the blazes.   </li><li>On August 20 the pilot of a helicopter fighting the raging fires lost their life after the aircraft crashed.</li><li>On August 18, California <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12439961/california-declares-state-of-emergency-wildfires/\">declared a state of emergency</a> after the extreme temperatures caused more fires to break out, many sparked by lightning strikes. The state also had to deal with mass power outages as residents desperately turned up their air conditions.</li><li>On August 18, several wildfires break out in areas such as Carmel Valley in Monterey County.</li><li>On August 16, Death Valley National Park, California, <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12421802/california-death-valley-hottest-temperature-earth/\">smashed the record</a> for highest temperature ever reliably recorded on Earth. Death Valley hit an extraordinary 30F (54.4C), beating their own record set in 2013 of 129.2F (54C).</li><li>On August 13, 100 homes had to be evacuated as huge fires <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12390640/california-wildfires-lake-hughes-los-angeles/\">broke out at Lake Hughes</a>, just outside of Los Angeles.</li><li>On August 12, a firefighter dies while battling a blaze in Kern County.</li></ul>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12442320\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000602773908.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12442320\" width=\"960\" height=\"602\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>AP:Associated Press</figcredit></figure>Hot weather is aiding the raging infernos[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12476415\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603439224.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12476415\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>AP:Associated Press</figcredit></figure>Firefighters in the backyard of a home in front of the advancing fires[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p><strong>July 2020</strong></p>\n\n\n\n<ul><li>On July 22, a fire in Modoc County begins and burns through a devastating 83,000 acres before it is contained.</li><li>On July 20, a Lassen County blaze begins which goes on to injure two firefighters and takes 18 days to fully contain.</li></ul>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12476418\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603335962.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12476418\" width=\"960\" height=\"639\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>AP:Associated Press</figcredit></figure>Solano County Community Animal Response Team volunteers comfort a llama injured by the fires[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p><strong>May 2020</strong></p>\n\n\n\n<ul><li>On May 3, the first major recorded wildfire of the year breaks out in Kings County, tearing through 2060 acres</li></ul>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12442320\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000602773908.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12442320\" width=\"960\" height=\"602\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>AP:Associated Press</figcredit></figure>A helicopter carrying water to drop on the the Carmel Fire flies over Georis Winery near Carmel Valley, California[/caption]\n\n\n\n<h2>Have there been evacuations?</h2>\n\n\n\n<p>Evacuations order were in effect or growing in the Napa county wine country north of San Francisco Bay, near Salinas in Monterey county, around Oroville Dam north of Sacramento and near the Nevada state line north of Lake Tahoe.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Evacuation orders have also been issued in the mountains along the borders of San Mateo and Santa Cruz counties and in parts of Sonoma County.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>About 100,000 people are under evacuation orders as more than 12,000 firefighters aided by helicopters and air tankers are battling the blazes.&#160;&#160;&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Three groups of fires, called complexes, burning north, east and south of San Francisco have together scorched 991 square miles, destroyed more than 500 structures and killed six people.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12442291\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000602773909-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12442291\" width=\"960\" height=\"721\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>AP:Associated Press</figcredit></figure>A firefighter points as a blaze breaks out in the distance[/caption]\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row \">\n\t\t<div class=\"col sun-col-6\">\n\n\t\t\t<div -->\n\t<!--googleon: all-->\n\t\n\n\n\n<h2>How did the wildfires start?</h2>\n\n\n\n<p>Wildfires usually start by the heat of the sun causing a small fire to break out in woodlands, which grows as it consumes the flammable material around it. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>While that is largely the case here as well, there have been many reports of some of the newest wildfires breaking out because of recent lightning strikes from the tropical storm.</p>\n\n\n\n\t\t<!-- Start of Brightcove Player -->\n\n\t\t\t\t\t<div style=\"display: block; position: relative; min-width: 0px; max-width: 19:06:24","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 19:06:24","title":"Who is Donald Trump Jr’s partner Kimberly Guilfoyle?","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12491410/who-is-donald-trump-jr-kimberly-guilfoyle/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>KIMBERLY Guilfoyle is the partner of Donald Trump Jr &#8211; the President&#8217;s son.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>But when did the couple meet, and who is she?</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12491629\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603922559.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491629\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>AP:Associated Press</figcredit></figure>Kimberly Guilfoyle, 51, has been friends with the Trump family for years[/caption]\n\n\n\n<h2>Who is Kimberly Guilfoyle?</h2>\n\n\n\n<p>Kimberly Guilfoyle, 51, is an American&#160;attorney and television news personality who co-hosted&#160;The Five&#160;on&#160;Fox News.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>She was born in San Francisco in 1969 to a Puerto Rican mother and Irish father, and trained to be a lawyer &#8211; before appearing on multiple legal TV shows. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>In 2018, The Washington Post described Guilfoyle as a &#8220;conservative cheerleader for President Trump&#8221; and has been friends with the family for many years.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Guilfoyle was reported to be the chair of the finance committee of the Trump Victory Committee earlier this year. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>She <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12029335/donald-trump-jr-kim-guilfoyle-positive-coronavirus-mount-rushmore/\">tested positive for coronavirus</a> in July 2020, but said she was feeling well and <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12037977/kimberly-guilfoyle-looking-forward-campaigning-trump/\">hoped to recover quickly.</a> </p>\n\n\n\n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/donald-trump-jr/\">Donald Trump Jr</a> did not test positive for the virus.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_1083565\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/07/NINTCHDBPICT000537828491-e1593828997115.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone wp-image-1083565\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Donald Trump Jr and Kimberly Guilfoyle</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div -->\n\t<!--googleon: all-->\n\t\n\n\n\n<h2>When did she meet Donald Trump Jr?</h2>\n\n\n\n<p>Guilfoyle has been friends with the Trump family for years &#8211; but news leaked in May 2018 that she and <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12490731/donald-trump-jr-eyes-red-glossy/\">Donald Trump Jr </a>were dating.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The pair attended an event together, causing media speculation.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Guilfoyle has been married twice before &#8211; her first husband, Gavin  Newsom, was also in the political world, serving as mayor of San Francisco in 2003.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>She married her second husband Eric Villency in 2006, however the couple announced their split just three years later, after having a son together.</p>\n\n\n\n\t\t<!-- Start of it","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/fabulous/12491363/mayo-cleaning-hack/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p><strong>A WOMAN who ruined her wood floor with a steam mop told how she removed the grubby stain using MAYO.</strong> We were amazed too&#8230;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Revealing the brilliant hack on the Facebook page <a href=\"https://www.facebook.com/groups/987329921324017/?post_id=3450682151655436\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noreferrer noopener\">Home Cleaning Tips and Tricks</a>, she explained how the unusual condiment came to the rescue. </p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12491469\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 819px\"><img /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Home Cleaning Tips and Tricks</figcredit></figure>The woman had ruined her wood floor with a steam mop[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>She said: &#8220;So today I used a steam mop on my laminate floor it stained the floor I thought I would have to replace the floor boards despite popular belief that is not easy. (sic)</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;Then two women mentioned mayonnaise and a low temp iron it worked like a charm!&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>It worked &#8211; and looks brilliant.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12491472\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 609px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/MAYO2.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=599\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491472\" width=\"599\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Home Cleaning Tips and Tricks</figcredit></figure>And afterwards &#8211; you can really tell the difference[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12491473\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/MAYO3.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491473\" width=\"960\" height=\"746\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Home Cleaning Tips and Tricks</figcredit></figure>A quick iron at a low temperature improved it even further[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>Afterwards she improved it even further by ironing over it at a low temperature.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>People were really impressed. &#8220;Ahhhh!! So glad the iron worked! Great job and thanks for showing us the after!&#8221; one woman said.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;Mayo???? That’s crazy! I bet that works for a lot of things. pay cheque equates to £80.6million over five years. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>The German star, 21, proved his potential after scoring 18 goals for the Bundesliga side last term. </p>\n\n\n\n<hr here for the latest Blues news</a></strong></h3>\n\n\n\n<hr class=\"wp-block-separator\" />\n\n\n\n<p>He will earn more than double the likes of N&#8217;Golo Kante and Christian Pulisic next season. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Fellow German <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/timo-werner/\">Timo Werner</a> will be the Blues&#8217; second best-paid player on £170,000-a-week following his move from RB Leipzig.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Goalkeeper Kepa Arrizabalaga and midfielder <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/ngolo-kante/\">Kante</a> both pocket £150k each week.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure Press</figcredit></figure>Chelsea have reached an agreement to sign Kai Havertz [/caption]\n\n\n\n<img -->\n\t<!--googleon: all-->\n\t\n\n\n\n<p>Lampard is on a mission to turn his team into title contenders after they  finished fourth this season.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>As well as forking out £53million on Timo Werner, he has signed Hakim Ziyech for £36.5m.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>And they are believed to be on the brink of <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/12488259/chelsea-agree-thiago-silva-deal/\">wrapping up the free transfer of Paris Saint-Germain centre-back Thiago Silva</a>, 35.</p>\n\n\n\n<a -->\n\n\t\t\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Tue, 25 Aug 2020 10:02:20 +0000","feedId":10019,"bgimg":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/DD-COMPOSITE-CHELSEA-TOP-EARNERS-25-AUG-2.jpg?strip=all&w=960","linkMd5":"ec0f1a8f51c6c6a0a854cd389f363118","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx25/cdn26@2020_4/2020/08/25/11-06-26-388_bce99c7ac8fcd2db.webp","destWidth":960,"destHeight":769,"sourceBytes":254448,"destBytes":254448,"author":"Anthony Chapman","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/DD-COMPOSITE-CHELSEA-TOP-EARNERS-25-AUG-2.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx25/cdn26@2020_4/2020/08/25/11-06-26-388_bce99c7ac8fcd2db.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/NINTCHDBPICT000601216300.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn26@2020_4/2020/08/25/11-06-43-787_c8dd4642d23cd350.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/DD-COMPOSITE-KAI-STATS-NEW.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn5@2020_1/2020/08/25/11-06-37-272_45e1473d216c5138.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/SPORTS-GRAPHIC-EXPENSIVE-SIGNINGS-CHELSEA-v2.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn53@2020_1/2020/08/25/11-06-29-438_f038987f33fbffa3.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598353584751},{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 19:06:24","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 19:06:24","title":"Coronavirus deaths fall for 17th week in a row – as heatwave and flu prove more deadly","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12492165/coronavirus-deaths-fall-17th-week-heatwave-flu-prove-deadly/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p><strong>CORONAVIRUS deaths in the UK have fallen for the seventeenth week in a row as the flu and the recent heatwave proved to be deadly for Brits.</strong></p>\n\n\n\n<p>Data from the Office for National Statistics (ONS)&#160;has today revealed that deaths have risen above average for the first time since June.</p>\n\n\n\n<p><strong><img src=\"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/26a0.png\" alt=\"⚠\" class=\"wp-smiley\" style=\"height: 1em; max-height: 1em;\" /> Read our <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12383728/coronavirus-uk-news-deaths-live-latest-schools/\">coronavirus live blog</a> for the latest news &#38; updates</strong></p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12492430\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/9c53cfbc-64e8-4451-9935-00ac2c5a95e1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492430\" width=\"960\" height=\"759\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>ONS</figcredit></figure>Graph above shows Covid deaths have continued to decrease against the flu[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>Experts say the <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/uknews/12353888/uk-weather-today-heatwave-beaches/\">heatwave experienced earlier this month</a> could explain the increase.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>In England and Wales there were 9,392 deaths from all causes in the week ending August 14.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>This equates to more than 447 deaths compared to the previous week.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>This took the number of deaths that week to 3.4 per cent above the average for this time of year over the past five years &#8211; the first time the average has been exceeded since June 12</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Data from the ONS revealed that deaths from Covid-19 are continuing to fall.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>There were 139 deaths registered in the week ending August 14 that mentioned &#8220;novel coronavirus&#8221;, an 8.6 per cent fall from the 152 deaths in the previous week.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12492463\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/Screenshot-2020-08-25-at-11.05.35.png?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492463\" width=\"960\" height=\"861\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>ONS</figcredit></figure>Graph shows the number of excess deaths involving Covid have decreased[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>This is the lowest count since before the nation went into lockdown in March.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The ONS stated that in week 33, 12.1 per cent of all deaths mentioned &#8220;influenza and pneumonua&#8221;, Covid-19 or both, compared to just 13 per cent in week 13.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>It said it had included influenza and pneumonia for comparison &#8220;as a well-understood cause of death involving respiratory infection that is likely to have somewhat similar risk factors to Covid-19.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>In week 32 influenza and pneumonia were mentioned 1,013 times on death certificates and in week 33 this figure was 1,002.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Looking at Covid-19 and this was mentioned 152 times in week 32 and 139 times in week 33.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Over the last several weeks, deaths from flu and influenza have been between 900 and 1,000 a week, but dropped to 879 in week 29.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Data from the ONS revealed that over the last eight weeks, influenza and pneumonia have been mentioned on the death certificate 7,639 times, while Covid has been mentioned 2,500.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>It comes just days after the ONS also revealed that the <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12462917/coronavirus-eighth-biggest-killer-england-four-times-died-dementia/\">coronavirus had dropped to the eighth biggest killer</a> in the UK.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Conditions such as dementia and heart disease have now overtaken the virus.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>In July there were 38,179 deaths registered in England, with the coronavirus accounting for just 2.6 per cent of all deaths.</p>\n\n\n\n<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/ac-graphic-UK-deaths-per-day-linegraph-24-AUG-1.jpg\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/ac-graphic-UK-deaths-per-day-linegraph-24-AUG-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-large wp-image-12486897\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /></a>\n\n\n\n<p>&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/ac-graphic-UK-cases-per-day-linegraph-24-AUG-2-1.jpg\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/ac-graphic-UK-cases-per-day-linegraph-24-AUG-2-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-large wp-image-12491941\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /></a>\n\n\n\n<p>&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>This equates to 976 deaths and the data showed that Covid did not feature in the top ten leading causes of death in Wales.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Commenting on its most recent report published today the ONS said the rise in deaths in week 32 and 33 coincided with soaring temperatures across the country.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Heatwave warnings were issued by NHS England and experts warned the vulnerable and those who have recovered from coronavirus to stay inside.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The ONS added: &#8220;The increased number of deaths, and the rise above the five-year average, were likely due to the heatwave; the coronavirus did not drive the increase, as deaths involving Covid-19 continued to decrease in week 33.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row \">\n\t\t<div class=\"col sun-col-6\">\n\n\t\t\t<div class=\"rail rail--classic  rail--trending theme-news\" data-slide-count=\"4\" data-slide-count-tablet=\"4\">\t\t\t\t<div class=\"swiper-container\">\n\n\t\t\t\t\t<div of England had deaths above the five-year average in the week ending August 14.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>They were north-east England (11.1 per cent above), the East Midlands (9.9 per cent above), London (5.5 per cent above), north-west England (5.2 per cent above), south-west England (4.3 per cent above), eastern England (1.4 per cent above) and south-east England (1.3 per cent).</p>\n\n\n\n<p>In two regions the number of registered deaths was below the five-year average: the West Midlands (2.1 per cent below) and Yorkshire &#38; the Humber (2.2 per cent below).</p>\n\n\n\n<p>In Wales, the number of deaths registered in the week to August 14 was 9.4 per cent above the five-year average.</p>\n\n\n\n\t\t<!-- Start of Brightcove Player -->\n\n\t\t\t\t\t<div style=\"display: block; position: officially","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tv/12491343/coronation-street-shock-todd-grimshaw-police/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>CORONATION Street dropped a bombshell last night when it was revealed that Todd Grimshaw isn&#8217;t being hunted by the police.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The legal assistant fled from Weatherfield after assaulting a police officer and his friends and family thought he had continued to be on the run.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12358639\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/3F9A7835.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12358639\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Actor Gareth Pierce will take over the role three years after disgraced star Bruno Langley was sacked.</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<p>Last week a letter arrived claiming to be from Todd pleading for money.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Billy, Sean and Mary set up a scheme to try and catch Todd but instead found a woman who claimed she had simply found his phone and was trying to make a quick buck.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>It spurred the trio into trying to find Todd with Billy approaching police officer Craig Tinker to see if he could find anything out.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Last night Craig broke the news to Todd&#8217;s ex Billy that he had already spoken to officers about the assault charge and was free and clear.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>That means Todd has been staying away from the cobbles for other reasons.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Actor Gareth Pierce will take over the role three years after disgraced star Bruno Langley was sacked.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>New soap star Gareth said: &#8220;I’m thrilled to be joining such an iconic show, and to have been entrusted with taking Todd forward into some really exciting storylines. </p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12358644\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/3F9A7801.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12358644\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">He will make his debut in October</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;It’s an honour to be part of the dedicated Coronation Street team in such unprecedented times.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Todd was written out of the ITV soap after Bruno, 37, was convicted of sexually assaulting two women in a bar in Manchester in 2017.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Viewers were told Todd had assaulted a police officer and &#8220;gone on the run&#8221; and he has been sparingly mentioned over the last three years.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>In recent months, the soap has&#160;<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/11255950/coronation-street-todd-grimshaw-return/\">dropped a couple of hints that Todd could be on his way back to Weatherfield.</a></p>\n\n\n\n<p>His mum Eileen &#8211; played by Sue Cleaver &#8211; told Fiz earlier this year: “Every Mother’s Day or birthday it’s the same.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12358688\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 637px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/65cb3109-b198-429b-b7fb-ffa3606f799f-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=627\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12358688\" width=\"627\" height=\"959\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Bruno played Todd from 2001 until 2017 when he was sacked</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12358689\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/4432873b-7fc2-4ed1-b835-c69717f55aa5-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12358689\" width=\"960\" height=\"631\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Fans have long wanted the character back</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;I think this will be the time I hear from him but I never do of course.”</p>\n\n\n\n<p>And vicar Billey Mayhew &#8211; who Todd had a relationship with &#8211; mentioned he was going to come face-to-face with &#8220;a blast from the past&#8221;.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Since being axed from the soap,&#160;<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/9649086/coronation-street-bruno-langley-photographer-prom-sex-offenders-register/\">Bruno has retrained as a professional portrait photographer.</a></p>\n\n\n\n<p>He previously said of his new career: &#8220;I’m really happy being creative in this way.</p>\n\n\n\n\t\t<!-- Start of Brightcove Player -->\n\n\t\t\t\t\t<div -->\n\t</div><!-- .sun-row .{row} .rail-video-index-->\n\t</div> <!-- .sun-grid-container .sun-grid-container--{color} -->\n\t<!--googleon: all-->\n\t\n\n\n\n<p>“I’ve been taking time out to catch my breath, reassess what is important to me and to make myself a better person.”</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Bruno played Todd in Coronation Street for 16 years before he admitted grabbing the crotches of two women in a nightclub in 2017 after a boozy night out.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Bruno was spared jail but was issued with a 12 month community order, an electronic tag and ordered to stick to a curfew as well as pay compensation to his victims.</p>\n\n\n<div></div>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Tue, 25 Aug 2020 09:41:41 +0000","feedId":10019,"bgimg":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/3F9A7835.jpg?strip=all&w=960","linkMd5":"bdcaddba7302186f4612a341a6d8f80e","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn62@2020_2/2020/08/25/11-06-26-719_8d7a172696559c0e.webp","destWidth":960,"destHeight":640,"sourceBytes":146062,"destBytes":146062,"author":"Carl Greenwood","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/3F9A7835.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn62@2020_2/2020/08/25/11-06-26-719_8d7a172696559c0e.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/3F9A7801.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx19/cdn2@2020_6/2020/08/25/11-06-41-981_3f21f91696ec1f41.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/65cb3109-b198-429b-b7fb-ffa3606f799f-1.jpg?strip=all&w=627":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx22/cdn42@2020_1/2020/08/25/11-06-41-730_1c65ae039f92861e.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/4432873b-7fc2-4ed1-b835-c69717f55aa5-1.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx16/cdn89@2020_2/2020/08/25/11-06-40-284_36f6f3c44881a08e.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598353584701},{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 19:06:24","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 19:06:24","title":"Luis Suarez ‘very upset’ after Ronald Koeman’s brutal one-minute phone call to tell him to leave Barcelona","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/12491242/luis-suarez-barcelona-exit-koeman/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>LUIS SUAREZ was reportedly left stunned by a blunt phone call with Ronald Koeman that slammed the door on his Barcelona career.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>After six years at the Camp Nou, the Uruguayan <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/12484892/ronald-koeman-suarez-unwanted-barcelona-juventus-transfer/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">is widely tipped to be leaving the club this summer</a> as part of the club&#8217;s massive overhaul.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12491428\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/crop-12491423.jpg?strip=all\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone wp-image-12491428\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Getty Images - Getty</figcredit></figure>Luis Suarez has been earmarked for a summer exit and might even leave for free[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>New boss Koeman delivered the news to Suarez, who was reportedly left hurt at the way his situation is being handled.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Barcelona-based newspaper <a href=\"https://www.sport.es/en/news/barca/how-ronald-koemans-call-to-luis-suarez-went-8086428\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">Sport</a> detail how the striker feels singled out for the team&#8217;s wider failings after their shock 8-2 defeat to Bayern Munich in the Champions League &#8211; a game in which Suarez scored.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Furthermore, he is said to be upset at receiving just a 60-second telephone call from Koeman with radio silence from club president Josep Maria Bartomeu on the matter.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Suarez has reportedly vowed not to make life difficult for Barcelona if he is to leave.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Yet he has already voiced his anger <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/12471049/furious-luis-suarez-barcelona-board-transfer-ajax/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">at how the club is dealing with his future</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/VP-GRAPHIC-SPORT-BIGGEST-WAGE-BILLS-EU.jpg\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/VP-GRAPHIC-SPORT-BIGGEST-WAGE-BILLS-EU.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12374351\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /></a>\n\n\n\n<p>Suarez told <a href=\"https://elpais.com/deportes/2020-08-21/luis-suarez-aun-puedo-aportar-mucho-al-barcelona.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noreferrer noopener\">El Pais</a> last week: &#8220;There is talk of some names that the president gave, of changes that can be made, but nobody told me that they want to do without me.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;If this is the desire of the club, it would be good if the person in charge who chooses speaks directly to me.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;Better so than filter if I am one of those who want them to leave. It remains to be seen.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;I also want the best for the club and my idea today is to continue, but if the club decides that I am expendable, I have no problem talking to those who decide.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<h2>NOT SO FOND FAREWELL</h2>\n\n\n\n<p>The Blaugrana are expected to green light his exit on a free transfer, with the player now 33 and suffering from an increasingly troublesome injury record.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>However, Spanish radio station <a href=\"https://www.cope.es/deportes/futbol/noticias/primera-intencion-luis-suarez-seria-acabar-contrato-barcelona-20200824_866504\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">COPE</a> outlines Suarez&#8217;s preference to be released from his contract.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>That would mean paying off the final year of his deal, thought to be worth a considerable £405,000-a-week.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Suarez has been a consistent goalscoring force since signing from Liverpool in 2014, netting almost 200 times for Barcelona.</p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div next destinations</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Former Netherlands boss Koeman, who has also played for and managed Ajax, even recently joked <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/12457487/koeman-sell-luis-suarez-barcelona-ajax-transfer/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">that he will send Suarez to Amsterdam</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Mundo Deportivo claim that the South American is far from the only player being moved on in the Catalans&#8217; revamp.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Samuel Umtiti, Arturo Vidal and Ivan Rakitic are also reportedly up for sale after Barcelona changed coach and sporting director.</p>\n\n\n\n<a Mayo","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/crop-12491423.jpg?strip=all":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn44@2020_6/2020/08/25/11-06-25-598_de6af8cbc53a4046.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/VP-GRAPHIC-SPORT-BIGGEST-WAGE-BILLS-EU.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx2/cdn27@2020_3/2020/08/25/11-06-32-882_8f9e2b2b083d05ee.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/RR-SPORTS-GRAPHIC-BARCA-v5.jpg?strip=all&w=408":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn65@2020_5/2020/08/25/11-06-40-799_3c1100b973f7b1b7.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598353584741},{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 19:06:24","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 19:06:24","title":"Mum removes permanent marker stains from clothing without ANY cleaning products – and people are amazed","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/fabulous/12491175/mum-removes-permanent-marker-stains-no-cleaning-products/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>ONCE you get permanent marker on a piece of clothing, most of us have learnt the hard way that <em>no</em> amount of scrubbing is going to get it out.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>But while we would normally just admit defeat and chuck it straight away, one savvy mum has revealed how she gets rid of these stubborn stains without using ANY cleaning products.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12491253\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603984266.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491253\" width=\"960\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Facebook</figcredit></figure>The mum didn&#8217;t use a single cleaning product to remove the permanent marker stain[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>The woman originally posted on the Facebook group Mums Who Clean for help tackling the stain &#8211; and was told to soak it in eucalyptus oil for 30 minutes.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Sharing amazing before-and-after images, she added: &#8220;It worked so well! I rinsed the stain with water and squeezed the extra out as much as I could so the colour didn&#8217;t run.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>What&#8217;s more, the mum claims the essential oil &#8211; which is a natural disinfectant &#8211; removed &#8220;90 per cent&#8221; of the stain.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>To finish off, she poured bleach over the area, popped it in the washing machine and says the white hoodie looks as good as new.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12491254\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 539px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603984267.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=529\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491254\" width=\"529\" height=\"559\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Holland&#38;Barrett</figcredit></figure>You can pick up eucalyptus oil for just £6.75 in Holland &#38; Barrett[/caption]\n\n\n\n<ul><li><strong>Miaroma Eucalyptus Essential Oil, £6.75 for 20ml from Holland &#38; Barrett &#8211; <a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=34784X928880&#38;xs=1&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.hollandandbarrett.com%2Fshop%2Fproduct%2Fmiaroma-eucalyptus-essential-oil-60043894%3Fskuid%3D043894%26utm_campaign%3Dshopping%26utm_medium%3Dcpc%26utm_source%3Dgoogle%26%26gclid%3DCj0KCQjw7ZL6BRCmARIsAH6XFDKwboEOWvyhbrMRtuKBvBp5a5XL-22tt--gRUaR8FusPDbpOXifBZgaAip-EALw_wcB%26gclsrc%3Daw.ds\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noreferrer noopener\">buy now</a></strong></li></ul>\n\n\n\n<p>Needless to say, other members of the group were amazed by how well it worked &#8211; and her post racked up over 1,600 &#8220;likes&#8221;.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;I wouldn&#8217;t have thought you could get that stain out,&#8221; one wrote. &#8220;Great work!&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Another added: &#8220;Oh my gosh! I saw this post last night and even showed my husband and told him that I didn&#8217;t think it would ever come out. I&#8217;m off to show him this.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>And if that wasn&#8217;t enough, cleaning fans have previously used <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/fabulous/8450611/mum-eucalyptus-water-remove-stubborn-stains-glass-shower-doors-minutes/\">eucalyptus oil to get filthy shower screens sparkling</a> and to <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/fabulous/8277706/mum-cleaning-spray-miracle-cheap-results/\">clean stained sofas</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container -->\n\t<!--googleon: all-->\n\t\n\n\n\n<p>She said with a smile: &#8220;You love going chav, don&#8217;t you? You&#8217;re pure chav.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Amused, Kate replied, referring to the pink tracksuit she was wearing: &#8220;What&#8217;s wrong with that? I&#8217;m sitting here in my Fila, with my nails like that. That&#8217;s not chav, is it?&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The 42-year-old star told her daughter: &#8220;You&#8217;re such a little belle. Come here. Everyone, how beautiful is my daughter, by the way?</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;You&#8217;re so beautiful, you&#8217;re such a lovely girl. She loves her mum, don&#8217;t you? theme__background-color-rgba-80\"></div>\n\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"swiper-button-next theme__background-color-rgba-80\"></div>\n\n\t\t\t\t</div><!-- .swiper-container -->\n\t\t\t</div><!-- .rail .{rail} .swiper-video-rail .{theme-slug} -->\n\n\t\t</div><!-- .col .sun-col-6 -->\n\t</div><!-- .sun-row .{row} .rail-video-index-->\n\t</div> <!-- .sun-grid-container .sun-grid-container--{color} -->\n\t<!--googleon: all-->\n\t\n\n\n\n<p>The delayed Euro 2020 tournament will instead be played at the end of the upcoming season.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Trippier may decide playing on home soil for a full season could see his chances of making the the squad boosted &#8211; with at least five right-back stars fighting for what would likely be just two spots.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The Three Lions ace has previously played for Manchester City and Burnley, as well as Tottenham and Atletico Madrid.</p>\n\n\n\n\t\t<!-- Start of Brightcove Player -->\n\n\t\t\t\t\t<div style=\"display: block; position: relative; min-width: 0px; max-width: 640px;\">\n\t\t\t\t<div style=\"padding-top: 56%; \">\n\t\t\t\t\t<video\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\tdata-video-id=\"6178328996001\" data-account=\"5067014667001\"\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\tdata-player=\"default\"\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\tdata-usage=\"cms:wordpress:5.4.2:1.7.0:javascript\"\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\tdata-embed=\"default\"
