+0000","feedId":10019,"bgimg":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/image-64.jpeg?strip=all&w=960","linkMd5":"32c096c0119380692073d0037f39b1a3","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn20@2020_5/2020/08/25/11-06-25-135_e41cd61115c9643d.webp","destWidth":960,"destHeight":540,"sourceBytes":43252,"destBytes":43252,"author":"Sean Keach","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/image-64.jpeg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn20@2020_5/2020/08/25/11-06-25-135_e41cd61115c9643d.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/image-65.jpeg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx2/cdn77@2020_3/2020/08/25/11-06-37-257_b4cde9781fb31ce7.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/image-66.jpeg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn72@2020_4/2020/08/25/11-06-30-818_3ffbbbd4c3402162.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/image-186.png?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn67@2020_3/2020/08/25/11-06-33-474_f67351e0a2710a56.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598353584721},{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 19:06:24","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 19:06:24","title":"B&Q slashes kids’ garden chairs to just £1 in mega sale and thrilled parents are snapping them up","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/fabulous/12491248/bq-kids-garden-chairs-mega-sale-thrilled-parents-snapping-up/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>B&#38;Q is selling garden kids&#8217; chairs for just £1 in its mega sale &#8211; and they come in blue or green.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Photos of the discounted furniture item were posted to Facebook, and parents seemed more than keen to snap them up for their children. </p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12491280\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 730px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603979630.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=720\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491280\" width=\"720\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Extreme Couponing and Bargains UK</figcredit></figure>B&#38;Q is selling kids&#8217; garden chairs for just £1 in its mega sale[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>One mum posted to the group <a href=\"https://www.facebook.com/groups/ExtremeCouponingAndBargainsUK/permalink/1162348784178418/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">Extreme Couponing and Bargains UK</a>, and shared: “£1 for kids garden chairs in B&#38;Q blackpool!”</p>\n\n\n\n<p>She posted a photo of the <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/bq/\">B&#38;Q </a>store she was in, with the bargain chairs piled high. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Her post has been &#8220;liked&#8221; hundreds of times, with savvy shoppers saying they would be heading to the shop to stock up. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>According to the <a href=\"https://www.diy.com/departments/janeiro-multicolour-metal-kids-armchair/875844_BQ.prd\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noreferrer noopener\">B&#38;Q website</a>, the stylish steel chairs used to be £9 before the sale. </p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12491281\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 730px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603979629.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=720\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491281\" width=\"720\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Extreme Couponing and Bargains UK</figcredit></figure>The chairs come in green or blue in a small kids&#8217; size and used to be £9[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>One wrote: “These would be good.”</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Another added: “Oooohhh&#8230; might have to get some of them.”</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Meanwhile, one person said they had bought the same chair a few years ago, and said it is still in a great condition.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>They said: “Great price, we bought one in pink 5 or 6yrs back, still perfect.”</p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row \">\n\t\t<div class=\"col .sun-grid-container .sun-grid-container--{color} -->\n\t<!--googleon: all-->\n\t\n\n\n\n<p>In other related news, B&#38;Q has also <a -->\n\n\t\t\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Tue, 25 Aug 2020 08:22:07 +0000","feedId":10019,"bgimg":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603979630.jpg?strip=all&w=720","linkMd5":"860476627f233e326976ff67851bbd72","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx25/cdn10@2020_1/2020/08/25/11-06-25-109_38ec7642c74f215c.webp","destWidth":720,"destHeight":960,"sourceBytes":49912,"destBytes":49912,"author":"Becky Pemberton","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603979630.jpg?strip=all&w=720":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx25/cdn10@2020_1/2020/08/25/11-06-25-109_38ec7642c74f215c.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603979629.jpg?strip=all&w=720":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx13/cdn96@2020_4/2020/08/25/11-06-37-473_b89929e261f06a7b.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598353584743},{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 19:06:24","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 19:06:24","title":"Refugee mum found dead beside starving baby son in Glasgow flat after she lost her right to work","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12491907/refugee-mum-dead-starving-baby-glasgow/","description":"<p>A MUM was found dead beside her starving baby in a Glasgow flat tragedy.</p> \n<p>Mercy Baguma, from Uganda, was found dead in her Govan flat by police on Saturday, 22 August.</p> \n<p>\n <figure id=\"attachment_12491906\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 751px\">\n  <img src=\"https://www.thescottishsun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2020/08/mercy.png?strip=all&amp;w=741\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491906\" width=\"741\" height=\"489\" />\n  <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">\n   Tragic Mercy was described as an “amazing mother, sister and best friend”\n  </figcaption>\n  <figcredit></figcredit>\n </figure></p> \n<p>Her one-year-old son was found crying beside her body and was weak after several days or starvation.</p> \n<p>The tot was rushed into hospital for treatment but was released on Monday and is now being cared for by his father who is thought to be seeking refuge from another country and lives elsewhere in Glasgow.</p> \n<p>The cause of Mercy’s death is not yet known but her family back in Uganda have been informed.</p> \n<hr class=\"wp-block-separator\" /> \n<h3><a href=\"https://www.thescottishsun.co.uk/news/5967791/cameron-house-fire-simon-midgley-victim-answers/\">Mum of tragic Cameron House blaze victim hits out over 1000-day wait for answers</a></h3> \n<hr class=\"wp-block-separator\" /> \n<p>Anti-racist homelessness and human rights charity <a href=\"https://www.paih.org/death-of-mercy-baguma-glasgow-statement/?fbclid=IwAR1uYq9LbavOJvE1ysWMTyiIwFMcxxXEjxpybGrI9bJbVLOT-29y1-_otHU\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">Positive Action in Housing</a> confirmed the tragic passing of Mercy, in her thirties.</p> \n<p>The charity understand she had lost her job when her limited leave to remain expired and was not allowed to continue working.</p> \n<p>She claimed asylum after living in extreme poverty and was relying on food from friends and charitable organisations.</p> \n<p>A <a href=\"https://www.gofundme.com/f/mercy-baguma039s-furneal-fund?fbclid=IwAR0x-NhhMpaf5xRNo9Mes87QucvVPn-vDlNWAQyMW61CVw93RY1f5Y97VsA\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">fundraiser for Mercy’s funeral has been set up</a> and already raised over £1,300.</p> \n<p>It aims to cover the funeral arrangements for the “amazing mother, sister, best friend loved by all” as well as leaving money for her son.</p> \n<hr class=\"wp-block-separator\" /> \n<h3 class=\"has-text-align-center\"><a href=\"https://www.gofundme.com/f/mercy-baguma039s-furneal-fund?fbclid=IwAR0x-NhhMpaf5xRNo9Mes87QucvVPn-vDlNWAQyMW61CVw93RY1f5Y97VsA\">You can donate to the fundraiser <strong>HERE</strong></a></h3> \n<hr class=\"wp-block-separator\" /> \n<p>The <a href=\"https://www.gofundme.com/f/mercy-baguma039s-furneal-fund?fbclid=IwAR0x-NhhMpaf5xRNo9Mes87QucvVPn-vDlNWAQyMW61CVw93RY1f5Y97VsA\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">GoFundMe</a> page read: “We are devastated to share that Mercy Baguma&nbsp; passed away on Saturday 22nd 2020 . </p> \n<p>“She was an amazing&nbsp; Mother , sister , best friend ,friend loved by all. Mercy&nbsp; was always positive and always put her&nbsp; family first, especially her son.&nbsp; Her smile made everyone so welcome and comfortable. </p> \n<p>“Please consider helping out her loved ones through this difficult time as they navigate this tragedy and move forward in life without her . </p> \n<p>“Donations will go directly to her son , family&nbsp; to help with end of life costs and future expenses.”</p> \n<p><a href=\"https://m.me/thescottishsun\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\"><img src=\"https://www.thescottishsun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2017/03/unnamed-1.png\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-large\" /></a></p> \n<p>&nbsp;</p> \n<p>It comes after two other deaths in the refugee community in less than four months. </p> \n<p>Adnan Walid Elbi, 30 was found dead at McLays Guest House on Renfrew Street and Badreddin Abdallam Adam, 28, was shot dead by police after a city centre stabbing spree.</p> \n<p>Robina Qureshi, Director of Positive Action in Housing said: “This is the third tragedy to affect the city’s refugee population in as many months. </p> \n<p>“Mercy contacted our charity on August 11 and said she was not getting any financial support yet and had made an application to MigrantHelp. </p> \n<p>“Had she lived she would have been a high priority for a crisis payment from our Emergency Relief Fund like hundreds of others left functionally destitute by the asylum system.</p> \n<p>“The question remains, why are mothers and babies being left to go hungry in this city, and why is it being left to charities and volunteers to pick up the pieces? Does society have anything to say other than call them a drain on society?</p> \n<p>“The fact is there is no safety net if you are a refugee or migrant. You are left destitute and without resources, and people are being silenced and shamed by far right rhetoric for being forced to ask for help.</p> \n<p><a href=\"http://bit.ly/2QxJhCI\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\"><img src=\"https://www.thescottishsun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2018/07/SCOTTIS_IG_BANNER.gif\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-large\" /></a></p> \n<p>“Would this mother be alive if she was not forced out of her job by this cruel system that stops you from working and paying your way because a piece of paper says your leave to remain has expired? I’m sure Mercy’s son will want to ask this and other questions once he is old enough.</p> \n<p>“All our efforts since Lockdown began have been focussed on trying to help people just survive and retain hope. Home Office asylum policy has created unimaginable hardship for refugees and migrant households in this city. </p> \n<p>“People are literally depressed – and the system seems designed to break spirits. It is a matter of when – not if – the next tragedy occurs and this reinforces our resolve for a public inquiry and to get rid of any pretence that the Home Office wants to find out the pain it is causing with it’s evaluation which seven Glasgow MPs are now boycotting. </p> \n<p>“We demand a public inquiry and Mercy’s death to be investigated along side Adnan Walid Elbi, the Park Inn tragedy and the accommodation crisis created by Mears insensitive hotel moves. We call on the Church of Scotland and all of civic society to support our call for an independent public inquiry.”</p> \n<p> \n <!--googleoff: all--> \n <div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\"> \n  <div class=\"sun-row \"> \n   <div class=\"col sun-col-6\"> \n    <div class=\"rail rail--classic  rail--trending theme-news\" data-slide-count=\"4\" data-slide-count-tablet=\"4\"> \n     <div class=\"swiper-container\"> \n      <div class=\"rail__header\"> \n       <h3 class=\"rail__title theme__after-color\">Most read in News</h3> \n      </div> \n      <div class=\"swiper-pagination theme__swiper-pagination\"></div> \n      <div class=\"swiper-wrapper\"> \n       <div class=\"rail__item swiper-slide\"> \n        <div class=\"rail__item-image\"> \n         <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/uncategorized/11755984/competition-musso-ssangyong-win-truck-pickup-car-2-2/\"> \n          <div </p> \n<p>“We can never imagine what this woman and child went through”</p> \n<p>SNP MP for Glasgow Central Alison Thewliss said: “This is utterly heartbreaking.”</p> \n<p>A Crown Office and Procurator Fiscal Service spokesperson said: “The Procurator Fiscal has received a report in connection with the death of a 34 year old woman in Glasgow on 22 August 2020.</p> \n<p>“The investigation into the death, under the direction of Scottish Fatalities Investigation Unit (SFIU), is ongoing and the family will continue to be kept updated in relation to any significant developments.”</p> \n<p> \n <!-- Start of Brightcove Player --> \n <div style=\"display: block; position: relative; min-width: 0px; max-width: 640px;\"> \n  <div style=\"padding-top: 56%; \"> \n   <video data-video-id=\"6184291000001\" data-account=\"5067014667001\" data-player=\"default\" data-usage=\"cms:wordpress:5.4.2:1.7.0:javascript\" data-embed=\"default\" class=\"video-js\" controls=\"\" style=\"width: 100%; height: 100%; position: absolute; top: 0; bottom: 0; right: 0; left: 0;\"> \n   </video> \n   <script src=\"https://players.brightcove.net/5067014667001/default_default/index.min.js\"></script> \n  </div> \n </div> \n <!-- End of Brightcove Player --> </p> \n<hr class=\"wp-block-separator\" /> \n<p><strong>We pay for your stories and videos! claims that PSG want to offer him a last-gasp contract extension. </p>\n\n\n\n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/12488259/chelsea-agree-thiago-silva-deal/\">The Brazilian looked close to finalising a move to Stamford Bridge after his contract with the French giants expired. </a></p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12491384\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: contract extension[/caption]\n\n\n\n<hr class=\"wp-block-separator\" />\n\n\n\n<h3><strong><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/12287166/chelsea-transfer-news-live-kai-havertz-reguilon-chilwell-zaha/\">CHELSEA NEWS LIVE: Click here for the latest Blues news</a></strong></h3>\n\n\n\n<hr class=\"wp-block-separator\" />\n\n\n\n<p>But according to L&#8217;Equipe, they are considering handing the 35-year-old a new deal.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Manager Thomas Tuchel has made no secret about wanting his captain to stay, but sporting director Leonardo would prefer him to leave.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Silva appeared to confirm <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/12481423/chelsea-thiago-silva-transfer-fiorentina-talks/\">that he would be moving on </a>after PSG&#8217;s Champions League final defeat to Bayern Munich.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The centre back, who moved to Paris from AC Milan in 2012, said: &#8220;Now I have to look for a new team. Fiorentina? Reports of an agreement are not true.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;My agent is talking to them and other clubs but nothing is signed yet.</p>\n\n\n<div></div>\n\n\n\n<p>“Tomorrow or the day after tomorrow I will have to look at the offers and make the best decision for me and my family.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“This was my last match at PSG. I am sad. I apologise to the supporters.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;I want to thank all the fans for their love.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;I want to play for three or four more years and be at the World Cup in Figg","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/GettyImages-1096663152.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx/cdn86@2020_2/2020/08/25/11-06-26-214_24370adad3c135a7.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/SPORTS-GRAPHIC-EXPENSIVE-SIGNINGS-CHELSEA-v2.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn53@2020_1/2020/08/25/11-06-29-438_f038987f33fbffa3.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598353584742},{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 19:06:24","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 19:06:24","title":"Raheem Sterling tests negative for coronavirus after partying with Usain Bolt at Olympic legend’s 34th birthday","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/12492228/raheem-sterling-negative-coronavirus-bolt-party/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>RAHEEM STERLING has tested negative for coronavirus after partying with Usain Bolt at the Olympic legend&#8217;s 34th birthday bash.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>A source close to the Manchester City and England ace claimed he was &#8220;feeling fine and showing no symptoms&#8221;.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12492425\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 343px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603883994-5.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=333\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492425\" width=\"333\" height=\"284\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Raheem Sterling partied with Usain Bolt in Jamaica, with the sprinter later testing positive for coronavirus</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12492441\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 648px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603870590-2.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=638\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492441\" width=\"638\" height=\"888\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Sterling partied with Bolt, Leon Bailey and Chris Gayle in Jamaica</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/raheem-sterling/\">Sterling</a>, 25, will be tested again before linking up with the Three Lions squad &#8211; with Gareth Southgate naming his 25-man group on Tuesday.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>He will also take another test on his arrival back in the UK &#8211; with no quarantining measures currently in place for those landing on British soil from Jamaica.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The flying winger is due to be named in the England group to face Iceland on September 5.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>His <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/12489286/raheem-sterling-covid-usain-bolt/\">spot had appeared to be in jeopardy</a> after he was pictured at Bolt’s birthday celebrations in Jamaica on Friday, along with Bayer Leverkusen star Leon Bailey and cricket legend Chris Gayle.</p>\n\n\n\n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/12491425/usain-bolt-party-positive-coronavirus-raheem-sterling/\">The Sun can reveal party is now under police investigation</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Sterling, who was born in&#160;<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/where/jamaica/\">Jamaica</a>, flew out to his home on the island after City lost their Champions League quarter-final against Lyon.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>On Monday, <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/usain-bolt/\">Bolt</a> announced he was self-isolating after it was claimed he&#8217;d returned a positive result for Covid-19.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12492454\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 550px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603874044-2.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=540\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492454\" width=\"540\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Raheem Sterling returned to Jamaica &#8211; the place of his birth &#8211; for Bolt&#8217;s bash</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12492501\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 550px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603874029-2.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=540\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492501\" width=\"540\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Raheem Sterling&#8217;s spot in the upcoming England squad remains in jeopardy</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<p>Videos from the party showed guests dancing close together without masks and ignoring social distancing.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Jamaica has urged islanders to restrict gatherings to 20 people.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The island has had 1,529 coronavirus cases and 16 deaths so far &#8211; but after just 174 cases in July, there have been 267 in the past four days alone.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>On Monday, a Jamaican radio station claimed Bolt&#160;had tested positive for Covid-19.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The ex-sprinter later posted a video on social media to say he was self-isolating after taking a test.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Bolt did not confirm the positive result.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12492523\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000602317182.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492523\" width=\"960\" height=\"673\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Getty Images - Getty</figcredit></figure>Raheem Sterling was set to be named in Gareth Southgate&#8217;s England squad on Tuesday[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12492514\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000602546820.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492514\" width=\"960\" height=\"651\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>AP:Associated Press</figcredit></figure>Jamaican sprint king Usain Bolt is currently self-isolating[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>Meanwhile, a source close to Sterling said: “Raheem feels fine and is showing no&#160;Covid-19&#160;symptoms.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“But he’s in close contact with medical experts from both&#160;Manchester City&#160;and England.”</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Sterling will have to pass a Covid-19 test before he is allowed to join up with the his Three Lions pals.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The 25-man squad is due to meet up from Sunday before going into a protective “bubble” for the games.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>And Gareth Southgate is now enduring a &#8220;real headache&#8221; with his squad meeting up in just five days.</p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row \">\n\t\t<div class=\"col 19:06:24","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 19:06:24","title":"Who is new Loose Women host Michelle Ackerley?","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/2633222/michelle-ackerley-loose-women-host/","description":"<p>MICHELLE Ackerley is a rising star that you&#8217;ve probably been hearing about a lot lately, and it&#8217;s not hard to see why.</p>\n<p>Since joining <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/the-one-show/\">The One Show</a> as a guest host, the star&#8217;s popularity has grown from strength to strength and now she has landed a job on <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/loose-women/\">Loose Women</a>.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12492332\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/NINTCHDBPICT000586121804-e1598350393399.jpg\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492332\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/NINTCHDBPICT000586121804-e1598350393399.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"641\" /></a><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Michelle Ackerley is a TV presenter</figcaption><figcredit>Getty Images</figcredit></figure></p>\n<h2>Who is Michelle Ackerley?</h2>\n<p>Michelle was born on July 21, 1984 &#8211; making her 36-years-old</p>\n<p>She grew up in Manchester and has a degree in psychology.</p>\n<p>Michelle joined the BBC as a programme-maker in 2005.</p>\n<p>She has worked across a wealth of shows within entertainment, children’s and current Affairs.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12492321\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/NINTCHDBPICT000603842198-e1598350455581.jpg\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492321\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/NINTCHDBPICT000603842198-e1598350455581.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"529\" /></a><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Michelle has joined the Loose Women team</figcaption><figcredit>Rex Features</figcredit></figure></p>\n<h2>When did Michelle Ackerley join the Loose Women panel?</h2>\n<p>Michelle was unveiled as a new host on Loose Women on August 24, 2020.</p>\n<p>During her debut Michelle said she was &#8220;very much looking forward&#8221; to being part of the show.</p>\n<p>A tweet from the Loose Women account read: &#8220;Our newest addition, Michelle Ackerley, has already had a warm welcome from Eamonn and Ruth and our Coleen&#8217;s got a very special test for her on her first day at #LooseWomen!&#8221;</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12492334\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 959px\"><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/NINTCHDBPICT000400052062.jpg\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492334\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/NINTCHDBPICT000400052062.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=949\" alt=\"\" width=\"949\" height=\"528\" /></a><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Michelle is also known for presenting The One Show</figcaption><figcredit>BBC</figcredit></figure></p>\n<h2>What other TV shows has Michelle Ackerley been on?</h2>\n<h3>The One Show</h3>\n<p>Michelle stood in for The One Show host Alex Jones while she was on maternity leave in 2016, and still returns to front occasional editions.</p>\n<p>She stood in again for Alex after the presenter confirmed she was expecting baby number two in 2018.</p>\n<p>When she landed her gig on The One Show, she told Radio Times: &#8220;I&#8217;m over the moon to get the chance to present one of my favourite shows on TV and I&#8217;m thrilled to be looking after Alex&#8217;s spot on the green sofa while she is away.</p>\n<p>“I have always been a massive fan of The One Show and love being part of that wonderful family so I really can&#8217;t wait to get started.&#8221;</p>\n<p><figure style=\"width: 960px\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/nintchdbpict000279108735.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Michelle is a popular face on the BBC</figcaption></figure></p>\n<h3>Council House Crackdown</h3>\n<p>Michelle is also the presenter of popular BBC daytime show Council House Crackdown.</p>\n<p>On the show Michelle follows investigators as they crack down on rogue social housing tenants, seize their homes.</p>\n<p>The houses are then given to families in genuine need.</p>\n<h3>Watchdog</h3>\n<p>Michelle has been part of the Watchdog team since 2013</p>\n<p>Watchdog is a BBC television series that investigates viewers&#8217; reports of problematic experiences with traders, retailers, and other companies around the UK.</p>\n<p>It has had great success in changing the awareness consumers have of their purchasing rights and in changing policies of companies, closing down businesses, and pushing for law changes.</p>\n<div class=\"mceTemp\"></div>\n<p>\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row \">\n\t\t<div class=\"col this weekend if they get the Government green light.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Seagulls chiefs are waiting to hear over the next few days if they will obtain approval to host up to 2,500 fans in a socially-distanced manner at the Amex stadium.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12492860\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img weekend[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>The exact date of the match and the opponents over the Bank Holiday weekend has not yet been confirmed.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>And the voluntary pilot scheme could take place in September instead if a Government decision is made too late this week for the club to sell tickets and secure the right level of stewarding.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>If it does go ahead it would mean Brighton are the first <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/premierleague/\">Premier League</a> club to play in front of a crowd since March’s nationwide lockdown.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Any decision will ultimately take into account local lockdown restrictions and if there is an increase in coronavirus infections.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>It is also understood top Women’s Super League games, possibly involving <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/team/1196656/manchester-united/\">Manchester United</a> and <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/team/1196660/chelsea/\">Chelsea</a>, and non-league finals at Wembley are also among proposed test events for the return of fans to outdoors sport.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The government want the return of socially-distanced sporting events from href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/11241040/best-series-to-watch-on-netflix/\">best series</a> on Netflix</strong></li>\n</ul>\n<h1><span style=\"text-decoration: underline\"><span style=\"color: #993300;text-decoration: underline\">Drama</span></span></h1>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>1. Ladybird</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11263081\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 865px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11263081 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/LadyBird-e1587135780533.jpeg?strip=all&#38;w=855\" alt=\"\" width=\"855\" height=\"792\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">LadyBird is a coming of age story that many can relate to</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>Saoirse Ronan stars as a teenager with a turbulent relationship with her mother.</p>\n<p>The protective woman come to blows with her daughter over issues like sex, boyfriends and university.</p>\n<p>Laurie Metcalf&#8217;s character is loving, opinionated and strong-willed, grappling with the fact that while she struggles to keep her family afloat, her daughter is exploring her own awakening.</p>\n<p>With appearances from <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/5722023/timothee-chalamet-call-me-your-name-lourdes-leon-lily-rose-depp/\">Timothée Chalamet</a> and set in an economically-shifting California in 2002, it&#8217;ll no doubt bring up a whole load of conflicting feelings for viewers.</p>\n<p><strong><em>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 79 %.</em></strong></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3>2. The Breakfast Club</h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11421297\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 920px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11421297\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/The-Breakfast-Club-e1587134859184.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=910\" alt=\"\" width=\"910\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">These teenagers got more than they bargained for when they got sent to detention</figcaption><figcredit>Universal Pictures</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">A cult classic that is a must see, if you haven’t already.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">A Group of rebellious teenagers in detention bond over their struggles both in school and out. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Each one of them are bound to the high school caste system, one way or another.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">The films shows scenes of soul-searching and depictions of adults that most teenagers probably agree with. </span></p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 92%</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>3. The Irishman</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11263177\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11263177 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/The-Irishman-e1587135750511.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"562\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Robert De Niro looks back at his past as a hitman</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>This crime thriller follows Frank Sheeran (<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/robert-de-niro/\">Robert De Niro</a>) as he looks back on his work for the Bufalino crime family.</p>\n<p>As an older man and <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/world-war-2/\">WWII</a> veteran he reflects on all of his prolific hits and debates his involvement in the disappearance of his good friend Jimmy Hoffa.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 86 %.</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>4. Clueless</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11263209\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11263209 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Clueless-e1587135705501.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"760\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">A 90s classic</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>A 90s classic, perfect for when you need an uplifting film with plenty of laughs.</p>\n<p>Based on the lives of the ultra-rich teenagers in a <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/where/beverly-hills/\">Beverley Hills</a> high school.</p>\n<p>The satirical take on the pampered upper-class girls who care more about the right clothes than grades is popular to this day.</p>\n<p>Starring <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/6802304/paul-rudd-ant-man-and-the-wasp-hit-movies-friends-wife/\">Paul Rudd</a> and Alicia Silverstone, you&#8217;ll be in for some laughs, eye-catching outfits and witty comebacks.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 76 %.</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>5. Someone Great</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11263239\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 589px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11263239 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Something-Great-e1585238713424.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=579\" alt=\"\" width=\"579\" height=\"468\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">The perfect post break-up flick</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>This post break-up film will have you laughing, crying and feeling enlightened.</p>\n<p>The story follows three young women living in <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/where/new-york/\">New York</a> dealing with all the trials and tribulations of falling in and out of love.</p>\n<p>Not to mention how the independent gals are paving their own way in their respective careers. Starring She&#8217;s Gotta Have It&#8217;s DeWanda Wise, <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/11183655/pitch-perfects-brittany-snow-marries-tyler-stanaland-in-malibu/\">Pitch Perfect&#8217;s Brittany Snow</a> and Jane The Virgin&#8217;s Gina Rodriguez.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 65%.</strong></em></p>\n<h2></h2>\n<h3><strong>6. Bring It On: All Or Nothing</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11263413\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11263413\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Bring-It-On-All-or-Nothing.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">This classic will have everyone performing cartwheels in the living room</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>The sequel to the original cult classic follows Brittany Allen, who has to make new friends when her wealthy family moves to a new town.</p>\n<p>Combining the concept of cheerleading with other forms of dance, she finds her place with her new pals, only to face off against her previous school posse. Starring <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/12127415/hayden-panettiere-restraining-order-ex-boyfriend-brian-hickerson/\">Hayden Panettiere</a> and <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/10284599/solange-knowles-husband-split-manager-instagram/\">Solange Knowles</a>, get your high kicks ready.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating:  70%.</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>7. Marriage Story</b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11555894\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 418px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11555894\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Marriage-Story-e1588696094773.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=408\" alt=\"\" width=\"408\" height=\"456\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">The turmoils of divorce fall on the shoulders of two creatives</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Adam Driver and <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/scarlett-johansson/\">Scarlett Johanssen</a> star as a stage director and his actor wife who go through the stages of marriage that aren&#8217;t told.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">The pair go through a gruelling divorce that pushes them and their personal extremes to the limit. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">The couples story of their marriage troubles is inspired by the director, writer and producer of the film.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Noah Baumbach based it on his divorce from actress Jennifer Jason Leigh as well as his parents divorce. </span></p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 85%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>8. Before I Fall</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11421404\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11421404\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Before-I-fall-e1587134965405.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"927\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Imagine replaying every single day and not knowing how to make it stop</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">With one day constantly replaying, Samatha Kingston realises she cannot change the things she wants too. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">After one fateful night, Sam realises she has no future at all, having to relive the same day over and over again.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">She doesn’t know how to break the pattern and return to her normal life and she notices differences on each day not just in her life but in her friends and families too. </span></p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 57%</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>9. To The Bone </b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11614492\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 651px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11614492\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/To-The-Bone-e1589377052647.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=641\" alt=\"\" width=\"641\" height=\"680\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Lily Collins plays an young lady with a eating disorder facing challenges while trying to recover</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">After being diagnosed with anorexia (<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/4603081/lily-collins-movies-boyfriend-anorexia-les-miserables/\">Lily Collins</a>) she is put into a group home in order to recover.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">With her relationships with her step mum and dad being strained, it becomes evidently more difficult to </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">There’s also an unnerving romance waiting around the corner, she decides that she shouldn&#8217;t treat her illness the way she has been.</span></p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 64%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3>10. The Two Popes</h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11775860\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11775860\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/NINTCHDBPICT000538987069.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Anthony Hopkins and Jonathan Pryce star in this Oscar nominated film</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>It&#8217;s never a hardship to watch <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/6334999/anthony-hopkins-king-lear-actor/\">Anthony Hopkins</a> on screen and the same can be said for Jonathan Pryce, let alone in a film which is pretty much a two-hander.</p>\n<p>Anthony plays Pope Benedict XVI &#8211; conservative and doubt-ridden &#8211; who meets with his progressive yet reluctant successor, Cardinal Bergoglio, later Pope Francis.</p>\n<p>Based on a play by screenwriter Anthony McCarten, the film was nominated for two Oscars.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 89%</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3>11. Uncut Gems</h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11775859\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 650px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11775859\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/NINTCHDBPICT000587020674.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=640\" alt=\"\" width=\"640\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Adam Sandler plays a New York jeweller trying to rid himself of debt and the debt collectors</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>Many feel like <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/7512846/adam-sandler-100-fresh-netflix-trailer/\">Adam Sandler</a> was robbed of awards glory this year for his unrecognisable turn in Uncut Gems.</p>\n<p>The funnyman plays it straight as a <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/where/new-york/\">New York</a> city jeweller who risks everything to get rid of his debts &#8211; and their collectors &#8211; once and for all.</p>\n<p>Tensions run high in the Safdie brothers film, but you will certainly be rewarded for your commitment to the two hour film.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 92%</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3>12.Roma</h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11775858\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11775858\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/NINTCHDBPICT000450907009.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"516\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Roma won three Oscars and is a semi-autobiographical story of a maid in Mexico in the 1970s</figcaption><figcredit>AP:Associated Press</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>Roma is a semi-autobiographical film about a maid working for an upper-middle class family in Mexico City in the 1970&#8217;s by Gravity director Alfonso Cuarón.</p>\n<p>The film was lauded by critics as one of the best of 2018 and won three Oscars.</p>\n<p>It follows housekeeper Cleo as she, and her family, face societal and political issues.</p>\n<p>Roma is a visual delight, as well as being deeply moving.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 95%</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3>13. Okja</h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11952188\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11952188\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/NINTCHDBPICT000334460479.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"401\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Oscar-winning director Bong Joon-Ho is at the helm of this quirky movie</figcaption><figcredit>AP:Associated Press</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>When Oscar-winning director Bong Joon-Ho is at the helm, you know it&#8217;s going to be a good movie, and that&#8217;s certainly the case with Okja.<br />\nThe filma follows a girl and her best friend, a huge, weird animal called Okja as they battle the CEO of a large company who want to take Okja away.<br />\nWhile the animal activism message does touch on preachy, it is still an enjoyable and heartwarming watch, so have the tissues ready.<br />\n<em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 81%</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3>14. Beasts of No Nation</h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11952189\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11952189\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/NINTCHDBPICT000203441770.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Idris Elba plays one of his most sinister roles yet in this 2015 film</figcaption><figcredit>AP:Associated Press</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/idris-elba/\">Idris Elba</a> plays one of his most sinister roles yet in this 2015 film as a commander of child soldiers in West Africa.<br />\nThe <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/netflix/\">Netflix</a> film is based on the acclaimed novel by Nigerian author Uzodinma Iweala and follows a child called Agu, who is torn away from his family to fight in a civil war.<br />\nWith strong, award-nominated performances, it is a hard watch at times, but an extraordinary one too.<br />\n<em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 92%</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h1><span style=\"text-decoration: underline\"><span style=\"color: #993300;text-decoration: underline\">Romance</span></span></h1>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>15. To All The Boys I’ve Loved Before</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11263067\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11263067 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/To-All-The-Boys-Ive-Loved-Before-e1587135633435.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"863\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">This heartwarming rom-com will have anyone swooning</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>If teen rom-coms are your favourite then this ticks every box. With newcomers Lara Condor and <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/7242177/noah-centineo-sierra-burgess-is-a-loser-girlfriend/\">Noah Centineo</a> in high school portraying a fa</p>\n<p>ke relationship, what could go wrong?</p>\n<p>A heart-warming film series based on the best-selling book of the same name by Jenny Han. Also starring <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/sex-and-the-city/\">Sex and the City</a>&#8216;s John Corbett.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 86 %.</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>16. The Duff</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11263142\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 883px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11263142 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/The-DUFF-e1587135605285.jpeg?strip=all&#38;w=873\" alt=\"\" width=\"873\" height=\"786\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">DUFF AKA Designated Ugly Fat Friend</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>If you&#8217;re a sucker for clichés, then this one has your name written all over it.</p>\n<p>The DUFF (or designated ugly fat friend) shows a typical high school experience for the friend who is pushed to the side in favour of their cooler counterparts.</p>\n<p>Robbie Amell guides his next door neighbour and childhood friend through the the dating scene.</p>\n<p>The only problem is there&#8217;s feelings involved that may not end well for the pair&#8230;</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 66 %.</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>17. Call Me By Your Name</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11263161\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11263161 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Call-Me-By-Your-Name--e1587135576547.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"590\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Armie Hammer and Timothée Chalamet star in this romance</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>A powerful and affectionate portrayals of love acted out by <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/5722023/timothee-chalamet-call-me-your-name-lourdes-leon-lily-rose-depp/\">Timothée Chalamet</a> and <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/5859356/armie-hammer-grabs-wife-elizabeth-chambers-boobs-on-the-red-carpet-for-final-portrait-premiere/\">Armie Hammer</a>.</p>\n<p>Chalamet plays 17-year-old Elio Perlan, the American-Italian who&#8217;s close to his father and enjoys reading and transcribing.</p>\n<p>When Oliver (Hammer) arrives as a charming American Scholar, the two embark on a beautiful awakening that will change their lives forever.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 86%.</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>18. Isn&#8217;t It Romantic</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11263258\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11263258\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/isnt-it-romantic.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"540\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Prepare for laughs as Rebel Wilson stars as the lead in this romantic comedy</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/rebel-wilson/\">Rebel Wilson</a> is back as <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/where/new-york/\">New York City</a> architect Natalie whose trying her hardest to get noticed at her job.</p>\n<p>While delivering coffee and bagels, she is desperate to be following her passion instead of menials tasks.</p>\n<p>After being rendered unconscious by a mugger, she discovers that she now exists in a romantic comedy and despite her cynical outlook on love, she&#8217;s now the leading lady.</p>\n<p>With appearances from <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/liam-hemsworth/\">Liam Hemsworth</a> and Priyanka Chopra.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 70 %.</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>19. Nappily Ever After</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11263452\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 385px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11263452 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Nappily-Ever-After-e1587135552706.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=375\" alt=\"\" width=\"375\" height=\"332\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">An insightful movie about life paths and rejecting who you really are</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>Sanaa Lathan has the seemingly perfect life until a devastating event throws all her plans into chaos.</p>\n<p>When her life begins to unravel she starts seeing the life she truly wants to live, rather than following the path laid out for her.</p>\n<p>Drawing on real experiences, this eye-opener is educational and refreshing to the secret experiences of those living around us.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 73%.</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>20. Warm Bodies</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11263463\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11263463 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Warm-Bodies-e1587135532765.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"725\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">An alternative zombie love story</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>A love story like no other, this poignant tale shows the power of human connection in the zombie apocalypse.</p>\n<p>After a zombie epidemic, an unusual zombie encounters a human and the two form a special relationship.</p>\n<p>Their struggle for survival in a lifeless world presents all sorts of challenges, but love proves to be the cure to the pandemic nobody saw coming.</p>\n<h3><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 81 %.</strong></em></h3>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>21. Remember Me </strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11322322\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\"><img class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11322322\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Remember-Me-e1585925962623.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=943\" alt=\"\" width=\"943\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>This will tug at the heartstrings of even the hardest person. A troubled Tyler played <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/9097422/robert-pattinson-batman-dating-twilight/\">Robert Pattinson</a> has a strained relationship with his father ever since they faced a family tragedy.</p>\n<p>After meeting Ally through an unusual twist of fate, he finds meaning and happiness in his life again.</p>\n<p>But soon hidden secrets threaten their relationship.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 69%</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>22. Sex and the City: The Movie</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11322233\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11322233\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Sex-and-the-city-e1585925525552.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"927\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Join the star studded cast as they navigate life once again</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>Join Samantha and the girls for another adventure but this time it&#8217;s a movie.</p>\n<p>The hit series has been made into a big screen feature. <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/sarah-jessica-parker/\">Sarah Jessica Parker</a> plays Carrie Bradshaw as the fashion journalist whose consumed with her obsession for name brands and still seeing Mr. Big (Chris North).</p>\n<p>Meanwhile Miranda, Charlotte and Samantha are facing their own dilemma&#8217;s with romance, families, children and pursuing dreams.</p>\n<p>Also starring <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/jennifer-hudson/\">Jennifer Hudson</a>, Kim Cattrall, Kristin Davis and Cynthia Nixon.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience R</strong></em><em><strong>ating: 77%.</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>23. Easy A</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11322302\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11322302 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Easy-A-1-e1585926020425.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"895\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Emma Stone takes the meaning of The Scarlett Letter a little too literally</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/emma-stone/\">Emma Stone</a> stars as the girl with The Scarlett Letter after faking having slept with half her school in order to help out a friend. The self proclaimed invisible girl makes a name for herself in a way that she didn&#8217;t want to.</p>\n<p>However, her open minded parents, her best friend and an unlikely ally in the form of the school mascot help her along. That is until the Christian gossip group throw a few problems her way. A funny story with a twist for those days you need to laugh.</p>\n<p>Also starring YOU&#8217;s Penn Badgley, Amanda Bynes, Alyson Michalka, <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/lisa-kudrow/\">Lisa Kudrow</a> and Stanley Tucci.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 77%.</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>24. The Sun Is Also A Star</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11466289\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 855px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11466289\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/The-Sun-is-also-a-Star-e1587659192224.jpeg?strip=all&#38;w=845\" alt=\"\" width=\"845\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Will they be able to fall in love in a few hours?</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Riverdale hottie Charles Melton and the beautiful Yara Shahidi play star crossed lovers who only have just hours to get to know one another.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Jamaica-born Natasha (Shahidi) is fighting her family’s deportation whilst fighting her feelings for college-bound Daniel (Melton).</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">This one is for the hopeless romantics who explore whether our lives are decided by fate or random events.</span></p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Rating: 61%</strong></em></p>\n<h3></h3>\n<h3><strong>25. Burlesque </strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11263357\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 890px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11263357 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Burlesque-e1587135154678.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=880\" alt=\"\" width=\"880\" height=\"720\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Christina Aguilera serves up some sexy and sassy fun</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>This feel-good flick will have you up and dancing.</p>\n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/christina-aguilera/\">Christina Aguilera</a> stars as a young performer who leaves her hometown of Iowa, arriving in a Los Angeles burlesque lounge with the dream to take her voice to the stage.</p>\n<p>The sensual dance club is owned by none other than diva <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/10122782/cher-famous-exes-last-tour/\">Cher</a>, who lends her support to the young songstress during testy times.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating:  64%.</strong></em></p>\n<h3></h3>\n<h3><strong>26. He’s Just Not That Into You</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11421275\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 634px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11421275 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Hes-just-not-that-into-you-e1587134759296.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=624\" alt=\"\" width=\"624\" height=\"589\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">These couples all need some vital advice to save their relationships and themselves</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">If you’re not used to facing hard truths, then this film will help you out. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Based on the best-selling book, this story follows the story of Gigi, who gets advice from  a bar owner after being constantly dumped or ignored by dates she&#8217;s gone on.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">The bar owner fancies himself as somewhat of a relationship expert, or an expert on men’s sleazy habits and the way women respond to them.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Also starring <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/ben-affleck/\">Ben Affleck</a>, <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/scarlett-johansson/\">Scarlett Johansson</a> and <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/bradley-cooper/\">Bradley Cooper</a>. </span></p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 59%</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>27. The Half of It</b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11555955\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11555955\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/The-Half-of-It-e1588696589643.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"786\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Two friends fall in love with the same girl</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">A humorous coming of age story about three teenagers in the US in the small town of Sqauhamish.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Shy, straight-A student Ellie (Leah Lewis) is hired by half of the student body to write their essays for them.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">However, she’s enlisted to help inarticulate jock Paul (Daniel Diemer)  who needs help winning over popular girl Aster Flores (Alexxis Lemire) with love letters.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">After initially denying his request she gives in, forming an unlikely friendship with him and even discovers that she has feelings for Aster.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Written and Directed by Alice Wu. </span></p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 95%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>28. Fifty Shades of Grey </b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11740684\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 446px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11740684 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Dakota-Johnson-Jamie-Dorian-Christian-Grey-Anastasia-2015-e1590772329760.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=436\" alt=\"\" width=\"436\" height=\"632\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">An unusual love story</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Based on the book of the same name, <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/50-shades/\">Fifty Shades of Grey by E.L. James</a>.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">A college graduate enters into a sexual contract with a sadomasochistic business magnate. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">However, she gets more than she bargained for when secrets and scandals come spilling out. </span></p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 41%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>29. Letters to Juliet </b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11740692\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 810px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11740692\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/a29f63d5434ec5f210953d95a7c3b8d3.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=800\" alt=\"\" width=\"800\" height=\"534\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Verona is the birthplace of Romeo and Juliet</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">The infamous story of Romeo and Juliet sets the scene for this lighthearted romantic comedy.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\"><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/amanda-seyfried/\">Amanda Seyfried</a> stars as a reporter for The New Yorker who desperately looks for inspiration on a piece of work.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">When she goes to Verona on her pre-wedding honeymoon she finds inspiration in the form of letters left on Juliet’s balcony.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">The young people pouring their hearts out in letters, need advice on love. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">As the reporter digs deeper she discovers the women who reply to the letters and finds out about one particular story that catches her eye. </span></p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 62%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>30. Kal Ho Naa Ho (Tomorrow May Never Come) </b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11740695\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11740695 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/MV5BOWI5NmFiYjUtYjk1Ny00N2VlLTljNTEtNTNmOTliYzBjZGZlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjczODAwNDg@._V1_-e1590772436587.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"469\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Filled with musical numbers and heartbreak, this film is guaranteed to make you laugh and cry</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">The romantic comedy drama follows a young, pessimistic student whose widowed mother tries finding her a husband.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">The student falls in love with her neighbour, who unknown to her is terminally ill.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">In a bid to make her fall out of love with him, he sets his friend up with someone else. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">The film language is originally in Hindi, with English subtitles. </span></p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 91%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h1><span style=\"text-decoration: underline\"><span style=\"color: #993300;text-decoration: underline\">Horror/Thriller</span></span></h1>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>31. Hush</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11263119\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 845px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11263119 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Hush-e1587135499108.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=835\" alt=\"\" width=\"835\" height=\"720\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">This quiet thriller will have people on the edge of their seats</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>This heart-pounding thriller by director Mike Flanagan follows the story of a deaf woman living alone in the woods.</p>\n<p>Secluded and existing in a silent world, this young woman has to fight her way to safety after a psychotic killer appears outside her window. With no one around for miles, it proves to be a bloody battle for survival.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 73 %.</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>32. A Quiet Place</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11263135\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 966px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11263135 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/A-Quiet-Place-e1587135480622.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=956\" alt=\"\" width=\"956\" height=\"900\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Emily Blunt and John Krasinski fight to save their family</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>For the chatterboxes who don&#8217;t know when to stop, what would you do if you had to keep your lips shut or risk dying?</p>\n<p>This spine-chilling thriller shows the lengths that parents <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/emily-blunt/\">Emily Blunt</a> and John Krasinski go to when making any sounds threatens their survival in an Earth invaded by aliens. If they hear you, they hunt you.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 83 %.</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>33. Would You Rather</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11556006\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 319px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11556006\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Would-You-Rather-e1588696801537.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=309\" alt=\"\" width=\"309\" height=\"308\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">How far are they willing to go in this game of Would You Rather?</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">After her parents death, Iris (<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/11183655/pitch-perfects-brittany-snow-marries-tyler-stanaland-in-malibu/\">Brittany Snow</a>) struggles to support her terminally ill younger brother.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">In her desperation she comes across a philanthropic gentleman who offers his help after she attends one of his dinner parties.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Upon arrival, she and seven others are trapped in a sadistic game of Would You Rather, where the winner will be given an astonishing amount of money.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">The games get worse as they go along, so how far are they all willing to go?</span></p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Rating: 59%</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>34. Birdbox</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11263518\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11263518\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Birdbox-1.jpeg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"720\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Will she be able to save herself and her children?</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/12240094/sandra-bullock-ageless-birthday-jennifer-aniston-sarah-paulson/\">Sandra Bullock</a> stars as a mum who tries to protect her two children against all odds.</p>\n<p><span style=\"font-size: 16px\">The world is thrown into chaos with this post-apocalyptic thriller film, which sees sight prove to be humanity&#8217;s biggest threat.</span></p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 58%</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>35. Orphan</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11263271\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 619px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11263271 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Orphan-e1587135457606.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=609\" alt=\"\" width=\"609\" height=\"651\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">All is not what it seems with this young lady</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>A spine-chilling horror that&#8217;s guaranteed to serve jump scares and take the viewer through a world of confusion.</p>\n<p>After the loss of their unborn child, Kate and John decide to look past their crumbling marriage and adopt a child.</p>\n<p>Going to the local orphanage they stumble upon a young lady named Esther.</p>\n<p>However, all is not as it seems when she arrives and an alarming series of events start to unfold.</p>\n<p>Kate notices and tries to save her family before it&#8217;s too late, with limited success&#8230;</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 63 %.</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>36. Dangerous Lies </b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11555867\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 366px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11555867\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Dangerous-Lies-e1588695916206.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=356\" alt=\"\" width=\"356\" height=\"331\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Riverdale&#8217;s Camilla Mendes get&#8217;s caught up in a web of lies</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">After losing her waitressing job following an armed robbery that left another waiter dead, Katie Franklin (Camilla Mendes)  gets a job as a caretaker for a wealthy elderly man.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">The man lives on a large, empty Chicago estate and the two grow close; however, his unexpected death leaves Katie named as the sole heir.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">She and her husband Adam (Jessie T. Usher) are pulled into a web of lies, deception and murder.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">In order to survive Katie must scrutinise everyone’s intentions, even those closest to her.</span></p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 43%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>37. As Above So Below</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11263283\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 838px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11263283 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/As-Above-So-Below-e1587135428141.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=828\" alt=\"\" width=\"828\" height=\"720\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Exploring Paris catacombs comes with risks</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>Set in Paris, explorers get more than they bargained for when they begin to roam around in the underground of the French capital.</p>\n<p>The catacombs provide the backdrop for this horror flick. A journey of madness and terror, this psychological thriller explores the human psyche at its most unsettling.</p>\n<p>Delving into personal demons, the protagonists must find their way back to the surface to escape.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 40%.</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>38. Gone Girl </strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11322281\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11322281 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Gone-Girl-e1585926042896.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"856\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Expect the unexpected in this blockbuster</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>There are many unexpected twists and turns, this story about the secrets of modern marriage will have you at the edge of your seat.</p>\n<p>On his fifth wedding anniversary, Nick Dunne (Ben Affleck) reports his wife, Amy (Rosamund Pike) missing. Police question his erratic behaviour as a media frenzy grows and has everyone asking the same question: Did he kill his wife?</p>\n<p>Also starring <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/emily-ratajkowski/\">Emily Ratajowski</a>.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 87%.</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>39. 47 Metres Down: Uncaged</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11322246\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 883px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11322246 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/47-Meters-Down-Uncaged-e1585925994618.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=873\" alt=\"\" width=\"873\" height=\"735\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">This thriller will keep anyone on edge</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>Four teenage girls decide they want to explore an underwater Mayan city.</p>\n<p>However, their pursuit of curiosity turns into a tense battle for survival as they find it to be a hunting ground for Great White Sharks.</p>\n<p>With a dwindling air supply and claustrophobic caves they must find their way out before it&#8217;s too late. Starring Sistine Stallone, Corinne Foxx, Sophie Néllise and Brianna Tju.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 68%</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3>4o. IT (2017)</h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11465108\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 495px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11465108 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/IT-e1587653838119.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=485\" alt=\"\" width=\"485\" height=\"499\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Clowns are scary.</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>Based off os Stephen King&#8217;s best selling novel of the same name.</p>\n<p>IT is the clown that has been terrifying children in the town of Derry, Maine.</p>\n<p>IT only appears to children and reels them in by talking to them, making himself seem like the perfect &#8216;friend&#8217;.</p>\n<p>In 1989, a group of high school kids decide they want to solve the mystery of the missing children only to find the mystery stemming back centuries.</p>\n<p>The brave high school group have to remember one thing: IT feeds off their fear.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 84%</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>41. Shutter Island </b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11614468\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 800px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11614468\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Shutter-Island-e1589376862473.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=790\" alt=\"\" width=\"790\" height=\"582\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Concentrate on the little details in this movie as there are many shocking twists</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Leonardo DiCaprio and Martin Scorcese team up once again for this adaptation of the novel of the same name by Dennis Lehane.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Set in 1954 as <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/world-war-2/\">World War II</a> veteran and federal marshal Teddy Daniels (DiCaprio) and his new partner Chuck (Mark Ruffalo) jump on a ferry to Shutter Island.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">The water-bound mental hospital houses the criminally insane and they need to investigate the disappearance of Rachel Solando (Emily Mortimer).</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">The convict was admitted after she murdered her three children, however there’s many secrets to unravel on this spooky island.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Mystery and intrigue, that will leave viewers shocked with unexpected twists. </span></p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 76%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3>42. Primal Fear</h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11775856\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11775856\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/NINTCHDBPICT000587021522.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"628\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Richard Gere plays a hotshot lawyer chasing fame as well as justice in this classic 1996 film</figcaption><figcredit>Alamy</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>Richard Gere plays a hotshot lawyer chasing fame as well as justice in this classic 1996 film.</p>\n<p>The tension ramps up when Mr Gere takes on a high-profile case of a bewildered altar boy accused of murdering an archbishop.</p>\n<p>This thriller has it all, including a shock ending, and earned Edward Norton an Oscar nomination for his turn as the altar boy.</p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 75%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3>43.Hereditary</h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11952193\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11952193\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/NINTCHDBPICT000589680387.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"599\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">This 2018 supernatural horror stars Australian actress Toni Collette</figcaption><figcredit>Kobal Collection - Rex Features</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>This 2018 supernatural horror stars Australian actress Toni Collette as a woman called Annie, whose family is haunted by a mysterious presence following the death of her mother.</p>\n<p>Annie and her daughter both turn to the supernatural to help deal with their grief.</p>\n<p>However, they each begin to have disturbing, otherworldly experiences linked to the sinister secrets and emotional trauma that has been in their family for generations.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 67%</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h1><span style=\"text-decoration: underline\"><span style=\"color: #993300;text-decoration: underline\">Animations</span></span></h1>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>44.
