Spirited Away</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11263199\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11263199 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Spirited-Away-e1587659650950.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"812\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">An animation for all ages</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>Studio Ghibli made up a part of everyone&#8217;s childhood and Spirited Away is a standout success.</p>\n<p>The Oscar-winning production follows Chihiro, who is led to a mysterious town where her parents turn into pigs after eating the local food.</p>\n<p>On a mission to find her parents once they go missing and adamant to find her way home, Chihiro befriends Haiku in this mystical tale.</p>\n<p>Set in Japan, the original language is Japanese but there&#8217;s both English dubbing and subtitles available.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 97%.</strong></em></p>\n<h3></h3>\n<h3><strong>45. Boss Baby</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11263334\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 769px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11263334 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/boss-baby-e1587659628619.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=759\" alt=\"\" width=\"759\" height=\"863\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Ever wondered what babies think about? Look no further than this comedic animation</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>Need something to watch with the kids that won&#8217;t make you fall asleep? Look no further than this.</p>\n<p>DreamWorks Animation introduces an unusual baby who wears a suit and speaks with the voice of <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/11589633/saturday-night-live-alec-baldwin-trump-last-time/\">Alec Baldwin</a>.</p>\n<p>When Boss Baby is taken to a new family home, his brother, 7-year-old Tim tries to figure out what Boss Baby&#8217;s purpose really is. Drawing on the message of the importance of family, this heart-warming film is definitely one to watch.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating:  52 %.</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>46. Shrek</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11421257\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 646px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11421257 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Shrek-e1587134647446.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=636\" alt=\"\" width=\"636\" height=\"592\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">An Academy Award Winning animation</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">One of the best animations to grace screens and it even won an Academy Award. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Once Upon a Time in a far away swamp, lived on Ogre named Shrek. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">His peaceful solace is interrupted when a herd of fairytale characters descend on his swamp claiming they have nowhere to go.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">When he asks who sent them there, they state the evil Lord Farquaad had banished them.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">With determination and an irritating donkey, Shrek goes to Lord Farquaad to make a deal to get his swamp back.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">What he didn’t know was that entailed saving a princess from a tower guarded by a dragon.</span></p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 90%</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>47. My Neighbour Totoro</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11466325\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 285px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11466325\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/My-Neighbour-Totoro-e1587659420333.jpeg?strip=all&#38;w=275\" alt=\"\" width=\"275\" height=\"262\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">This heartwarming animation will cheer anyone up</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Studio Ghibli is</span><span style=\"font-weight: 400\"> the gift that keeps on giving with this family friendly, heartwarming animation.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Two girls find that their country home is in the middle of a mystical forest inhabited by fascinating mythical creatures.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">They befriend Totoro, the king of the forest as well as the biggest and eldest of the mystical land.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Whilst their mother is sick in hospital, the girls are taken on an adventure where they begin to understand the realities of life. </span></p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Rating: 94%</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>48. Mowgli: Legend of the Jungle</b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11555914\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 753px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11555914 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Mowgli-e1588696253127.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=743\" alt=\"\" width=\"743\" height=\"753\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Its the bear necessities</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Rudyard Kipling’s masterpiece is brought to life again when a boy is torn between two world and is forced to accept his destiny. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Mowgli (Rohan Chand) never truly belonged in the wild or within civilization. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Now he must navigate the dangers of each of the journeys until he truly discovers where he’s supposed to belong. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Visually spectacular animation based on The Jungle Book. </span></p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 52%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>49. Happy Feet </b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11614448\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 505px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11614448\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Happy-Feet.jpeg?strip=all&#38;w=495\" alt=\"\" width=\"495\" height=\"495\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Tap dance away with this happy penguin</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">In the world of penguins, a simple song can be the difference between a lifetime of misery or an eternity of unhappiness. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">When penguin Mumble is born without the ability to sing in order to attract his soulmate, he resorts to using fancy footwork by tap dancing his way into his love’s heart.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Family friendly animation voiced by <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/hugh-jackman/\">Hugh Jackman</a>, <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/12086722/elijah-wood-lord-of-the-rings-amazon-frodo/\">Elijah Wood</a> and the late Brittany Murphy and Robin Williams.</span></p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 70%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>50. How to Train Your Dragon</b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11614439\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11614439 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/How-to-Train-Your-Dragon.png?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"536\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">This viking has everything to prove after finding a rare breed of dragon</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Family friendly animation about the son of a Viking Chief who is trying to live up to his father&#8217;s expectations of him.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Wanting to mark his passage into manhood is harder as he isn’t built like the rest of the viking’s on the island.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">However, when a rare breed of dragon lands on the island, injured and in need of a trainer, his luck begins to change.</span></p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 91%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h1><span style=\"text-decoration: underline\"><span style=\"color: #993300;text-decoration: underline\">Comedy</span></span></h1>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>51. Dumplin&#8217;</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11263291\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11263291 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/dumplin-e1587659594747.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"686\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Join Jennifer Aniston in a beauty contest that changes hearts</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/jennifer-aniston/\">Jennifer Aniston</a> is the mother of a young plus-size teen who wants to win a beauty contest.</p>\n<p>Being a former beauty queen, Aniston doesn&#8217;t support her daughters dreams as she thinks there are too many obstacles in the way.</p>\n<p>A heart-warming, uplifting drama centred around revolutionising the way a small <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/where/texas/\">Texas</a> town thinks.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 74 %.</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>52. Spy</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11263327\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 833px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11263327 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/SPY-e1587659566783.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=823\" alt=\"\" width=\"823\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Join Melissa McCarthy for a wild ride</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>When in need of a good laugh, look no further than this James Bond-esque spoof.</p>\n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/7580977/melissa-mccarthy-movies-husband-ben-falcone/\">Melissa McCarthy</a> is desk-bound CIA analyst who is sent into the field on dangerous missions. Feeling unequipped and having had her former partner (<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/jude-law/\">Jude Law</a>) fall off the grid she goes undercover to infiltrate the world of a deadly arms dealer in order to prevent global pandemonium. Action comedy with Jason Statham and Rose Byrne.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 78%.</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>53. Always Be My Maybe </b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11528672\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 739px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11528672 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Always-Be-My-Maybe--e1588349881472.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=729\" alt=\"\" width=\"729\" height=\"762\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Ali Wong stars as a famous TV chef who returns to her hometown after 15 years</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">If you’re a sucker for the childhood sweethearts trope then this film is definitely on to put on the watchlist. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">After being friends since childhood, two friends are reunited after 15 years. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Reconnecting as adults who followed very different career paths, the two begin to see what they&#8217;ve missed over the years.</span></p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 89%.</i></b></p>\n<h3></h3>\n<h3><strong>54. Me, Earl and The Dying Girl </strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11421422\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 778px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11421422\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Me-Earl-and-the-Dying-Girl-e1587135084861.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=768\" alt=\"\" width=\"768\" height=\"545\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">This quirky trio look on the bright side of life after being thrown back together</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Greg (Thomas Mann) is an awkward high school senior, and has to have his mum force him to spend time with a girl.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Rachel (Olivia Cooke) is a girl whom he hasn&#8217;t spoken to since kindergarten and she was also justy diagnosed with cancer. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Earl (R.J. Cyler) Greg’s best friend, joins the duo as they rekindle their friendship.</span></p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 86%</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>55. Annie (2014)</b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11528710\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11528710\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Annie--e1588350192999.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"906\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Family comedy with Jamie Foxx</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Based on the Broadway classic, a foster kid who lives with her mean foster mum has her life turned upside down when the New York mayoral candidate decides to take her in.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">The move comes as he wants to become mayor and needs something to make him look like the perfect candidate.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Musical remake of the 1982 film of the same name.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Starring <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/jamie-foxx/\">Jamie Foxx</a> and <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/cameron-diaz/\">Cameron Diaz</a>. </span></p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 59 %.</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>56. Think Like A Man</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11466332\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 337px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11466332\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Think-Like-A-Man-e1587659522434.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=327\" alt=\"\" width=\"327\" height=\"224\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">These women try to think like men in order to navigate their way through rocky relationship paths</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">In a New Years Eve and Valentine’s Day-esque format, this story follows four women in relationships  who’d like to know more about why men think the way they do.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Based on Steve Harvey’s book of the same name, the four interconnected couples start taking the advice from the book.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Starring Gabrielle Union, Micheal Ealy, Regina Hall, Taraji. P Hanson and <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/kevin-hart/\">Kevin Hart</a>.</span></p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Rating: 79%</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>57. Candy Jar </b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11555940\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 867px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11555940\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Candy-Jar-e1588696437820.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=857\" alt=\"\" width=\"857\" height=\"667\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">A classic enemies to friends tale</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Two students at an elite high school who already have a heated rivalry compete with each other even when they’re on the same debate team.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">But when  they’re forced to bear the pressure of overbearing mothers and university admissions, they realise they’re more alike than they seem.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Comedy starring <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/10550044/mad-men-christina-hendricks-files-divorce-husband/\">Christina Hendricks</a>. </span></p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 68%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>58. The Spy Next Door</b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11614527\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 410px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11614527\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/The-Spy-Next-Door.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=400\" alt=\"\" width=\"400\" height=\"265\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">The legendary Jackie Chan takes on a comedy with his karate skills still present</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\"><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/5647053/rush-hour-4-chris-tucker-jackie-chan/\">Jackie Chan</a> stars as The Spy Next Door who doesn’t disclose that he was a spy.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Reminiscent of Spy Kids, former CIA agent Bob Ho0 (Jackie Chan) takes on one his most challenging assignments to date.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Being tasked as a guardian to his new girlfriends&#8217; new kids is harder than it seems when they haven’t warmed to the new man in their mum&#8217;s life. </span></p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 40%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>59. 50/50</b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11740657\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11740657\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/50-50.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"626\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Life changes in every way when one man is diagnosed with cancer</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>Inspired by a true story, this story of friendship, love and survival is told in a different way.</p>\n<p>Different to most cancer stories, this humorous take shows one man’s transformation and experience with cancer.</p>\n<p>The bizarre and quirky nature of his friends and relationships keep him going during a dark time.</p>\n<p>Starring Joseph Gordon Levitt, Anna Kendrick and Seth Rogan.</p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 88%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3>60. The Disaster Artist</h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11952190\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11952190\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/NINTCHDBPICT000504529440.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Real life brothers James and Dave Franco star in this 2017 comedy which looks at the making of Tommy Wiseau’s cult film The Room</figcaption><figcredit>�2017 Warner Bros. Entertainment Inc</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>Real life brothers James and <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/4964714/dave-franco-movies-james-franco-height/\">Dave Franco</a> star in this 2017 comedy which looks at the making of Tommy Wiseau’s cult film The Room.<br />\nThe Room was so bad it has become a cult classic, with James playing the enigmatic Wiseau while Dave is Greg Sestero, a fledgling actor who meets Wiseau at an acting class before he whisks him off to Hollywood.<br />\nWhile the film, which is based on Wiseau&#8217;s memoirs doesn&#8217;t shy away from his demons, it has some real laugh out loud moments.<br />\n<em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 85%</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h1><span style=\"text-decoration: underline\"><span style=\"color: #993300;text-decoration: underline\">Action</span></span></h1>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>61. Kingsman: The Secret Service </b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11528654\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 943px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11528654\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Kingsman--e1588349631509.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=933\" alt=\"\" width=\"933\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Manners maketh man</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Colin Firth stars as a spy belonging to a super-secret elite organisation that recruits a promising candidate.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">The candidate in question is the son of a former, deceased member of the organisation.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">After getting into legal trouble, Eggsy (<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/10694322/taron-egerton-3million-penthouse-london/\">Taron Egerton</a>) is called up by Harry (<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/colin-firth/\">Colin Firth</a>) and has to compete against the most competitive recruits in order to earn his place at Kingsman.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Based upon the acclaimed comic book of the same name. </span></p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 84%.</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>62. Bad Boys </b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11528660\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11528660 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Bad-Boys-e1588697034270.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"716\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Bad Boys (1995) Directed by Michael Bay. Shown from left: Martin Lawrence, Will Smith</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Will Smith and Martin Lawrence are Miami detectives investigating $100 million worth of seized mafia heroin which is stolen from a secure police vault.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">The two police officers embark on a journey in order to recover the money.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">However their lives are made harder when internal affairs snooping around they also have their boss breathing down their necks.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">An action comedy with dirty coppers, snooping wives and a bachelor who refuses to settle down.</span></p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 78%.</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>63. Ocean&#8217;s Eleven </strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11263381\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11263381\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Oceans-Eleven.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"630\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Join the Oscar winning stars for a money heist</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/george-clooney/\">George Clooney</a> and <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/brad-pitt/\">Brad Pitt</a> can still leave fans swooning when they pull off a bank heist.</p>\n<p>They band together a group of ex-cons to rob 150 million dollars from an underground vault that serves three of Las Vegas&#8217;s biggest casinos. Teaming up with nine other men, the criminal specialists co-ordinate a heist to end all heists.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 80 %.</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>64. Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle </strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11263392\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 958px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11263392 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Jumanji-Welcome-to-the-Jungle-e1588697016346.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=948\" alt=\"\" width=\"948\" height=\"801\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Throwback to the childhood Jumanji you always knew but with a new twist</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>Dwayne Johnson, Kevin Hart, <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/10544774/doctor-who-karen-gillan-regret/\">Karen Gillan</a> and Jack Black team up to get themselves out of a game that they found in their high school basement.</p>\n<p>The highly successful reboot of the classic is family friendly and gives guaranteed laughs as the four try to make sure they aren&#8217;t stuck in the game forever. Also starring <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/6408947/nick-jonas-wife-priyanka-chopra-jonas-brothers-married-wife/\">Nick Jonas</a>.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating:  87 %.<br />\n</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>65. Divergent </strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11263436\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 751px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11263436 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Divergent-e1588696973332.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=741\" alt=\"\" width=\"741\" height=\"801\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">What is divergent and why do the factions hide those who are divergent?</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>The thrilling action-adventure is set in a dystopian world where people are divided into district factions based on human virtues.</p>\n<p>Battling through the system and finding out information about the higher ups on her terms, Tris (Shailene Woodley) enlists the help of her faction in order to uncover the conspiracies that their leader (Kate Winslet) is hiding. Also starring Theo James.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 69 %.</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>66. Now You See Me</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11263475\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11263475 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Now-You-See-Me-e1588696991900.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"828\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">The Four Horseman are tricking everyone including the FBI</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>Brace yourselves for some mystifying magic tricks, as The Four Horseman try to outwit an elite FBI squad that wants to take down the super-team of illusionists.</p>\n<p>The Four Horseman pull off a series of elaborate stunts, starting with draining a bank of all its money and Mark Ruffalo leads an FBI task force to find out how.</p>\n<p>But all is not what it seems, so keep an eye out for a twist of epic proportions.</p>\n<p>Morgan Freeman, Jesse Eisenberg, Woody Harrelson, <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/isla-fisher/\">Isla Fisher</a> and <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/4964714/dave-franco-movies-james-franco-height/\">Dave Franco</a> pull off some spectacular stunts in this blockbuster.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 70 %.</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>67. Maze Runner </b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11528625\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11528625\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Maze-Runner--e1588349521179.jpeg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"733\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Will they make it out of the maze alive?</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">A dystopian tale of a boy who is deposited into a maze where a community of boys currently live.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">He has no memory of how he got there, discovering later that it has been erased.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">He joins forces with the other people in order to try and escape. Forming an alliance they discover that the real situation is worse than it seemed,</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Starring Dylan O’Brian, Will Poulter and Kaya Scodelario.</span></p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 68%.</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><b>68. Justice League </b></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11740709\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11740709\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Justice-League.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"540\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">DCs Avengers try and save the planet</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">DC brings their version of The Avengers to life, with this dark epic that brings the world&#8217;s finest superheroes together.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Wonderwoman, Batman, Superman, <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/the-flash/\">The Flash</a>, Aquaman and Cyborg all fight to save the world from a catastrophic end.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Bruce Wayne, played by <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/ben-affleck/\">Ben Affleck</a>, brings together the superheroes after Superman&#8217;s selfless act that restored faith in humanity.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Also starring <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/2655754/jason-momoa-aquaman-actor-game-of-thrones-khal-drogo-wife/\">Jason Mamoa</a>, Gal Gadot, Amy Adams and Ezra Miller.</span></p>\n<p><b><i>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 71%</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3>69. Extraction</h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11775857\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11775857\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/NINTCHDBPICT000573257818.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"625\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Chris Hemsworth plays a mercenary called Tyler Rake, who is tasked with rescuing the kidnapped son of a drug lord in Bangladesh</figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>Thor actor <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/chris-hemsworth/\">Chris Hemsworth</a> swaps the Avengers for the black markets to play a mercenary called Tyler Rake, who is tasked with rescuing the kidnapped son of a drug lord in Bangladesh.</p>\n<p>With a former superhero as the lead, there needed to be plenty of action and Extraction certainly delivers and has proved to be one of Netflix&#8217;s most popular releases so far this year.</p>\n<p>A sequel is already in the works.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 68%</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3>70. Wonder Woman</h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11952187\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11952187\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/NINTCHDBPICT000371002010.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"691\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Gal Gadot is sensational as Wonder Woman</figcaption><figcredit>Alamy</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>Wonder Woman had a long wait for her very own standalone movie, but damn it was worth it.<br />\n<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/gal-gadot/\">Gal Gadot</a> plays the heroine, who saves Chris Pine&#8217;s Steve Trevor when his plane crashes on the shores of her secret Amazonian island.<br />\nThe warrior princess soon learns about World War I and sets out to save the human race with Steve&#8217;s help.<br />\nAs well as some seriously good action sequences and great chemistry between Gal and Chris, there are some funny moments which are sometimes lacking in other DC Universe films.<br />\n<em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating:87%</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h1><span style=\"text-decoration: underline\"><span style=\"color: #993300;text-decoration: underline\">But wait, there&#8217;s more</span></span></h1>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>71. Tigertail</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11898224\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 272px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11898224\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/download-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=184\" alt=\"\" width=\"262\" height=\"388\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Taiwanese factory worker leaves his homeland to seek The American Dream</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>Years of monotonous work and a loveless marriage turns a once vibrant man into a shell of his former self.</p>\n<p>In this multi-generational drama, a Taiwanese factory worker leaves his homeland to seek opportunity in America, where he struggles to find connection while balancing family and newfound responsibilities.</p>\n<p>Tigertail effortlessly goes back and forth between the present and the past which has helped to create painful comparisons between Pin-Jui&#8217;s hopes as a young man and the disappointments and hardships of the years following.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 70%</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>72. Spenser Confidential</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11898270\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 497px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11898270 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/NINTCHDBPICT000572360284-e1592496219559.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=487\" alt=\"\" width=\"487\" height=\"694\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Mark Wahlberg stars in this Netflix action movie</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure></p>\n<div class=\"DI6Ufb\">\n<div class=\"NFQFxe viOShc LKPcQc EfDVh mod\" lang=\"en-GB\" data-attrid=\"kc:/film/film:synopsis\" data-md=\"25\" data-hveid=\"CAsQAA\" data-ved=\"2ahUKEwiOxIn53ovqAhXRX8AKHX8vCzEQtwcwAnoECAsQAA\">\n<div class=\"HwtpBd gsrt PZPZlf\" role=\"heading\" data-attrid=\"kc:/film/film:synopsis\">\n<div class=\"Z0LcW XcVN5d k37FLe\">To unravel a twisted murder conspiracy, a former police detective returns to Boston&#8217;s criminal underworld.</div>\n<div>When two Boston police officers are murdered, ex-cop Spenser teams up with his no-nonsense roommate, Hawk, to take down criminals.</div>\n<div>Daddy&#8217;s Home star Mark Wahlberg stars in the movie which was released in March 2020.</div>\n<div><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 54%</strong></em></div>\n</div>\n<div>\n<h3></h3>\n<h3><strong>73. Becoming</strong></h3>\n</div>\n<div class=\"HwtpBd gsrt PZPZlf\" role=\"heading\" data-attrid=\"kc:/film/film:synopsis\">\n<div>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11898404\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11898404 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/NINTCHDBPICT000579650588.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"748\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>AP:Associated Press</figcredit></figure> The former FLOTUS Michelle Obama has her own documentary on Netflix[/caption]</p>\n</div>\n<p>Becoming is a documentary film about the former First Lady of the United States, Michelle Obama.</p>\n<p>The documentary is partly based on her bestselling memoir of the same name, released in 2018.</p>\n<p>It features footage of Obama&#8217;s travels, talk-shows and her work during her tenure as the First Lady.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: Not yet </strong></em><b><i>available</i></b></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>74. Secret Obsession</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11898484\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11898484 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/NINTCHDBPICT000506870041.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"540\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Netflix</figcredit></figure> Jennifer does her best to escape her psycho husband who wants to kill her[/caption]</p>\n<p>Newlywed Jennifer (Brenda Song) is brutally attacked at a dark rest stop.</p>\n<p>While healing from her injuries, she can&#8217;t recall anything from her past, including the ordeal.</p>\n<p>As Russell (Mike Vogel) reintroduces her to their secluded mountain estate, Detective Page (Dennis Haysbert) pursues Jennifer&#8217;s assailant &#8211; his own daughter went missing and was never found.</p>\n<p>The same fate now awaits Jennifer, unless someone realises that her loving caretaker is actually trying to kill her.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 31%</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3><strong>75. A Fall from Grace</strong></h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11898572\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 702px\"><img class=\"wp-image-11898572\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/NINTCHDBPICT000585270213-e1592497781939.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"692\" height=\"534\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>netflix</figcredit></figure> Will the lawyer get to the bottom of the case?[/caption]</p>\n<p>When a woman is indicted for murdering her husband, her lawyer thinks there may be a conspiracy at play.</p>\n<p>The film follows a woman who finds a dangerous new love and the novice attorney who defends her in a sensational court case.</p>\n<p>This Tyler Perry film is the first of his to be released on the giant streaming platform.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 53%</strong></em></p>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<div class=\"DI6Ufb\">\n<div class=\"NFQFxe viOShc LKPcQc EfDVh mod\" lang=\"en-GB\" data-attrid=\"kc:/film/film:synopsis\" data-md=\"25\" data-hveid=\"CAsQAA\" data-ved=\"2ahUKEwiOxIn53ovqAhXRX8AKHX8vCzEQtwcwAnoECAsQAA\">\n<div class=\"HwtpBd gsrt PZPZlf\" role=\"heading\" data-attrid=\"kc:/film/film:synopsis\">\n<h3>76. The Green Mile</h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12185736\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"wp-image-12185736 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/NINTCHDBPICT000371816127-e1595344776436.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"644\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Tom Hanks plays a death row officer in the 1930s in this hard-hitting drama from 1999</figcaption><figcredit>Rex Features</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>Tom Hanks plays a death row officer in the 1930s in this hard-hitting drama from 1999.</p>\n<p>His character forms an unlikely friendship with condemned black prisoner John Coffey (Michael Clarke Duncan), who has been sentenced to death for murdering two little girls.</p>\n<p>The Green Mile is adapted from Stephen King&#8217;s 1996 novel of the same name, and features a supernatural twist alongside some real tear-jerking moments.</p>\n<p>Both Tom and the late Michael put in stellar performances that will leave more than one tear in your eye.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 94%</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3>77. The Truman Show</h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12185733\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 376px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12185733\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/NINTCHDBPICT000000524894.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=366\" alt=\"\" width=\"366\" height=\"201\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Jim Carrey plays an insurance salesman called Truman Burbank who is oblivious to the fact that he&#8217;s the star of his very own show</figcaption><figcredit>Handout</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>Jim Carrey plays an insurance salesman called Truman Burbank who is oblivious to the fact that he&#8217;s the star of his very own show.</p>\n<p>The funnyman plays it relatively straight in this &#8220;psychological science fiction comedy-drama&#8221;, with his character failing to realise actors are playing his family and friends.</p>\n<p>It also stars Laura Linney, Holland Taylor and Ed Harris.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 89%</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3>78. I,Tonya</h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12185738\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12185738\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/NINTCHDBPICT000384658566.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Tonya Harding&#8217;s biopic shows her tumultuous rise to the top and her subsequent fall</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure></p>\n</div>\n</div>\n<p>Tonya Harding&#8217;s biopic shows her tumultuous rise to the top and her subsequent fall.</p>\n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/margot-robbie/\">Margot Robbie</a> plays Tonya, who is fighting for her place on the ice to make her name as the world&#8217;s best figure skater.</p>\n<p>Shot in a documentary format, it shows the abuse Tonya faced at the hands of her husband and mother.</p>\n<p>It also tracks her infamous FBI case after one of the most sensational scandals in sports history.</p>\n<p>The cast also includes Sebastian Stan and a scene-stealing performance from Allison Janney.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 88%</strong></em></p>\n<div class=\"NFQFxe viOShc LKPcQc EfDVh mod\" lang=\"en-GB\" data-attrid=\"kc:/film/film:synopsis\" data-md=\"25\" data-hveid=\"CAsQAA\" data-ved=\"2ahUKEwiOxIn53ovqAhXRX8AKHX8vCzEQtwcwAnoECAsQAA\">\n<div class=\"HwtpBd gsrt PZPZlf\" role=\"heading\" data-attrid=\"kc:/film/film:synopsis\">\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3>79. El Camino: A Breaking Bad Movie</h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12185737\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12185737\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/NINTCHDBPICT000529797814.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Breaking Bad has been billed as one of the best TV series of all time, so a movie spin-off had big shoes to fill</figcaption><figcredit>AP:Associated Press</figcredit></figure></p>\n<h3></h3>\n<p>Breaking Bad has been billed as one of the best TV series of all time, so a movie spin-off had big shoes to fill.</p>\n<p>Thankfully El Camino delivers, following Aaron Paul&#8217;s Jesse Pinkman after his escape from captivity in the series finale.</p>\n<p>A number of old faces pop back up to please hardcore fans, while there are plenty of twists, turns and drama to fill the gap left by the acclaimed crime series.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 81%</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3>80. Prisoners</h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12185734\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12185734\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/NINTCHDBPICT000585270193.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"541\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Jake Gyllenhaal stars in 2013 thriller Prisoners alongside Hugh Jackman</figcaption><figcredit>netflix</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>Jake Gyllenhaal stars in 2013 thriller Prisoners alongside Hugh Jackman.</p>\n<p>Described as ‘one of the most intense thrillers in recent years’, the plot kicks off when two young girls suddenly go missing outside their home.</p>\n<p>Jackman plays the father who is prepared to do whatever it takes to find his daughter.</p>\n<p>Meanwhile, Gyllenhaal plays an erratic, obsessive cop who is becoming increasingly frustrated at the crumbling investigation.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 87%</strong></em></p>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3>81. The Big Lebowski</h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12364074\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"wp-image-12364074 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/NINTCHDBPICT000566528480.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"607\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Alamy</figcredit></figure> This 1998 crime drama stars Jeff Bridges and John Goodman[/caption]</p>\n<p>This 1998 crime drama stars Jeff Bridges as avid bowler Jeff &#8216;The Dude&#8217; Lebowski in Los Angeles who is assaulted in a case of mistaken identity.</p>\n<p>He learns that millionaire Jeffrey Lebowski was the intended victim and when the rich man&#8217;s trophy wife is kidnapped, he tasks The Dude with delivering the ransom money.</p>\n<p>However, the plan goes awry when The Dude&#8217;s friend Walter Sobchak (John Goodman) plots to keep the ransom money.</p>\n<p>The cast also includes Julianne Moore, Philip Seymour Hoffman and Steve Buscemi.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 94%</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3>82. Blackkklansman</h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12364078\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12364078\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/NINTCHDBPICT000463551614.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Blackkklansman tells an extraordinary true story starring Adam Driver and John David Washington</figcaption><figcredit>AP:Associated Press</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>Spike Lee&#8217;s 2018 film tells the extraordinary story of Ron Stallworth, the black police officer who infiltrated the Ku Klux Klan in 1972 with the assistance of Jewish cop Flip Zimmerman.</p>\n<p>Playful and political at the same time, Spike makes sure to hit all the right, relevant notes, while stars Adam Driver and John David Washington turn in stellar performances.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 83%</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3>83. The Imitation Game</h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12364076\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"wp-image-12364076 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/NINTCHDBPICT000314425649-e1597074105926.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"762\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Benedict Cumberbatch was nominated for a Best Actor Oscar for his turn as real life genius Alan Turing</figcaption><figcredit>Rex Features</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>Benedict Cumberbatch was nominated for a Best Actor Oscar for his turn as real life genius Alan Turing.</p>\n<p>Alan decrypted German intelligence messages for the British government during the Second World War and helped develop a machine that eventually cracked the enemy&#8217;s Enigma code.</p>\n<p>Aside from his professional successes, The Imitiation Game also offers a glimpse into Alan&#8217;s personal life as a gay man, producing some emotional scenes in the process.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 91%</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3>84. Groundhog Day</h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12364533\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12364533\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/NINTCHDBPICT000061634251.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"645\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Ghostbusters co-stars Bill Murray and Harold Ramis joined forces once again for this 1993 classic</figcaption><figcredit>Moviepix - Getty</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>Ghostbusters co-stars Bill Murray and Harold Ramis joined forces once again for this 1993 classic, only this time Harold remained behind the camera as the director and writer.</p>\n<p>The storyline follows Bill&#8217;s character, cynical TV weatherman Phi Connors, who becomes trapped in a time loop and forced to relive February 2 repeatedly.</p>\n<p>The film also stars Andie MacDowell and Chris Elliott, and while Bill and Harold clashed off camera over creative differences, the finished result offers plenty of laughs which you won&#8217;t mind watching again, and again&#8230;</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 88%</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<h3>85. No Country for Old Men</h3>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12364077\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12364077\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/NINTCHDBPICT000371598931.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"672\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">This 2007 film starring Josh Brolin, Tommy Lee Jones and Javier Bardem went on to win four Oscars, including Best Picture</figcaption><figcredit>Kobal Collection - Shutterstock</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>This 2007 film starring Josh Brolin, Tommy Lee Jones and Javier Bardem went on to win four Oscars, including Best Picture.</p>\n<p>The Coen Brothers also won Best Director for the thriller, which follows Llewellyn Moss (Brolin) as he makes off with a case of cash and is pursued by psychopathic killer Anton Chigurh (Bardem) who wants the money back.</p>\n<p>Anton leaves a trail of bodies in his wake, bringing Sheriff Ed Tom Bell (Lee Jones) to the case, with both men trying to get to Llewellyn first.</p>\n<p><em><strong>Rotten Tomatoes Audience Rating: 86%</strong></em></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<p><em><strong>All the titles above are available to stream on Netflix. For more recommendations check out our <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/11241040/best-series-to-watch-on-netflix/\">round-up of Netflix&#8217;s best eaderx5oss/cdn29@2020_4/2020/08/25/11-06-44-731_85d6b87989c1d76b.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/IT-e1587653838119.jpg?strip=all&w=485":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn5@2020_3/2020/08/25/11-06-40-373_0cb5915b23a5c178.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Shutter-Island-e1589376862473.jpg?strip=all&w=790":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn22@2020_1/2020/08/25/11-06-39-560_0b57acf7856e938a.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/NINTCHDBPICT000587021522.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn66@2020_4/2020/08/25/11-06-38-955_1d43dd256df30d56.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/NINTCHDBPICT000589680387.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn4@2020_4/2020/08/25/11-06-29-987_03bc4e3a763e4d5c.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Spirited-Away-e1587659650950.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn21@2020_1/2020/08/25/11-06-38-400_fbb5054d3c15f00a.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/boss-baby-e1587659628619.jpg?strip=all&w=759":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn73@2020_4/2020/08/25/11-06-39-848_2eb39ed9bbee9b79.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Shrek-e1587134647446.jpg?strip=all&w=636":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn88@2020_1/2020/08/25/11-06-29-518_16cbf523b36b5c2f.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/My-Neighbour-Totoro-e1587659420333.jpeg?strip=all&w=275":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx2/cdn51@2020_5/2020/08/25/11-06-35-003_7f18aef9071768a1.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Mowgli-e1588696253127.jpg?strip=all&w=743":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx2/cdn95@2020_5/2020/08/25/11-06-29-623_7fc52a0cab762b71.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Happy-Feet.jpeg?strip=all&w=495":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx29/cd deals</a></h2>\n\n\n\n<hr class=\"wp-block-separator\" />\n</div></div>\n\n\n\n<p>According to Sky Italia, <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/team/1302934/ac-milan/\">Milan</a> are expected to make a breakthrough in negotiations with the veteran striker in the next 48 hours on a deal around £104,000-a-week.</p>\n\n\n\n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/zlatan-ibrahimovic/\">Ibrahimovic </a>bagged 11 goals in 20 appearances to rejuvenate Milan after his January arrival.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The club were hoping to have the deal tied up by Monday when the rest of his team-mates began their pre-season. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>His super-agent <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/mino-raiola/\">Mino Raiola</a> had put the pressure on Milan&#8217;s hedge fund owners Elliott to ensure an agreement takes place. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Raiola said: &#8220;We are still talking, but there is no agreement yet.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;It’s not about money, but of conviction and style.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12374351\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><a Europe</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;It takes two to make a marriage work and if Ibrahimovic didn’t want to remain with the Rossoneri, then there wouldn’t be a negotiation.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“Elliott have to make choices, different ones. They know how to make decisions in the financial world, but need to learn how to make them in the sporting world too.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“We are in a very sensitive phase of the negotiations and I don’t colleague","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/12489198/charlie-mott-alex-jones-tears-one-show-sudden-death/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>HEARTBROKEN Alex Jones fought back tears tonight as she paid tribute to a young The One Show colleague who died suddenly at the weekend.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The 43-year-old presenter dedicated the end of the show to Charlie Mott, one of the BBC programme&#8217;s researchers.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12489227\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/alex-4.png?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489227\" width=\"960\" height=\"668\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Alex fought back tears as she paid tribute</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<p>Closing this evening&#8217;s episode of the show, <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/alex-jones/\">Alex </a>told viewers: &#8220;Now, before we go, we just wanted to pay tribute to one of out colleagues Charlie Mott, who sadly died at the weekend.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;Everybody on the team is absolutely devastated. He was hugely talented and such good company. We miss him so much.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Clearly overwhelmed with emotion, the star added: &#8220;Our thoughts are with his family and we are sending lots of love from all of us here.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12489234\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 210px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603894148.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=200\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489234\" width=\"200\" height=\"200\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Linkedin</figcredit></figure>Charlie tragically passed away at the weekend[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>As a mark of respect for Charlie, <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/the-one-show/\">The One Show</a> did not include their upbeat theme music as the credits rolled after the show.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Instead, the closing frames aired in complete silence.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Charie is thought to be just three years out of University, having graduated from Bournemouth in 2017.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12489267\" We love you so much Charlie.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Another tweeted: &#8220;Will miss you buddy x.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n<div></div>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Tue, 25 Aug 2020 08:51:00 +0000","feedId":10019,"bgimg":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/alex-4.png?strip=all&w=960","linkMd5":"c50cb9779b396638385f422fe1a22196","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn58@2020_4/2020/08/25/11-06-26-743_c16c99dcb74bb4ba.webp","destWidth":960,"destHeight":668,"sourceBytes":86484,"destBytes":86484,"author":"Stephanie Soteriou","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/alex-4.png?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn58@2020_4/2020/08/25/11-06-26-743_c16c99dcb74bb4ba.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603894148.jpg?strip=all&w=200":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn55@2020_1/2020/08/25/11-06-29-343_f2d6ce72fc57e206.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/alex2-1.png?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn13@2020_6/2020/08/25/11-06-37-281_d6893c47cab70450.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598353584748},{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 19:06:24","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 19:06:24","title":"Who is Sean Connery’s wife Micheline Roquebrune and does he have children?","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/12491975/sean-connery-wife-micheline-roquebrune-children-career/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>SEAN Connery is the ultimate heartthrob for many women. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Devastatingly, <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/12491224/sean-connery-age-wife-children-films-net-worth/\">the 007 star</a> has been married since 1975 to his petite wife Micheline Roquebrune &#8211; and the pair are still going strong. </p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12492402\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000001845719-3.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492402\" width=\"960\" height=\"748\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>AP:Associated Press</figcredit></figure>Micheline, born in 1929, is Sean Connery&#8217;s wife of over 40 years[/caption]\n\n\n\n<h2>Who is Sean Connery&#8217;s wife Micheline Roquebrune?</h2>\n\n\n\n<p>Micheline, born in 1929, is Sean Connery&#8217;s wife of over 40 years.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Connery has been married to Moroccan-French painter Micheline Roquebrune since 1975.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>They met in 1970 at a golf tournament in Morocco.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>She had been married twice and Sean had already split from his first wife<br>Diane Cilento.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12492348\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 539px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603839964.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=529\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492348\" width=\"529\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>The Mega Agency</figcredit></figure>Sean and Micheline met in 1970 at a golf tournament in Morocco[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>Micheline revealed the pair hit it off &#8211; and romped within 24 hours of meeting.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Sean said: “In the early days it was difficult for us to see each other. She was<br>still living in North Africa with her children”.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Micheline is a painter and creates her work using &#8220;simplified forms, unexpected croppings and changes of scale&#8221;.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>She has diverse interests, and also produces plays. Her Broadway play Art earned a Tony Award.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Micheline is a keen golfer, and she often plays golf with her husband Sean Connery.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12492406\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 617px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000004597640-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=607\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492406\" width=\"607\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>PA:Press Association</figcredit></figure>Micheline is a keen painter[/caption]\n\n\n\n<h2>Does Sean Connery have children?</h2>\n\n\n\n<p>Connery has one son, Jason Connery, with first wife, actress Diane Cilento.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Jason is now an English actor, voice actor and director. </p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row \">\n\t\t<div class=\"col New boyfriend rumours explained","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/12491838/jeffree-star-dating-new-boyfriend-rumours/","description":"<p><strong>JEFFREE Star is YouTube royalty and has a bank balance to prove it.</strong></p>\n<p>It now looks like the <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/entertainment/1065923/jeffree-star-youtube-net-worth/\">make-up mogul</a> has found love again.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12491835\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 630px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/jeffree2.png?strip=all&#38;w=620\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491835\" width=\"620\" height=\"695\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Instagram</figcredit></figure>Jeffree Star is a YouTube megastar[/caption]</p>\n<h2>Who is Jeffree Star dating?</h2>\n<p>Jeffree is yet to reveal exactly who he is dating right now.</p>\n<p>However, in August 2020 fans were convinced that he is seeing someone after he posted a steamy anonymous photo of himself sitting on the lap of a man.</p>\n<p>He captioned the snap with: &#8220;Thankful for all the blessings God has brought into my life this year.&#8221;</p>\n<p>In the picture the man is faceless, but his arm tattoos are visible.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12491836\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 737px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/jeffree1.png?strip=all&#38;w=727\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491836\" width=\"727\" height=\"737\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Instagram</figcredit></figure>Jeffree posted this steam snap of him on the lap of an unidentified man [/caption]</p>\n<h2>When did Jeffree Star split up with <strong>Nathan Schwandt</strong>?</h2>\n<p>In January 2020, <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/entertainment/242580/jeffree-star-nathan-schwandt-split-five-years-together/\">Jeffree revealed that he and Nathan had broken up after five years together</a>.</p>\n<p>He confirmed the news in an emotional YouTube video entitled “<a href=\"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=w4Ro3SsYT5s\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">We Broke Up.</a>”.</p>\n<p>He said: “I never thought the day would come where I&#8217;d be sitting here talking about this. We&#8217;ve tried to film this 10 times now and I&#8217;ve cried every single time.</p>\n<p>“We are a few weeks in of me and Nathan no longer being together and I don&#8217;t even know where to begin. There’s no easy way to say this, but we did break up.”</p>\n<p>The YouTuber said that he was “devastated” over the split but they remained good friends.</p>\n<p>Although Jeffree didn’t want to speak about the split in a video, he decided to because the two have filmed together frequently.</p>\n<p>He ended the video with: “I will always have love for him. Are we in love with each other? No. But we love each other and he will always be in my life.”</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12491837\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/01/NINTCHDBPICT000553437006.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=762\" alt=\"But there is no bad blood, as Jeffree said he is &#34;grateful&#34; for his ex\" class=\"alignnone wp-image-12491837\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Getty - Contributor</figcredit></figure>Jeffree split from longterm love Nathan Schwandt in after showing off a hidden tattoo in a topless snap</strong>.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The 45-year-old actress &#8211; who is best known for playing Tina Carter on the&#160;<a after showing off a hidden tattoo in a topless snap[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>The Tattoo is of a meditating earth mother figure with long wavy hair that is interwoven with leaves and flowers.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The figure is sitting in a shaded triangle, and there is a crescent moon etched just above the top of the triangle.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>It is not Luisa&#8217;s only <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/tattoos/\">piece of body art</a>, with the actress sharing a glimpse of other designs in a recent image of herself in a strappy top.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The actress recently <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/12172067/eastenders-luisa-bradshaw-white-wife-anniversary/\">celebrated her five-year wedding anniversary</a> with her wife Annette.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12491365\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img City[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>The couple had a civil partnership in 2006 and officially got married in 2015 &#8211; where their two daughters were bridesmaids.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Luisa recently revealed the &#8216;cosy&#8217; home that she and her family had locked down in together during the pandemic. </p>\n\n\n\n<p><a house. NEWS</a></h2>\n<hr />\n<p>&#160;</p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Tue, 25 Aug 2020 11:01:21 +0000","feedId":10019,"bgimg":"","linkMd5":"a43b67970f7da3a6a3b39791d72df4cc","bgimgJsdelivr":"","metaImg":"","author":"James Orr","publishedOrCreatedDate":1598353584632},{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 19:06:24","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 19:06:24","title":"Jacob Blake shooting – Trump Jr shares unconnected arrest history of unarmed black man hours after he was shot by cops","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12491492/donald-trump-jr-jacob-blake-arrest-history/","description":"<p>DONALD Trump Jr retweeted a post which detailed the prior criminal convictions of an unarmed black man who was shot by police in front of his kids.</p>\n<p>Harrowing video showing Jacob Blake, 29, being blasted seven times by a cop in Kenosha, Wisconsin on Sunday has sparked fresh Black Lives Matter protests in the city.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12491483\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000596356076.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491483\" history[/caption]</p>\n<div class=\"oembed-container oembed-twitter\">\n<blockquote class=\"twitter-tweet\" data-width=\"550\" data-dnt=\"true\">\n<p lang=\"en\" dir=\"ltr\">Jacob Blake, the man shot by police in Kenosha, Wisc., has a history of assaulting police. He also has past charges for domestic abuse &#38; a sex crime. There&#39;s a warrent for his arrest. BLM rioters are currently destroying the city to avenge the shooting. <a href=\"https://t.co/BErLeJdPwj\">https://t.co/BErLeJdPwj</a> <a href=\"https://t.co/JhHcbis5kf\">pic.twitter.com/JhHcbis5kf</a></p>\n<p>&#8212; Andy Ngô (@MrAndyNgo) <a href=\"https://twitter.com/MrAndyNgo/status/1297776854670008320?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw\">August 24, 2020</a></p></blockquote>\n<p><script async src=\"https://platform.twitter.com/widgets.js\" charset=\"utf-8\"></script></div>\n<p>Police say they were responding to a domestic disturbance when Blake was gunned down as he entered his car while his children were sitting in the back seat.</p>\n<p>Amid the anarchic violence which has since erupted in Kenosha, Trump Jr, the son of President Donald Trump, retweeted a post by journalist Andy Ngo which detailed Blake&#8217;s criminal history.</p>\n<p>Mr Ngo is a reporter known for his coverage of street protests in the US including those by left-wing groups Antifa and BLM.</p>\n<p>His post claimed that Mr Blake had been arrested for pulling a gun on a customer in a bar and allegedly caused “soft tissue damage” to a cop during the subsequent arrest.</p>\n<p>He was also allegedly charged with third-degree sexual assault and domestic violence.</p>\n<p>Trump Jr also posted a video from a YouTuber showing “BLM arsonists” appearing to set fire to a car dealership in Wisconsin.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12491484\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 616px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603835594-4.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=606\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491484\" width=\"606\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Facebook</figcredit></figure>Jacob Blake, 29, was shot seven times in the back in Kenosha, Wisconsin at the weekend[/caption]</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12491486\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 545px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603836211-1.png?strip=all&#38;w=535\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491486\" width=\"535\" height=\"713\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Raysean White via TMX.news</figcredit></figure>Footage shows Mr Blake climbing into his SUV before cops open fire[/caption]</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12491487\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 548px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603836201-1.png?strip=all&#38;w=538\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491487\" width=\"538\" height=\"827\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Raysean White via TMX.news</figcredit></figure>Blake was shot seven time in front of his children on Sunday[/caption]</p>\n<p>The issues of racism in America and police brutality towards black people have been inflamed by the death of George Floyd in Minneapolis in May.</p>\n<p>Police officer Derek Chauvin was filmed holding his knee on the neck of Mr Floyd – who died minutes later &#8211; who appeared distressed and repeatedly said he was struggling to breath.</p>\n<p>Since then, BLM protests have erupted nationwide and the shooting of Jacob Blake has further enraged the movement.</p>\n<p>The Kenosha incident happened on Sunday at about 5pm local time as officers were responding to a &#8220;domestic incident&#8221;.</p>\n<p>A video circulating on social media showed the man walking towards a car followed by two officers and one of them shooting him in front of his kids as he opens the car door.</p>\n<p>Witnesses said Blake was trying to break up an argument between women in a home nearby.</p>\n<p>The 29-year-old is recovering in hospital and is expected to survive.</p>\n<p>\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row \">\n\t\t<div class=\"col sun-col-6\">\n\n\t\t\t<div class=\"rail off","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/fabulous/12491461/britains-biggest-family-radfords-make-most-sun-school-chaos/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>MUM-of-22 Sue Radford has shared a sweet photo of her numerous kids enjoying the family’s hot tub before they return to school next week. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>The Radfords are Britain’s biggest family, and most of their large brood will be getting ready to start lessons once more after lockdown. </p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12491505\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 550px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/IMG_5478.jpeg?strip=all&#38;w=540\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491505\" width=\"540\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Mum-of-22 Sue Radford shared this photo of her kids enjoying themselves in the family hot tub before school starts</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<p>Sue, 45, from Lancashire, posted a candid shot to Instagram of her kids “making the most of the sun” by splashing around in the water.&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The Radfords are Britain&#8217;s biggest family, with Noel and Sue parents to Chris, 30, Sophie, 26, Chloe, 24, Jack, 22, Daniel, 20, Luke, 19, Millie, 18, Katie, 17, James, 16, Ellie, 14, Aimee, 13, Josh, 12, Max, 11, Tillie, nine, Oscar, eight, Casper, seven, Hallie, four, Phoebe, four, Archie, two, Bonnie, one and Heidie, three months.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Sadly, the couple&#8217;s 17th child Alfie was still born on July 6, 2014.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>They also have three grandchildren, Sophie&#8217;s kids &#8211; Daisy, seven, Ayprill, five, and Leo, four.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_undefined\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/NINTCHDBPICT000575468273.jpg?strip=all\" alt=\"Sue and Noel Radford, who have 22 kids, have taken their large brood for a walk during lockdown\" class=\"alignnone\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Sue and Noel Radford have certainly kept busy entertaining their brood during lockdown</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_undefined\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/NINTCHDBPICT000572770380.jpg?strip=all\" alt=\"Previously Sue shared how she was homeschooling her large brood in their home\" class=\"alignnone\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Previously Sue shared how she was homeschooling her large family in their home</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<p>The couple famously don’t claim any benefits apart from Child Benefit and rely on Noel’s bakery business to make ends meet.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Sue and Noel have admitted being self-isolated with their huge family has been chaotic at times, especially as Sue gave birth to their 22nd child during lockdown.&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>She has also been in charge of homeschooling her large brood and keeping them entertained in their 10-bed pad in Lancashire.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Speaking exclusively to The Sun the supermum said in April: “The ten-hour labour was hard. But now we have weeks of isolation with a newborn baby. Let the crazy times begin.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“Only two of the kids have flown the nest, so we are all home now for the foreseeable.”</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_undefined\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/NINTCHDBPICT000575292197.jpg?strip=all\" alt=\"Sue gave birth to Heidi during lockdown as has sworn she will be her last baby\" class=\"alignnone\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Sue gave birth to Heidi during lockdown and has sworn she will be her last baby</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<p>Part of the lockdown fun has included putting up a <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/fabulous/11550448/britains-biggest-family-radfords-water-park-play-area-22-kids-lockdown/\">huge paddling pool during lockdown for the kids to cool down in.&#160;</a></p>\n\n\n\n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/fabulous/10881047/pregnant-sue-radford-announces-induction-date-booked/\">Sue</a> and husband Noel added another little girl weighing 7lb to their king-sized clan on April 3.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The couple revealed her name is<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/fabulous/11384645/sue-radford-baby-name-lockdown/\"> Heidie Rose.</a></p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_undefined\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\"><img /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Sue also revealed what takeaway night looks like with her large family</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<p>After she gave birth, the doting mum shared a snap of her brood <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/fabulous/11369395/britains-largest-family-lounge-dominos-delivery-sue-22nd-child/\">tucking into a vast spread of delicious-looking Domino’s pizza</a> on their lounge floor.&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Sue, who has spent more than 800 weeks of her life pregnant, has sworn this will be her last baby — but has said the same in the past.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>At Easter, Sue also showed off a <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/fabulous/11381888/mum-britains-biggest-family-sue-radford-huge-easter-egg-wall-22-kids/\">gigantic chocolate egg wall</a> that she had made in her lounge for the entire family.&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row class=\"rail__item-gradient-light\">\n\n\t</div>\n\t<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tv/12456074/emmerdale-boss-reveals-original-plans-malone-death/\" class=\"rail__item-anchor\"></a>\n\n</div><!-- .rail__item .swiper-slide -->\n\t\t\t\t\t</div><!-- .swiper-wrapper -->\n\n\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"swiper-button-prev theme__background-color-rgba-80\"></div>\n\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"swiper-button-next -->\n\t</div><!-- .sun-row .{row} .rail-video-index-->\n\t</div> <!-- .sun-grid-container .sun-grid-container--{color} -->\n\t<!--googleon: all-->\n\t\n\n\n\n<p>While a fourth chimed in: &#8220;Counting down the days to insomnia.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Just like Hill House, <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tv/11470697/netflix-the-haunting-of-hill-house-sequel-bly-manor-on-schedule/\">The Haunting Of Bly Manor</a> is based off horror classic, Henry James’ The Turn Of The Screw.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The plot follows a young boy named Miles (Benjamin Evan Ainsworth), who is expelled from boarding school and returns to his family home, Bly Manor. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Before long ghosts of a man and woman start appear around the manor, terrorising the governess, the housekeeper Mrs Grose, as well as Miles’ little sister, Flora.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Given that the original novella was written in 1898 there will be susbtantial updates to fit with a modern setting, but the main narrative will remain the same.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_undefined\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\"><img src=\"https://pbs.twimg.com/media/EgMbiKUVoAA56yQ?format=jpg&#38;name=large\" alt=\"Image\" class=\"alignnone\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">The show is based on Henry James’ The Turn Of The Screw</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<p>Disucssing the new season, creator Mike Flanagan told Vanity Fair: &#8220;It certainly provides a new way to tell a love story, and there are three of them that really beat at the heart of this season.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;They all have a very dark edge to them. And by the end, it’s really hard to differentiate tragedy with romance,&#8221; he continued.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;That sense of romantic longing for someone who meant so much to us—but who’s gone—really is the heart of any ghost story.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p><em><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/7505510/haunting-of-hill-house/\">The Haunting of Hill House</a> is available to stream on Netflix now.</em></p>\n\n\n<div></div>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Tue, 25 Aug 2020 10:10:57
