19:06:24","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 19:06:24","title":"Epstein said ‘it’s nice to have things on people’ when asked why he ‘coerced girl to have sex with Prince Andrew’","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12491695/epstein-coerced-girl-claims-sex-prince-andrew/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p><strong>JEFFREY Epstein said “it’s nice to have things on people” when asked why he allegedly coerced a girl to have sex with Prince Andrew, a former model claims.</strong></p>\n\n\n\n<p>The disgraced billionaire gave the chilling response when confronted by former model Lisa Phillips &#8211; who says her friend slept with the royal on Epstein&#8217;s orders. </p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_undefined\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000540429815-2.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"Andrew and Epstein on a stroll in New York’s Central Park\" class=\"alignnone\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Epstein said “it’s nice to have things on people” when asked why he allegedly coerced a girl to have sex with Prince Andrew, a former model claims</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_undefined\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603840358.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=634\" alt=\"Model Lisa Phillips, 42, said her pal slept with Prince Andrew on the orders of paedophile Jeffrey Epstein\" class=\"alignnone\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Model Lisa Phillips, 42, said her pal slept with Prince Andrew on the orders of paedophile Jeffrey Epstein</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<p>Ex-pin up Lisa, who now runs an LA modelling firm, first met Epstein after a Caribbean photoshoot in 2000, and he later invited her and another pal to his island, Little St James.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Lisa, 42, said in 2004 the friend <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12488617/jeffrey-epstein-told-pal-to-bed-prince-andrew-claim/\">confided about the alleged incident</a> at <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/jeffrey-epstein/\">Epstein’s</a> New York townhouse.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Lisa claimed: “She told me Jeffrey told her to go into a bedroom and have sex with <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/prince-andrew/\">Prince Andrew</a>. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;She said Andrew had sex with her, and left the room. I think she was confused by Jeffrey — manipulated by him. She felt like she had to do it.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“That’s why she was so angry, so upset. She thought they had a different relationship.”</p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t<blockquote class=\"article__quote\">\n\t\t<div class=\"article__quote-copy theme__before-color theme__after-color\">\n\t\t\t<p>He grinned and said, ‘Oh it’s nice to have things on people’</p>\n\t\t\t\t<cite class=\"article__quote-credit theme__copy-color\">\n\t\t\t\t\t<span class=\"quote-credit\">Lisa Phillips </span>\t\t\t\t</cite>\n\t\t\t\t\t</div>\n\t</blockquote>\n\t<!--googleon: all-->\n\t\n\n\n\n<p>Lisa continued: “I had one last conversation with Jeffrey. I said, ‘My friend told me about you instructing her to have sex with Prince Andrew’. He said something like it wasn’t a big deal, that she was OK with it.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“I said. ‘Nobody’s OK with that — why would you do that?’.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“He grinned and said, ‘Oh it’s nice to have things on people’. That wasn’t the first time he’d said that to me.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The Sun has spoken to her pal, who was in her early 20s at the time, and she declined to comment &#8211; but Lisa said she &#8220;was very upset&#8221; and &#8220;was crying&#8221;. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Prince Andrew has been accused of sleeping with “sex slave” Virginia Roberts in New York, London and the Caribbean. He denies it.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>There is no suggestion the Prince knew of Epstein’s demand or was involved in any non-consensual sex. And last night sources close to him branded the allegation “baseless”.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_undefined\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000593250503.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=849\" alt=\"Virginia Roberts pictured with Andrew in London\" class=\"alignnone\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Virginia Roberts pictured with Andrew in London</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_undefined\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000550752094.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"Prince Andrew spoke for the first time about his links to Jeffrey Epstein in an interview with BBC Newsnight's Emily Maitlis in 2019\" class=\"alignnone\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Prince Andrew spoke for the first time about his links to Jeffrey Epstein in an interview with BBC Newsnight&#8217;s Emily Maitlis in 2019</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<p>Lisa recalled that she found <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/9462788/jeffrey-epstein-dead-suicide-sex-trafficking-prison/\">Epstein</a> &#8220;very charming&#8221; when she first met him.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>She added: &#8220;I found Jeffrey very charming and he seemed really nice. I had mentioned I had lived in England and he said, ‘Oh, would you like to meet a prince?&#8217;.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“This man walked up and I recognised him as Prince Andrew. He was very nice. It was very brief.”</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Lisa saw nothing untoward on the island and over the next few years met with Epstein at charity events, parties and Broadway shows.</p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: 19:06:24","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 19:06:24","title":"PES 2021 front cover features Cristiano Ronaldo AND Lionel Messi together for first time alongside Man Utd ace Rashford","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/12491160/pes-2021-cover-ronaldo-messi/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>PES 2021 will feature Cristiano Ronaldo and Lionel Messi together on the cover for the very first time. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Manchester United star Marcus Rashford and Bayern Munich&#8217;s Alphonso Davies have also been picked.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12491106\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 770px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/sport-preview-3.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=760\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491106\" width=\"760\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Lionel Messi is alongside Cristiano Ronaldo on the front cover</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<p>The official cover design of eFootball PES 2021 Season Update has been revealed ahead of its release on September 15.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>And fans were stunned to see both of the Ballon d&#8217;Or rivals taking centre stage.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>One said: &#8220;Now this game is officially the GOAT.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Another added: &#8220;Looks like PES2021 couldn&#8217;t quite decide on a cover star &#8211; but they didn&#8217;t let that stop them.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Messi featured on the cover of the 2020 version of the game, but Ronaldo has not been picked since 2013.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Surprisingly, Ronaldo was on the cover alongside Michael Owen in 2008.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Fans had hoped to see Messi and Ronaldo line-up alongside each other this season. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>The Barcelona ace was tipped to leave the Nou Camp after their disastrous 8-2 defeat to Bayern Munich.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>But the Spanish giants will demand clubs meet his £631million release clause if he hands in a transfer request. </p>\n\n\n\n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/12489576/man-city-lionel-messi-afford/\">Manchester City are said to be weighing up a move</a> for the Argentine ace. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>And Inter Milan&#8217;s former owner has claimed <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/12490730/inter-milan-lionel-messi-transfer-barcelona-owner/\">the Serie A side are trying to sign him.</a></p>\n\n\n\n<p>Should Messi make the move to Italy, he will once again be up against Ronaldo. </p>\n\n\n\n<div class=\"oembed-container oembed-twitter\"><blockquote class=\"twitter-tweet\" data-width=\"550\" data-dnt=\"true\"><p lang=\"en\" company. <a href=\"https://twitter.com/officialpes?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw\">@officialpes</a> <a href=\"https://twitter.com/Konami?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw\">@Konami</a> <br><br>Get your copy for September 19:06:24","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 19:06:24","title":"Tuesday Racing: Tips, news, betting and all the latest for Yarmouth, Catterick and Bangor today","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/horseracing/12487016/tuesday-racing-tips-betting-yarmouth-catterick-bangor-today/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>YOU really have to be a racing anorak to get excited by Tuesday&#8217;s offering on course.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Catterick and Yarmouth provide the entertainment on the Flat and the summer jumping continues at Bangor. It&#8217;s relatively uninspiring stuff, but it keeps the show on the road.</p>\n\n\n\n<img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/sun-racing-grop-33-Recovered-2.png?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12487537\" width=\"960\" height=\"540\" />\n\n\n\n<p>There are some big guns out at <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/horseracing/racecards/2020-08-25/yarmouth/15:20\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">Yarmouth</a> and away from the handicaps there may be one or two races to note.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Being so close to Newmarket a few of the fair-weather jockeys don&#8217;t mind the short drive.</p>\n\n\n\n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/horseracing/racecards/2020-08-25/catterick/12:50\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">Catterick&#8217;s card</a> looked a punting nightmare. Plenty of low-grade handicaps mean it was hard work, but there was one bet I found, albeit a rather unoriginal one.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Bangor keeps the tweed brigade chirpy &#8211; <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/horseracing/racecards/2020-08-25/bangor-on-dee/13:00\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">with a pair of 0-130s technically the best races of the day</a>. Nicky Henderson and Nico De Boinville are even set to make an appearance.</p>\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<h3>Tuesday&#8217;s Bets</h3>\n\n\n\n<p>Completing a Rubik&#8217;s cube whilst blindfolded may have been simply than some of the handicaps on offer on Tuesday.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>But up at Catterick one horse sticks out as a bet, with Ralph Beckett&#8217;s yard back in good nick.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>And <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/horseracing/racecards/2020-08-25/catterick/14:55\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">DEFT (2.55 Catterick)</a> looks to have been found a nice opening on her handicap bow.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>She&#8217;s been a slow burner &#8211; a very slow one &#8211; but showed more at Newbury last time, when finishing well from off the pace in what looked an above average novice.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>A mark of 72 looks fair enough on that run alone and it may have been a few pounds higher had she not been so quiet at Kempton and Windsor.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Now Beckett isn&#8217;t one to rush his horses and why she is unlikely to be anything to write home about in time, her pedigree suggests she should be kicking on from this level in the near future.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>She&#8217;s a half-sister to the yard&#8217;s Oaks winner Talent and runs in the same colours.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Up in trip again, she is just about backable with David O&#8217;Meara&#8217;s <strong>Golden Hind</strong> sure to be popular. Bigger prices were quickly chopped up, but she should be better than these.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>On a miserable day, she&#8217;s all we can muster &#8211; but a winner, is a winner.</p>\n\n\n\n<iframe class=\"authenticated-iframe\" src=\"https://fragments.sunracingtech.uk/best_price?horse=deft&#038;date=2020-08-25&#038;time=14:55&#038;course=catterick\" height=\"150\" width=\"100%\" frameborder=\"0\" style=\"height: 150px;\"></iframe>\n\n\n\n\t<div class=\"article-boxout\">\n\t\t<div class=\"article-boxout__header theme__background-color\">\n\t\t\t<h3 class=\"article-boxout__headline\">Tuesday Bets</h3>\n\t\t</div>\n\t\t<div class=\"article-boxout__content theme__background-color-rgba-20\">\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t<div>\n<p><strong>DEFT</strong>&#8211; 2pt win 11-4 (Betfair, Paddy Power)</p>\n<p>Rolling P&#38;L: -2.90</p>\n</div>\n\t\t</div>\n\t</div>\n\t\n\n\n\n<h3>Be there, or be square</h3>\n\n\n\n<p>A couple of the heats are of potential long-term interest at Yarmouth, and none more so than the <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/horseracing/racecards/2020-08-25/yarmouth/18:30\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">Fillies&#8217; Novice (6.30)</a> over a mile.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>John Gosden has a good record at the track and he&#8217;s run a few smart ones down the years at the seaside track. <strong>Mostly</strong> has a way to go yet but could be yet another promising filly for the yard &#8211; she&#8217;ll be hard to beat here.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>She&#8217;s closely related to the yard&#8217;s Group 1 winner Journey and should defy a  penalty here.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>But she faces a few nicely bred types &#8211; the Hamdan pair of <strong>Jaariyah</strong> and <strong>Areehaa</strong> particularly.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>For a quiet day, this looks an above average novice &#8211; on paper anyway.</p>\n\n\n\n\t<div class=\"article-boxout\">\n\t\t<div class=\"article-boxout__header theme__background-color\">\n\t\t\t<h3 class=\"article-boxout__headline\">Going £1,040,099.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12492380\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 629px\"><img registered as a director on retail business Luxenoa which has assets of £1,024,798.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The business made a profit of £68, 846 last year.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Rylan&#8217;s career success has even helped him overcome trolls as he recently revealed he likes to look at his bank balance to boost his mood when they target him.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12492381\" class=\"wp-caption Big Brother the following year and ended up presenting the show&#8217;s sister programme, Bit On The Side, for five years.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Rylan&#8217;s stock continued to rise with him presenting the showbiz segment on This Morning as well as The Xtra Factor Live.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Proving popular across the stations, Rylan co-hosts Strictly&#8217;s It Takes Two with Zoe Ball and he landed his own 19:06:24","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 19:06:24","title":"A Suitable Boy leaves viewers sobbing as Lata finally chooses who to marry in heart-wrenching finale","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tv/12491379/a-suitable-boy-sobbing-lata-marry-heart-wrenching-finale/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>A SUITABLE Boy finale had viewers sobbing as Lata finally finally chose who to marry in the heart-wrenching end of the series.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The BBC drama, based on Vikram Seth&#8217;s 1993 novel of the same name, follows the story of Lata, a student coming of age in North India.&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12491755\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603998842.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491755\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>BBC</figcredit></figure>Lata chose cutie pie Haresh to be her husband[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>The six-part drama partly follows Lata Mehra, played by Tanya Maniktala, a spirited and intelligent university student who has to choose between three potential suitors.&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Find herself a ‘suitable boy’.&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>There’s the &#8220;honourable&#8221; shoe manufacturer Haresh, played by Namit Das, aspiring writer Amit (and awful poet), played by Mikhail Sen, and Muslim hunk Kabir, played by Danesh Razvi.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Monday night’s finale saw Lata finally make her decision – Haresh – and viewers were divided about if she had made the right choice.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12491759\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603998839.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491759\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>BBC</figcredit></figure>Lata&#8217;s decision divided viewers[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12491772\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000598660347-3.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491772\" width=\"960\" height=\"639\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>BBC</figcredit></figure>Amit would have had Lata in stitches with his terrible poetry[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>“That wasn&#8217;t the one she was meant to be with!!!! SO disappointed!!!!,” exclaimed one viewer.&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>A second moaned: “Totally loved #ASuitableBoy. She chose a sweetie in the end, but my heart ached for Kabir <img src=\"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/1f62d.png\" alt=\"😭\" class=\"wp-smiley\" style=\"height: 1em; max-height: 1em;\" />”</p>\n\n\n\n<p>However many were pleased with Lata’s love choice, with one writing: “What a delightful ending to A Suitable Boy: Lata made the right decision in choosing Harish – the sweetest, most honourable and solid man imaginable – &#8216;he&#8217;s so real&#8230; his feet touch the ground&#8217;.”</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;In the end Lata was a shrewd business woman. Love was not as important to her as a secure and stable future,&#8221; another added. &#8220;She rarely uttered words of love and compassion. For Lata, love was just transactional.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12491797\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 650px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000601930763-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=640\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491797\" width=\"640\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>BBC</figcredit></figure>Where as Kabir was definitely the hottest – SWOON![/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure Tanya Maniktala&#8217;s performance has been lauded by critics and viewers[/caption]\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"delayed-image-load-mobile\" .rail__item-image -->\n\t\n\t<div class=\"rail__item-content\">\n\t\t\t\t\t<h3 class=\"rail__item-headline theme__copy-color\">\n\t\t\t\tDI&#039;S DEMISE\t\t\t</h3>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<span class=\"rail__item-sub\">\n\t\t\t\tEmmerdale boss reveals original plans for DI Malone&#039;s death\t\t\t</span>\n\t\t\t</div><!-- .rail__item-content -->\n\t<div class=\"rail__item-gradient-light\">\n\n\t</div>\n\t<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tv/12456074/emmerdale-boss-reveals-original-plans-malone-death/\" class=\"rail__item-anchor\"></a>\n\n</div><!-- .rail__item .swiper-slide -->\n\t\t\t\t\t</div><!-- .swiper-wrapper -->\n\n\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"swiper-button-prev theme__background-color-rgba-80\"></div>\n\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"swiper-button-next theme__background-color-rgba-80\"></div>\n\n\t\t\t\t</div><!-- .swiper-container -->\n\t\t\t</div><!-- .rail .{rail} .swiper-video-rail .{theme-slug} -->\n\n\t\t</div><!-- .col .sun-col-6 -->\n\t</div><!-- .sun-row .{row} .rail-video-index-->\n\t</div> <!-- .sun-grid-container .sun-grid-container--{color} -->\n\t<!--googleon: all-->\n\t\n\n\n\n<p>The drama has gripped viewers with many asking if there will be a second series. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Vikram Seth&#8217;s 1,349 page novel is one of the longest books in English, so adapting it for TV was quite a job – it seems that a sequel may take a while.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>However, Vikram Seth has spoken about a sequel to the 1993 book named A Suitable Girl. It was due for publication in 2017. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>In an interview in 2018, Seth said that e was still working on the sequel as well as more material to accompany&#160;A Suitable Boy&#160;&#8211; to be collectively called&#160;A Bridge of Leaves.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>It seems that there is plenty of scope for a sequel to the BBC series after all.</p>\n\n\n<div></div>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Tue, 25 Aug 2020 09:17:09 +0000","feedId":10019,"bgimg":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603998842.jpg?strip=all&w=960","linkMd5":"bc016097a57f6d81d108839e660fdb9c","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn82@2020_3/2020/08/25/11-06-26-726_617638891ec7a3ad.webp","destWidth":960,"destHeight":640,"sourceBytes":50692,"destBytes":50692,"author":"Eve Wagstaff","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603998842.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn82@2020_3/2020/08/25/11-06-26-726_617638891ec7a3ad.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603998839.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn63@2020_2/2020/08/25/11-06-33-929_c346c2d98ccfa828.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000598660347-3.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn62@2020_4/2020/08/25/11-06-40-788_1d58bd5493afbd07.webp","https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/1f62d.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn29@2020_2/2020/08/25/11-06-37-550_3c0760d831523709.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000601930763-1.jpg?strip=all&w=640":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx14/cdn41@2020_3/2020/08/25/11-06-38-292_a16dc64b0806036c.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000596964814.jpg?strip=all&w=678":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn77@2020_6/2020/08/25/11-06-44-890_c50157a325171442.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598353584715},{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 19:06:24","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 19:06:24","title":"How to make your CV stand out by giving it a makeover using free online tools","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/12485000/cv-stand-out-free-online-tools/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>THE first impression you give an employer is from a CV so it&#8217;s important to make yours stand out from the crowd. </p>\n\n\n\n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/12433497/retail-jobs-axed-start-lockdown-coronavirus/\">Thousands of jobs have been axed</a> following the <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/coronavirus/\">coronavirus</a> pandemic making the market very competitive &#8211; even more reason to go the extra mile on your application. </p>\n\n\n\n<p><strong><img src=\"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/26a0.png\" alt=\"⚠\" class=\"wp-smiley\" style=\"height: 1em; max-height: 1em;\" /> Read our <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12383728/coronavirus-uk-news-deaths-live-latest-schools/\">coronavirus live blog</a> for the latest news &#38; updates</strong></p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12485881\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/ac-comp-table-money-revamp-your-CV.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12485881\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Redesigning your CV will help you stand out from the crowd</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<p>While some industries have suffered, such as <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/12455470/sta-travel-falls-into-adminstration/\">travel and hospitality</a>, others have been busier than ever, like supermarket retailers. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>For example, <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/12483480/tesco-16000-new-jobs/\">Tesco is hiring 16,000 new staff</a> after its online orders have doubled since the start of lockdown. </p>\n\n\n\n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/11206455/aldi-asda-hire-staff-coronavirus-demand/\">Asda also looked to expand its team</a>&#160;while&#160;<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/11217173/lidl-hire-temporary-workers/\">Lidl previously advertised for 2,500 roles.</a></p>\n\n\n\n<p>Figures published by the Institute for Employment Studies (IES) show that as many as <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/11905567/boost-cv-job-coronavirus/\">50 people chase every job</a> in Covid-19 stricken areas of the UK. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>It&#8217;s worth spending some time giving your CV a makeover to get your application noticed &#8211; it could be the difference between you getting the job or continuing the hunt. </p>\n\n\n\n<h2>Use free tools to create an eye catching design</h2>\n\n\n\n<p>You don&#8217;t have to be an designer to achieve a good-looking CV (unless you&#8217;re applying for a job as a designer) and there are a whole host of of free tools out there that will help you do this. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Websites like <a href=\"https://resume.io/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noreferrer noopener\">Resume.io</a>, <a href=\"https://www.canva.com/en_gb/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noreferrer noopener\">Canva</a> and <a href=\"https://cvdesignr.com/en\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">CVdesignr.com</a> have a range of different templates you can adapt to suit your own application. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;Hiring managers will likely be sifting through CVs even faster than usual, so initial appearances mean everything,&#8221; said Menno Olsthoorn from Resume.io. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;How a&#160;CV&#160;appears is just as important as the information it provides. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;Keep your&#160;CV&#160;concise with a mix of formats and the important information obvious &#8211; this visual balance will mean the reader focuses on what matters the most: your credentials.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>We&#8217;ve included two examples in this article of how a CV can look before and after you&#8217;ve given it a revamp using one of the online tools. </p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12486166\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/ac-graph-money-revamp-your-CV-2.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12486166\" width=\"960\" height=\"656\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">You don&#8217;t have to include a photo of yourself if you&#8217;re applying for a job</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<p>The first draft is bland, with a lot of white space, and could easily be overlooked in a pile of other applications. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>The second version of the same CV is more noticeable and adds a pop of colour. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Laying out your work experience like a timeline is interesting to look out while the contact details are easy to pick out. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Your eyes are also drawn to the skill set too, which will help future employers see immediately what you are capable of achieving. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>In both examples, the job seeker has added a photo of themselves, as well as their age. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>It&#8217;s not necessary to include these sorts of personal details when applying for a job, nor do you have to specify your nationality, marital status or political or religious beliefs.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Daniel Ball from creative recruitment firm <a href=\"https://wearewiser.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">Wiser</a> said: &#8220;Ultimately, the purpose of a CV is to convey your skills and attributes &#8211; not your appearance.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;A high quality employer won’t hire based on looks, so why include a photo?&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<h2>Build an online portfolio </h2>\n\n\n\n<p>An online portfolio of work may give you the edge you need over others applying for the same job, even if you&#8217;ve only been asked to supply a cover letter and CV. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>This will give you more opportunity to shout about your achievements and for potential employers to find out more about your skills. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>These can be done for free too and one of the easiest ways is by signing up to LinkedIn &#8211; a social network for the jobs world. </p>\n\n\n\n\t<div class=\"article-boxout\">\n\t\t<div class=\"article-boxout__header theme__background-color\">\n\t\t\t<h3 class=\"article-boxout__headline\">Top 15 CV faux pas</h3>\n\t\t</div>\n\t\t<div class=\"article-boxout__content theme__background-color-rgba-20\">\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<p class=\"article__content--intro\">\n\t\t\t\t\tTHESE are the top 15 CV faux pas that you want to avoid when applying for a job:\t\t\t\t</p>\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t<div>\n<ol>\n<li>Telling lies</li>\n<li>Spelling errors</li>\n<li>Including a selfie as a picture</li>\n<li>Having a rude or inappropriate email address</li>\n<li>Making spelling, punctuation or grammar mistakes</li>\n<li>Using clichés such as &#8216;always go the extra mile&#8217;</li>\n<li>No contact details</li>\n<li>Getting a company&#8217;s name wrong</li>\n<li>Suspiciously long gaps between jobs</li>\n<li>Going across more than two pages of A4</li>\n<li>CVs which aren&#8217;t CVs, such as a website or blog instead of a printed CV</li>\n<li>Layouts which are hard to understand/read</li>\n<li>Having hobbies which don&#8217;t constitute as hobbies such as &#8216;hanging out with friends&#8217;</li>\n<li>Using big fonts or strange layouts to make the CV look longer than it is</li>\n<li>Including part-time jobs which are no longer relevant</li>\n</ol>\n</div>\n\t\t</div>\n\t</div>\n\t\n\n\n\n<p>Here, you can add extra details about your work history and achievements, and you can upload videos too. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Mr Olsthoorn added: &#8220;Regularly update [your profile] by showcasing the latest research as well as personal achievements – shouting about your success is a sure-fire way to grab someone’s attention, especially if it’s in refreshing ways like promo videos, collaborations and more.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Some tools, like Resume.io will let you add hyperlinks on your CV that takes you to online content, such as LinkedIn. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>In the second example CV above, some of the white space has been replaced with screen grabs of samples of their work. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>You&#8217;ll want to make it clear that they link out though or else the images will be too small to read. </p>\n\n\n\n<h2>What you should avoid </h2>\n\n\n\n<p>Other things you&#8217;ll want to bear in mind when going the extra mile to make your CV look eye-catching is to keep the fonts professional. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Avoid using &#8220;fun&#8221; ones like comic sans because they&#8217;re hard to read and don&#8217;t give a serious impression.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>If  you do opt to use a free template, make sure you mix it up a bit otherwise you risk making it look the same as everyone else&#8217;s again. </p>\n\n\n\n\t<div class=\"article-boxout\">\n\t\t<div class=\"article-boxout__header theme__background-color\">\n\t\t\t<h3 class=\"article-boxout__headline\">Tools to help you write your CV</h3>\n\t\t</div>\n\t\t<div class=\"article-boxout__content theme__background-color-rgba-20\">\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<p class=\"article__content--intro\">\n\t\t\t\t\tHERE are some tools and apps that can help you put together your CV:\t\t\t\t</p>\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t<div>\n<ul>\n<li><strong>Resume app:</strong>&#160;If you struggle formatting your CV, you can choose from 21 templates in the Resume app to help you. And once you&#8217;ve put it together, you can export it as a PDF directly to your email. Resume is free to download and use, but has additonal premimum options that you can pay for.</li>\n<li><strong>Grammarly:&#160;</strong>It&#8217;s important to get your spelling and grammar accurate, so run your CV through a tool such as Grammarly to check for any errors. It&#8217;s free to download straight to your desktop.</li>\n<li><strong>Vizualize.me:</strong>&#160;If you&#8217;ve got an exisiting LinkedIn account, Vizualize.me takes the data and turns it into a timeline of your employment history and a breakdown of your skills. The free tool has six different themes so it&#8217;s a good option to make your CV look visually appealing as well.</li>\n<li><strong>VisualCV:</strong>&#160;As well as making your CV look eye catching, VisualCV also makes sure it can be read by electronic systems that some recruiters use to filter CVs. It&#8217;s also free to sign up for.</li>\n</ul>\n</div>\n\t\t</div>\n\t</div>\n\t\n\n\n\n<p>Mandy Watson from jobs site&#160;<a href=\"https://www.ambitionspersonnel.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">A</a><a href=\"https://www.ambitionspersonnel.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">mbitions Personnels&#160;</a>adds: &#8220;Making a CV stand out can go too far the other way.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;Reconsider any overcomplicated fonts, design features or unnecessary elements on your document.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;Remember one or two sides of A4 equivalent is all that is needed, any more will likely not be read, imagine all the CVs that employer will be looking through.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Are you struggling to get to grips with starting your CV? We&#8217;ve put together an <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/11499967/tips-rewriting-cv-recruitment-experts/\">eight step guide</a> on how to rewrite yours. </p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row \">\n\t\t<div class=\"col sun-col-6\">\n\n\t\t\t<div class=\"rail rail--classic  rail--trending theme-money\" data-slide-count=\"4\" data-slide-count-tablet=\"4\">\t\t\t\t<div class=\"swiper-container\">\n\n\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"rail__header\">\n\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<h3 class=\"rail__title theme__after-color\">Most read in Money</h3>\n\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t</div>\n\n\t\t\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"swiper-pagination theme__swiper-pagination\"></div>\n\n\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"swiper-wrapper\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\n<div class=\"rail__item swiper-slide\">\n\n\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"rail__item-image\">\n\t\t\t<a data-src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/MB-COMP-HOUSE-TRANFORMATION.jpg?strip=all&#038;w=300&#038;h=192&#038;crop=1\"></div>\n\t\t\t\t<div class=\"delayed-image-load-mobile\" data-src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/MB-COMP-HOUSE-TRANFORMATION.jpg?strip=all&#038;w=300&#038;h=192&#038;crop=1\"></div>\n\t\t\t</a>\n\t\t\t\t\t</div><!-- .rail__item-image -->\n\t\n\t<div class=\"rail__item-content\">\n\t\t\t\t\t<h3 class=\"rail__item-headline theme__copy-color\">\n\t\t\t\tCHANGING ROOMS\t\t\t</h3>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<span class=\"rail__item-sub\">\n\t\t\t\tWoman, 31, turns run-down 1890s maisonette she got for £90k into modern home\t\t\t</span>\n\t\t\t</div><!-- .rail__item-content -->\n\t<div class=\"rail__item-gradient-light\">\n\n\t</div>\n\t<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/12485885/woman-31-transforms-maisonette-diy/\" class=\"rail__item-anchor\"></a>\n\n</div><!-- .rail__item .swiper-slide -->\n\n<div class=\"rail__item swiper-slide\">\n\n\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"rail__item-image\">\n\t\t\t<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/12482922/eat-out-to-help-out-scheme-end-extended/\">\n\t\t\t\t<div class=\"delayed-image-load-landscape\" +0000","feedId":10019,"bgimg":"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/26a0.png","linkMd5":"283b3fd191bcd0c048a634ccf9b89f73","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx/cdn70@2020_5/2020/08/25/11-06-25-259_8c2ee998bba5b6ed.webp","destWidth":72,"destHeight":72,"sourceBytes":595,"destBytes":1080,"author":"Hollie Borland","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/26a0.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx/cdn70@2020_5/2020/08/25/11-06-25-259_8c2ee998bba5b6ed.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/ac-comp-table-money-revamp-your-CV.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx3/cdn93@2020_4/2020/08/25/11-06-37-383_d75bc192133b5531.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/ac-graph-money-revamp-your-CV-2.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn32@2020_2/2020/08/25/11-06-33-806_7492043a6c58ca93.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598353584677},{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 19:06:24","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 19:06:24","title":"Are BTEC results out today and why have they been delayed?","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12450132/btec-results-delayed-now-released/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>STUDENTS are starting to receive their BTEC results today after being delayed by a week and a half.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Students were left in the lurch after <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12448410/btec-pulled-results-exam-board-remark-450000-pupils/\">BTEC results were pulled just hours before they were set to be released</a> &#8211; but here&#8217;s all you need to know.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_undefined\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/7faaa4e3-8822-4b39-bfdc-e819512ea657.jpg?w=670&strip=all\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-large\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">BTEC students have begun receiving their results</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<h2>When will BTEC results be released?</h2>\n\n\n\n<p>BTEC students started to receive their revised grades on Tuesday 25 August &#8211; after their results were delayed by a week and a half.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Pearsons, the awarding body, decided to pull BTEC results just HOURS before results day so that they could be reassessed and brought in line with A-Levels and GCSEs.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Students awaiting grades for university places have been prioritised in the remark.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>All 450,000 BTEC pupils should get their results by the end of the week.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_undefined\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000602883683.jpg?w=670&strip=all\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-large\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Furious students are calling for the Education Secretary, Gavin Williamson&#8217;s resignation</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<h2>Why have results been delayed?</h2>\n\n\n\n<p>The grades were delayed after BTEC board Person pulled them HOURS before the release date. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>It follows the Government&#8217;s <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/politics/12423084/gcse-a-level-grades-england-scrapped/\">U-turn that GCSE and A-level students would this year be able to receive grades based on teachers&#8217; estimates</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>BTEC exam board Person said the decision to delay the grades followed perceived &#8220;unfairness&#8221;compared with results of those who took A-level and GCSE exams.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>In a statement, a spokesperson for Pearson said: &#8220;BTEC qualification results have been been generally consistent with teacher and learner expectations, but we have become concerned about unfairness in relation to what are now significantly higher outcomes for GCSE and A-levels.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Some 450,000 pupils were left in the lurch, including 250,000 who received their results last week. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Furious headteachers said the BTEC board&#8217;s U-turn was &#8220;incomprehensible&#8221; at this time, while students said they felt &#8220;forgotten.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_undefined\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000602509444.jpg?w=670&strip=all\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-large\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">It follows what has been branded a &#8216;U-turn&#8217; on A-level results</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<h2>How have grades been decided?</h2>\n\n\n\n<p>Exam board Pearson confirmed all BTECs would be regraded to bring them in line with A-levels and GCSE results.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>A spokeswoman for Pearson, the provider of BTECs, said: &#8220;Following Ofqual&#8217;s announcement that A-level and GCSE students are to receive centre-assessed grades, we will be applying the same principles for students receiving BTEC results this summer.</p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row \">\n\t\t<div class=\"col sun-col-6\">\n\n\t\t\t<div class=\"rail rail--classic  rail--trending theme-news\" can.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n<div></div>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Tue, 25 Aug 2020 09:50:00 19:06:24","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 19:06:24","title":"What is Donald Trump Jr’s net worth and who is his ex-wife Vanessa?","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/2180445/donald-trump-jr-ex-wife-net-worth/","description":"<p>THE US President&#8217;s eldest son has come to the defence of his father at the Republican National Convention.</p>\n<p>But what is <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/donald-trump-jr/\">Donald Trump Jr</a>&#8216;s net worth, and who is his ex-wife?</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12492074\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492074\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603927356.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"570\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Donald Trump Jr speaking at the RNC</figcaption><figcredit>Reuters</figcredit></figure></p>\n<h2>Who is Donald Trump Jr and what does he do?</h2>\n<p>Donald Trump Jr is the eldest <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/2155526/how-many-children-donald-trump-ivanka-tiffany-eric-barron-donald-jr/\">child of President of the United States Donald Trump</a> and his first wife <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/5341352/ivana-trump-age-married-donald-children/\">Ivana</a>, who is from the Czech Republic.</p>\n<p>The fluent Czech speaker was very close to his maternal grandfather growing up.</p>\n<p>The 42-year-old was born in New York and gained a degree in economics from the Wharton School of the University of Pennsylvania before going to work for his father&#8217;s businesses.</p>\n<p>He is the executive vice president of The Trump Organisation.</p>\n<p>He was introduced to <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/2167540/americas-new-first-family-the-trumps-will-always-be-second-best-to-the-dignified-obamas/\">the family business</a> aged 13 when he was paid minimum wage plus tips as a dock attendant at Trump castle.</p>\n<p>In 2001, having gained his degree, he returned to the family business and cut his teeth with the development of Trump Place at West Side Yards, New York.</p>\n<p>He now oversees new projects and development of the company&#8217;s real estate, hotels, golf courses and more &#8211; and has led projects in Chicago, Las Vegas, Scotland and India.</p>\n<p>And he&#8217;s appeared regularly on The Apprentice alongside his <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/2036838/donald-trump-how-much-net-worth-melania-married-children/\">father</a>.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_4000979\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 751px\"><img class=\"wp-image-4000979 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/nintchdbpict000338176090.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=741\" alt=\"Donald Trump JR pictured with his dad as a child. He wrote on Instagram: 'A few miles beneath our feet since then but still a great pic.'\" width=\"741\" height=\"743\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Donald Trump Jr pictured with his dad as a child. He wrote on Instagram: &#8216;A few miles beneath our feet since then but still a great pic&#8217;</figcaption><figcredit>Instagram</figcredit></figure></p>\n<h2>Is Donald Trump Jr active on Twitter?</h2>\n<p>Like his father, Donald Jr often causes controversy with his comments on Twitter.</p>\n<p>In the wake of the terror attack on the Houses of Parliament Donald Jr tweeted a link to an article about <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/5968714/sadiq-khan-london-mayor-resign-wife-born/\">Sadiq Khan</a> and a story in which the London Mayor claimed<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/3152554/donald-trump-jnr-london-terror-attack-sadiq-khan/\"> that terror attacks were &#8220;part and parcel&#8221; of living in a big city.</a></p>\n<p>Donald Jr prefaced the link with the comment: &#8220;You have to be kidding me?!&#8221;</p>\n<p>He also drew widespread condemnation by tweeting a photo of a bowl of Skittles with the words: “If I had a bowl of Skittles and I told you just three would kill you.</p>\n<p>&#8220;Would you take a handful?</p>\n<p>“That’s our Syria refugee problem.”</p>\n<p>Wrigley, which owns the Skittles brand, responded: “Skittles are candy. Refugees are people.&#8221;</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12492110\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492110\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/NINTCHDBPICT000596356076.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"617\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Trump Jr is outspoken on social media</figcaption><figcredit>Reuters</figcredit></figure></p>\n<h2>What&#8217;s his net worth?</h2>\n<p>It is estimated that Donald Trump Jr is worth $25 million, according to Forbes.</p>\n<p>The major venture in which the President has included his family appears to be the Trump International Hotel in Washington, D.C., where his three eldest kids—Donald Jr, Ivanka and Eric—each owns a 7.5% stake, worth about $6 million apiece.</p>\n<p>Most of his money appears to have come from hefty salaries he has earned as longtime executives at the Trump Organization.</p>\n<p>When father Trump was inaugurated, <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/2591858/donald-trump-refuses-to-let-cnn-fake-news-reporter-ask-question-brands-buzzfeed-a-pile-of-failing-garbage-and-calls-bbc-another-beauty/\">the family empire was formally </a>handed over to his sons Donald Jr and <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/2180764/eric-trump-role-donald-trumps-government/\">Eric, 36</a>.<strong> </strong></p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_4000964\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 760px\"><img class=\"wp-image-4000964 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/nintchdbpict000338176060.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=750\" alt=\"Donald and Vanessa Trump pose with their five children in this family snap\" width=\"750\" height=\"700\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Donald and Vanessa Trump pose with their five children in this family snap</figcaption><figcredit>Instagram</figcredit></figure></p>\n<h2>Who is Donald Jr&#8217;s ex-wife Vanessa and do they have any children?</h2>\n<p>Donald Jr was introduced to his former wife, <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/3999845/vanessa-trump-donald-jrs-wife-somethings-gotta-give/\">model Vanessa Haydon</a>, by his father at a fashion show in 2003.</p>\n<p>They met six weeks later via a mutual friend and married in 2005 at the President&#8217;s Florida resort.</p>\n<p>The pair have five children Donald Trump III, Tristan Milos, Spencer Frederick, Kai Madison and Chloe Sophia.</p>\n<p>Vanessa, 42, who once dated movie star Leonardo Di Caprio, is a former model who had her own handbag line La Poshett.</p>\n<h2>What did he say at the Republican National Convention?</h2>\n<p>In the speech at the RNC, Trump Jr came to his dad&#8217;s defence, and called candidate Joe Biden the <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12490692/donald-trump-jr-biden-loch-ness-monster-rnc/\">“Loch Ness Monster of the swamp.”</a></p>\n<div class=\"advert-wrapper advert-wrapper--outstream\">\n<div id=\"outstream\" class=\"dfp-ad advert--outstream\" data-google-query-id=\"CKTE6f-GtusCFVUf0wodE5UFqw\">\n<div id=\"google_ads_iframe_3048/d.thesun/news/worldnews_4__container__\">He also claimed that “Biden and the radical left are also now coming for our freedom of speech and want to bully us into submission”.</div>\n<div></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/2180445/donald-trump-jr-russia-email-twitter/\">Trump Jr </a>also mentioned the current climate in the US, saying that &#8220;anarchists have been flooding out streets&#8221; and that &#8220;small businesses across America&#8230;are being torched by mobs&#8221;.</p>\n<p>\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container
